'chi med gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis / gsang ba'i rnam thar bstan 'byung rin po che / bka' thang kun snang gsal ba'i sgron ma
item.skttrans: bka' thang kun snang gsal ba'i sgron

item.tib: rgyal kun spyi gzugs dran pa nam mkha' rje'i / zhing khams rab 'byams bkod pa bsam yas la/ gang 'dul mdzad pa grangs med sprul pa'i sku'i / mam thar g.yung drung gsang ba'i mdzod chen
item.coloph: sngar nas rang la mdo smad kyi gnas chen bye ba stag rtse dang / rgyal mo mu rdo sogs kyi gter gnas re 'ga' nas dran pa'i rnam thar nyung bsdus kyi kha byang sogs brnyes ba'i rten 'brel dang mthun par / rjes su khyung dkar ri khrod du grub dbang rnam gnyis kyi gdan sa 'dzin pa kun dga' rin po che sku mched kyis mar phebs dgos kyi bya ma rta 'byor ba'i dgongs bzhed rjes su bsgrub pa'i ched du / shing byi [1924] lor khyung yul du thegs te khyung dkar ri khrod kyi gnas der yod pa'i skabs su / … de'i tshe hor gyi bstan sbyin ga rgyal dang hor gyi bla ma dgon khag dpon sde thams cad nas gdan drang bzhin 'gro don lhun gyis grub nas / spu rgyal gnas kyi lung bstan du tshe lung dpal 'bar gdong du phyin zhing bsang dang tshogs mchod rgya cher phul / … kho bo gsang sngags gling pa yab yum gyis shing glang [1925] lo'i ston zla 'bring po'i yar ches la zab gter rin po che dran pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten bcas spyan drangs nas slar gsang rgya bsdom zhing sbas / phyis su rab byung bcu drug pa'i thog mar rab byung zhes pa me yos [1927] lo'i hor zla drug pa'i tshes bcu la / zab gter rin po che bka' rgya bkrol pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe / … sbas gnas shang lang brag dkar gyi nye 'dab rang bstan dbal khyung bla brang gi gdan sa ru mkha' 'gro'i brda yig sde lnga bzhugs pa bod yig tu phab pa'i dbu bzung ste / slar yang mdo khams kyi gnas chen g.yung drung gsang ba dbal rong drag po gnam lcags yong rdzong gi thugs ka'i sa cha / dbra khyung ya la'i yul ljongs 'chi med byang chub gling gi sgrub sde chen po'i dben khrod / … lcags rta [1930] lo'i nag pa zla ba'i tshes bcu'i mchod pa dang 'brel par yongs su rdzogs par / bod yig tu gtan la phab pa'i dge bas rgyal bstan spyi dang / de ltar bka' thang chen mo'i thog ma'i yi ge pa ni / rang slob thugs zin gyi sgrub brtson dam pa g.yung drung ye shes nas dbu mthar phyin par bgyis pa … par byang 'di yang gong nas dbal khyung gzhung dang gong rgyal 'chi med gling gis rgya gor stong phrag bzhi dang lnga brgya nye ba'i dngos rdzas la brten nas glegs bam yongs rdzogs par du 'khod grub pa'i dga' ston dang 'brel par / las tshan gtogs pa'i dge bshes rnams kyis bskul ba'i ngor / tshad mar gyur pa'i bla ma dam pa grub dbang yab sras kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i snyigs ma'i dus kyi bon smra ba khod spungs pa dbra ston ngag dbang bskal bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis gus pas sug bris su byas pa

item.tib: sngags kyis mdo 'dul rin chen phreng ba mu chos khro 'dul chen mo las stong gsum dbang chen spyi la mnyes gsal
drag po gshed brdungs gi las ling ga bris gyer
gshed 'dul hom bzhengs drag po'i sri khung rko ba dbus
gshed 'dul hom bzhengs drag po'i sri khung rko ba dbus
sngags kyi mdo 'dur rin chen phreng ba mu cho'i khrom 'dur chen mo las g.yang gzhi'i sri gshed dbang bsdud sa bdag bcos pa
brlal 'bod dbus phyogs
rdzu 'phrul nyi zer zhags pa 'dur gyis mtshan bon sri bsad
bsad pa rin chen 'phring ba'i gzu dpang bris gyer
drag po gshed brdung gyis brjed tho mul sel nyi ma'i snying po
drag po gshed brdungs gis dkyil 'khor dang gtor ma bca' thabs rdzas bsags
smrang rgyud cho bo gar gyi lag len
gshed kyi 'gug las
bla 'dzin ma drug gi 'gug pa
bsad pa rin chen 'phreng ba
g.yab mkhan ma dgu'i gzhung
nyi zer zhag pa'i ling ga gnas spar
lta bsad mtshon cha sna dgu
ral gri so gdab
drag po gshed brdungs gi drag po'i sbyin bsregs dgra bgegs kun phung
bsad pa
ma tang bsgral ba'i las dang hom khung kha bcad sri mnan las bya
drang mkhan 'gug khyi 'di dar sri gzhon sri dri sri pho sri mo sri chung sri dgra bgegs gnod byed kun btul
gshog pa dmar nag gi rgyud las mi rab mched gsum khro bo gshed 'dul
item.coloph: zhang zhung bon gyi gter ma / sri gshed bon skor ro / stag la me 'bar phyag cha rdzogs so / ston pa gshen rab bka'o / sri gshen cen gtsug phud

item.tib: dbang chen khro bo'i gshed gzhung nyi zer zhags pa
item.coloph: spa dro gter nas khu tsha'i bton / de nas rim pa kyis brgyud pa'o // dge'o

item.tib: mo 'dul gser sgros dang lcags sgrom gnyis de 'di ni lcags sgroms
item.coloph: ces spa dro stag tshang brag la gter du sbas / kung ston pa zla med gzhon nu / gter nas bton pa yin / mnan bsregs 'phang gsum gzhung dang mthun / bkra shis par gyur cig / / dge'o

item.tib: dbal bon stag la me 'bar gyi ma tang bsgral ba'i las rim nyi zer zhags pa
bon 'di nas drag po gshed brdung gi sri gsas 'bong ba stag chung
chung brdung le'u lha lnga

item.coloph: … spa dro gter ma'o / …

item.tib: dam can rgya mtsho'i thugs dam rgyud bskul
item.coloph: ces bon skyongs thugs dam rgyud bskul 'di nas dpal ldan lo cu'i dgon gyi bla brang pho drang bskyed tshal du dbra rigs nyid kyi rjes 'jugs dri dbon phun tshogs rgyal mtshan bstan 'dzin gyi lcags yos zla ba lnga pa'i dkar phyogs dga' ba gsum pa'i snga cha la pa'i yal 'dabs ldem pa'i gar bsgyur ba'i dges legs phel

item.tib: mkha' la rang bzhin gyi mnga' gsol
srid pa'i dbal bon gnyan la sgrib zhu gyon pa kyer mgo
gyer mgo
mnga' gsol
gnad bskul dbus gzigs
srid pa rgan rgon rmi lam bshad pa
ru 'thab mar zhus
ru 'thabs yar zhu
sri bsad ral gri so bsnol
bon skyongs dmag 'gyed
item.coloph: phyi rabs gshen bon rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir du hor snyon bdag gis sbyar ba'o / 'gal 'khrul ci mchis rgyal ba zhi khro'i lha tshogs dang / rig 'dzin sems dpa' tshogs rnams dang / bon skyongs bsrungs ma rnams la bshags par 'bul / byang dag tshangs pa'i dngos grub bdag la rtsol / dpe lung gtsor bzhag dag yig ltar du byas pa nas / rnam sprul chen po 'khrul zhig mtha' bral rnal 'byor pa / hor nag rtogs ldan gis sbyar ba re shig rdzogs so / bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzom gling rgyun du shog

item.tib: dmag bsdus
thong sha 'gyed pa
drag po gshed brdung gyis rgyud las dri za gshed phud
item.coloph: bdag 'dra stong rgyung mthu chen gyis spyi rabs bon gyi rje[s] 'jugs pas / blo gsal bstan 'dzin gang zag las / dri za sha gshed kha zug tshe / dpe 'di de tshe dar bar 'gyur / da lta brag dkar khyung tshangs la / gter du sbas te dam par bsdam / gter srungs srid pa rgyal mo'i mdzod / bon sgo ma 'chug nya ra gyis / nga ni gdung rabs kun gyi rje / nyi shu kun bzang sprul pa lha'i mtshan / gter shal bya ba de nas 'byung / stan pa bya ba dbyar med 'gyur / ces gsungs so / i thi / rgya / rgya / rgya / dge'o

item.tib: srid pa'i mi rabs mched gsum gyi rgyud las khro bo gshed 'dul gyi gshed bda'
lha 'dre bla 'gug la gshed kyi gab nub man ngag bstan pa
gsang 'dur 'khor ba rgyud sbyong gis thugs rje rol pa gnas kyi mchong

item.coloph: thugs rje rol pa drug sbyang 'di / sprul sku dbyil gyis zhal bzang brag la las bton …

item.tib: gsang 'dur 'khor ba rgyud sbyang las spyan 'drangs bstung sbyang rtse gsol zas bsngo
thugs rje rol pa gnas kyi mchong las rjes chog la bzla
item.coloph: gsang ba 'dus pa nas / mkhas pa mi bzhi'i yan chad la shin tu dar zhing / spyod pa la / rgyal po glen pa'i gdon gsol nas / thang gcig g.yung drung gis bon nub par byas pa la / zhang zhung stong rgyung mthu chen la sogs ste / mkhas pa mi bzhi yis / phyi rab don du yi ger btab ste / lcags 'phrang du bon phug la / spyi dus lnga [b]rgya'i tha mar rdol nas spyod par 'gyur ro / wer sems dpa' mtha' gud kyang brlag par 'gyur ro / ces gsungs ste / rgya dang bcas nas sbas so / srid pa rgyal mo'i thub par gyis / slig tso / lu tra lig / sprul sku dbyil gyis / skyes rol pa gnas kyis mchong 'di'i gzhung pa lag len chung dang bcas pa shog ser pa a zha blo gros gyis brnam te / de la rim gyis brgyud nas bdag las bab pa'o / bdag gis kyang 'gro ba'i don bsam nas nol [~nom?] pa lags so / bkra shis so / dge'o

item.tib: dbal gsas rngam pa'i sbyin sreg las skabs kyi shog chung me dpungs dgu sgrib
dbal gsas drag po sbyin bsreg
item.coloph: smon rgyal bla ma g.yung drung phun tshogs kyi phyag dpe kyi bu yig la zhal pas lags so / bkra shis so

item.tib: rje btsun chen po rgyal ba dbang ldan gyi rnam thar phyag 'tshal gsol 'debs bsam 'phel yid bzhin nor bu'i phreng ba yid kyi 'dod 'jo
item.coloph: brtsams pa'i byed po [three syllables are illegible] bdag / brtsams gnas dgon pa bde chen gling de la …

item.tib: ma rgyud gsang mchog gzhi ye sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: ces pa'i 'di ni lug ris su bgyis mkhan kho bo rgyal dbang ming gyis bris pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: ye shes thig le gzhi'i 'grel pa
item.coloph: sgom 'grel don 'dus rgyal rigs kyi gshen po mi lus bsam legs kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so

item.tib: lam mngon sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud
lam mngon sangs rgyas pa'i 'grel pa
gsang mchog lha su brgya drug bcu'i bsgrub pa
item.coloph: gsang ba sangs rgyas rgyud gsum bya ba / mi lus bsam legs dngos kyis grub pa snyem pa'i yang gsang gi rgyud do // spa smar ro // dung por gter nas bdag btsun pa gzhon gyis dag par bris pa'o //… gsang rgyud ngo mtshar rin chen gter bzang po / sgo gsum nyer drangs thos bsam lhun po'i rtser / bkod pa'i dgon ston rol ba rgyal dbang ming…

item.tib: bskangs bshags rin po che
gsang mchog mthar thug ma rgyud thugs rje nyi ma 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud
'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud kyi dgongs 'gyel rnam par nges pa gsang ba mthar thug nyi zer drwa ba
item.coloph: 'bras bu'i rgyud 'di nyid gu ru rnon rtses gter las thon nas slar shin tu gnyen pas mkha' 'gro rgya mtshos gnyer nas gsang ba yang gab tu song ba la / dmu gshen nyi mas kyang sdeb tshal de las ma gzigs pas de la lam rgyud kyi 'bras bu sbyar nas 'bras bu'i rgyud kyi dgongs 'grel nyi ma'i 'khor lo bya ba rtsom nas spel bar mdzad pa deng sang yang bzhugs pa la / rgyud 'di nyid spel ba'i dus la bab tshe mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis sman ri'i mkhan chen nyi ma bstan 'dzin gyi phyag tu sprad pa lcang sprul bon dbyings mtshan gyis mdo gam smad du khyer ba la / bdag shar rdza'i bya bral ba bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis dpe lung dang bcas pa lag tu son pa'i mod la / [fol. 56v] dbal khyung gter ston gsang sngags gling bas 'grel ba mdzad dgos gsungs pa'i rjes dmu rdo g.yung drung spungs rtse'i nyer 'dab gsang chen ri khrod du yod skabs su / blo sna yi dam 'dis grog pa'i rnal 'byor tshul khrims dbang phyug nas 'grel ba mdzad dgos kyi bskul ba byung ba'i nub mo rmi lam du /… rten 'brel legs snyams nas 'grel rtsom pa'i dam bcas nas / dbu 'dzug ste rtsom pa'i [fol. 57r] 'phro cung zad lhag yod skabs su / rje 'brug gi gdung las son pa'i khro tshang sprul sku g.yung drung mthong [grol? illeg.] nas bskul ba mdzad pa la brten nas rtsom pa mthar phyin bgyis pa'i yi ge ba ni shar rdza'i bya bral lhun grub thog med kyis bgyis pa bstan pa rin po che'i rgyan du 'gyur bar gyur cig

item.tib: bsam legs kyi gshen glu de'u gsum
item.coloph: ha'i bon po la zhus pa thag chod [illeg.] ba'i gshen glu'o / … kho bo thos chung ba rgyal dbang ming gi rang lo nyer bzhi grub pa'i steng du dkar phyogs zla ba bdun pa'i tshes la bskrun pa dge'o / kun tu bzang po / bzang za rings btsun / mi lus bsam legs / snang ba mdog can / a nu 'phrag thag / sad ne ga'u / bya ra ma drug / 'gu ru rno[n] rtse / myal ston gzhon 'bum / sgom pa g.yung drung rgyal mtshan / sgom pa rin chen dpal / bka' gdam[s] ye rgyal / zhang ston bsod dpal / zhang ston bsod rgyal / gshen nyi ma rgyal mtshan / lha bum shes rab 'od zer / lo ri drang srong blo gros rgyal mtshan / de la bdag rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis zhus…

item.tib: lam drug khrid brgyad kyi don gnad thabs lam du 'khyer ba'i gdam pa
sgom 'grel nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
item.coloph: de nas bdag dmyal gyi btsun pa gzhon nu 'bum khams su yod [- -] / mkha' 'gro'i lung ston gyis 'gu ru can du khyod song rang gis bon skal yod long zer ba byung nas yar song nas dbang khrid dang gdam ngags mang du zhus pas / nyin gcig tshogs kyi mchod pa dpon slob gsum pas med [illeg.] bshams pa'i dus su / bla ma rnon rtses dar dkar yug gcig bzung [illeg.] nas / ngas da ma rgyud la dpe mang po bris pas mus / mi las 'phos pa'i skye ba blo yang spun chad [illeg.] yang mang / dar yig 'di khyod kyis bris skal du sngang [~gnang?] ba / khyod lha las 'phos pa blo gtsang zhing dal bas sus ma mthong bar khyod rang gi bris shig gsungs pas / zhang bod 'dres ma la bod yig mang bar 'dug / zhang yig kyang ka kha snang ba la legs par brtags pas mi khrol ba ma byung / lo gcig la sangs rgyas rgyud gsum 'grel ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor / nyi ma'i snying po / sgrubs gzhung / phran dang bcas pa snang pa legs par bris nas gtugs su byas / de nas rgyab log la [fol. 14r] 'chad 'grel nyi ma'i 'od zer gda' ba bri chas tsa / gar byung cha med bla ma byung nas mkha' 'gro gnyan dar dkar khyer la shog / dung phor du stag mo kha yan lnga 'grol thal ba de e mthong gsungs nas khyer de thal / phyis de yang 'bri par zhus pas / ci byed ci byung de yang spyad pa dkon / bu ci rnal 'byor khyed gnyis la e mkho ste kho ni ma byung / khyod rang nyams su long / de nga la yang med / gzhi 'khrul ba / lam log pa / 'bras bu sad kyis khyer / de 'dra'i snod mi 'ong gsungs so /

item.tib: gsang mchog lam 'bras bu mngon par bstan pa
item.coloph: sprul sku 'gu ru rin po che la / bdag btsun pa gzhon gyis zhus nas dar dkar ngos la bris / ma dpe la zhang zhung drag yig 'di 'dra dang / bod yig 'dres par snang ngo / dag par bris so // ma rgyud gzhan rnams kha byang tsam du snang ngo / [fol. 44v] bdag khams su yod pa la bla mas lam sel sa tshol la sogs gha zung khong grwa sa la bskur zin pa rnams kyang kha byang tsam du 'dug / de nas rtsad gtug byas tsam na khong gis bskur ba kun la / rang bzhin gyis rnal 'byor bas snyan rgyud du gnang yang 'gu rus bskur yang zer / … khyod rang gi bon skal ni / snga ma skye ba gsum gyis gong nas yid dam / gsang mchog sangs rgyas rgyud gsum yin / 'gu ru'i can du len song dang / … dar dkar bu dpe la rin po che gzhon gyi phyag bris / zhib bu nag tshas byas zin pa la / g.yung drung bdag gis bris so // … gzhon gyis kyang nan tan gsang nas su la ma bstan par 'dug / … der bstan na sgom gra gcig kyang tshugs pa la / mi tshig gcig gnyis song na sde dgon 'khrug pa 'byung bar 'dug / … bla mas yang ma ston sbos shig gsungs pa yin skad / dbus su yang spel ma phod / sgom re ni med / bshad lo byed pa'i ti ka yan yun 'ga' re 'phel / mkha' 'gro'i bka' chad kyang e 'byung bsam nas bla ma'i bka' las 'da' ma phod pa yin gsungs so //

item.tib: rtsa rlung thig le gsum gyi gsal sgron
gsang chen gsang mchog mthar thug rgyal po ma rgyud thugs rje nyi ma'i gzhi ye sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud 'grel
gsang sngags ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho lam mngon sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud 'grel gzhi lam 'bras bu'i gsal byed yang 'grel nyi ma'i 'khor lo rab rgyas snang pa dpal gyi gter chen
item.coloph: deng sang gi dus 'dir ma rgyud dpa' 'o chen po yin de / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i dbang po zhes bya bas / mthong thos grol bas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i ched du gsal ba'i rang bzhin yang 'grel nyi ma'i 'khor lo rab rgyas snang ba dpal gyi gter chen zhes bya ba brtsams pa'i dge legs 'phel / sa pho byi ba'i [fol. 68r] lo rgya dkar bas lo ming kun 'dzin zhes bya ba / hor lug zla ba lnga pa'i tshes bzhi nyin / rgyal phur 'dzom pa'i grub nyi dbang ba'i dus / byang gi gnas gru sdza sgar chen byang mdzod lung ces bya ba'i sa gnas kyi spang [~gsang, or yang?] phug bya [ra?] dol ces bya ba'i mdun / rang grol bla ma rgyal mtshan gyis khrid gsungs lho phyogs kyi mdzod lung dol po che zhes bya bar / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor gyis gnyan khrod la brtsams pa'o

item.tib: ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i gzhung don zab yangs 'chad pa'i bshad byang lam 'bras mchog gi dbyig gter zab mo bkod pa'i rgyal po nam mkha' yid kyi phreng pa skal ldan gyi spyod pa
item.coloph: lam 'bras mchog gi dbyig gter zab mo bkod pa'i rgyal po nam mkha'i yid kyi gter phreng zhes bya ba 'di… dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis me phag hor zla gsum pa'i tshes brgyad la dge sdeng spel chen gyis mngon dgar grub par bgyis pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: gsang sngags ma rgyud sangs rgyas rgyud gsum gyi 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud kyi dgongs 'grel rnam 'byed nyi ma'i 'khor lo gsang ba gter gyi thig pa
item.coloph: de ltar 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas pa de tshangs par gter las thon par 'dug kyang / da lta'i tshig 'phro btags par byas pa de bas mi 'dug pas / de yan de'i rjes su lam mngon sangs rgyas pa'i 'bras bu de dril nas / gzhung lugs ji lta ba la / bdag gis spros bcas rgyas par byas te / 'chad na zin ris bde ba'i yan lag bltas na ngo mtshar dga' byed / yang dag de kho na nyid kyi [fol. 25r] don 'grel rnam 'byed nyi ma'i 'khor lo gsang ba gter gyi thig pa zhes bya ba / … khyad par gzhung lugs ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang 'grel ba dang / bshad byang sgom byang sgrub pa lag len gdams ngag bcas pa la sngon sbyang gis 'phro las / dus 'dir shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su rgyas pa dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis / khyung po'i gnas g.yu ri mo'i nang 'jag ne tel mthon zhes bya bar… brtsam zhing bsgrag nas bsdebs pa dge legs 'phel / sa pho byi ba'i lo rgya nag pa'i zla ba drug pa / rgya gar bas lo mi kun 'dzin hor zla lnga ba'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin grub par bgyis

item.tib: gsang mchog mthar thug rgyal po'i 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: zhes gud du phyung ba po ni kun grol grags pa can gyis / khro chen rgyal po'i tha gru ngo mtshar nor bu'i gling chen du na tshod ldan gyi tshes ba dge /

item.tib: ma rgyud thugs rje nyi ma 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: brgyud pa ni / bon sku kun tu bzang po / rdzogs sku mkha' 'gying dkar po / sprul sku gsang mchog mthar thug / yum bzang za ring btsun / de nas nye brgyud ni / rgyal gshen mi lus bsam legs / phug pa'i snang ba mdog can / bar pa'i a nu 'phrag thag / sgo ba'i sad ne ga'u / des bya ra ma drug la gtad nas gter du sbas / phyi'i gu ru rnon rtses bton pa'i dar dkar ngos la btsun pa gzhon gyis bris / de la sgom pa g.yung drung skyabs kyis zhus / des sgom pa rin chen dpal la brgyud / des bka' gdam[s] ye shes rgyal mtshan / de la sgam nang so bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhus te / dag par gtug[s] pa'o

item.tib: ma rgyud kyi khrid nyi ma'i snying po
item.coloph: khrid nyi ma'i snying po la / sad ne ga'u rgyud [~rgud] du btus te khol du phyung pa'o / yum chen kye ma 'od mtsho'i bon sku thig le nyag cig tu sgrub pa'i rgyab brten cha lag tu bkod / snya li shu stag ring la gdams pa'o / rtsa rlung gag sel ma rgyud rgyas 'bring ltar blang ngo / … ma rgyud 'bring ba mnyam yig dang bcas pa / cha cig byang dang ra khyung rdzong la sbas nas yod do / [fol. 38r] cha cig rta nag dre sna mtshal gdong na yod / cha cig rtsang stod zang zang brag bu kar chung la yod do / rgyas pa bcud dang cha lag bcas pa rta nag dung phor la sbas so / … spa lhun grub dpal bzang gi gter nas gdan drangs pa zhal dro / rim pa rgyud nas khyung btsun tha yud wer zhi ming gi zhus nas bgyis

item.tib: zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi lo rgyus
item.coloph: de ltar rdzogs pa chen po'i snyan rgyud kyi rnam thar lo rgyus dang bcas pa 'di ni / phyi rabs dag snang bskyed pa'i phyir du / sngar gyi rnam thar rgyas pa las go bde zhing sgang du dril nas / g.yas ru'i bru sgom rgyal ba g.yung drung la / sprul sku skyangs 'phags rin po che'i thugs sras / las can gyi bshes mnyen [~gnyen] dam pa thogs med sku mched gyi nye bar bskur [~bskul] te / thang lha gangs kyi yar zur / nam ra gangs kyi mar zur / sho mon 'jom pa'i mdun zhol / 'khams dbus gnyis kyi so mtshams / sgro mdzod dpal gyi dben dgon zhes bya bar / byi ba lo yi dbyar zla tha chung la sbyar ba'o

item.tib: kun bzang dug phyung
item.coloph: byang sems kun tu bzang po'i bsang nag / rig 'dzin dran pa nam mkha'i bon skor legs so // ces kun bzang bsang nag tshar ro …

item.tib: brnal bslang dmar tshan
item.coloph: zhes tshan gtor ro // bsnal bsang ngo // lo phrom kyi dmar tshan rdzogs so …

item.tib: ge khod lha tshan dkar po
dbal gsas las rim gyis bsdus don nyams len nyi ma'i snying po
dbal gsas las rim gyis bsdus don nyer mkho nyung
item.coloph: ces pa'i tshul 'di nas khyung po btsun chung tha yid wer ya tshul ming gis sbyor ba dge zhing zhal dro bkra shis par gyur cig …

item.tib: snyan rgyud a gsal gsal bar byed pa'i mngon rtogs
item.coloph: zhes pa'i tshul 'di ni gshen gyis drang srong shes rab rgyal mtshan la / dad ldan slob ma'i 'ga'i bskul na ngor / dben gnas sman ri'i khrod du sbyar ba dge'o

item.tib: spyi bsgrub gsang sngags bsgrubs pa'i dug phyung
dpon gsas rig 'dzin gyi sngun 'gro thar glud gyis bsgangs cha
rin po che spyi spungs zhi khro sngun 'gro dang rgyan bkod rgyas pas
dbal gsas rngam pa'i las rim 'khor lo drug gi bskyed rim mngon rtogs
khro bo dbal gsas rngam pas skyabs sems
item.coloph: theg pa 'di nas spyan drangs shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'o … [fol. 4?v8, p. 119v9] 'di ltar rgyal rigs bru yi gsol debs 'di ni mnyam med rin po che bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis seng stag [seng shag??] rgyal ba'i grub gnas nas sbyar ba rdzogs so

item.tib: snyan rgyud a gsal gyis 'phrin las
spyi spungs bskor gsum gyi yang bcud dbal gsas rngam pa'i las rim gzhung gi phrin las
dbal gsas rngam pa'i las rim gyis 'phrin las
item.coloph: gsang sngags rgyud pa'i bla ma'i rgyud phyag rin chen 'phreng rgyud zhes bya ba 'dis / 'dod gdung can gyi bskul ba dang / rang gis bla ma'i yon tan rjes su rtan pa dang / rig 'dzin gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i byin rlabs dag ci bzhin du / ba dkor btsun pa rin chen blo gros kyis / shar zang ri mgur du sbyar ba'i dge legs 'phel rgyas shog …

item.tib: dbal gsas rngam pa'i bsgrub gzhung sku gsung thugs ki gsang bsgrub
item.coloph: sprul sku mnyam med dbyil ston gyi / sa pho stag lo la rgyung srub brag nas ston zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad yos bu'i nyi ma la / bon gyi dngos grub rnyed nas 'gro don mdzad pa la / 'dul mos pa'i byang chub sems bskyed de / 'gro ba'i don du 'a bon bdag gis zhus so / shog ser nyid las bshus shing gter dpe ci bzhin byas nas dag par bris

item.tib: spyi spungs skor gsum nang nas yang bcud zhi khro'i rgyud bskong rin chen spungs pa
item.coloph: tshul 'di ni / theg sgo gang la yang ma 'gag pa / phyi nang gsang gsum tshig don ma lus par rdzogs pa thugs su chud pa / sprul sku 'gro ba'i don la byon pas / 'a zha blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis g.yas ru dben sar du sbyar ba'o …

item.tib: zhi ba a gsal gyi bskang ba mkha' khyab kun 'byung nor bu'i gter chen
item.coloph: kun ru [~tu] bzang po rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i bsgrub pa la / zhi ba a gsal khol du phyung ba yi / chag nyams 'gal 'grum sprub bskang ba'i phyir / mkha' khyab kun 'byung nor bu gter chen zhes bya ba 'di / bla chen po dran pa nam mkha' thugs dam skang chen dmu tsha gyer med kyi dngos grub / sprul sku blo ldan snying po'i snyan rgyud / phyi rabs 'gro ba sems can gyi don du mdzad ba'o …

item.tib: dbal gsas las rim gyis bskang ba
item.coloph: dbal gsas zhi khro'i bskang ba zhes bya ba / phya tshes g.yang blan bra dang rtags gsol btab / lhag gzhung gis gnad snyogs / dbal gsas zhi khro'i bskang ba / gshen gsang ba 'dus pa'i phyi rab gshen gyis don du bkod pa'o… [6v, tiny difficult-to-read letters:] bod rgyal lha yi gdung sog [~sob] sidhi mtshan / gong gis dgos nyis pa'i bskul ba gnong / bris mkhan legs po nyams [??] rtog dug 'jom ming / de bzhin dag par bris shing bon bstan la [… illeg.] 'od gsal gdung las grub pa'i dbra rigs khong si dhi zhug dri dbon dngos grub phun tshogs la rnam 'jom … gis bris so

gyer spungs dran pa nam mkha'i lung don / stang chen dmu tsa gyer med kyi snyan rgyud / sprul sku blo ldan snying po'i dngos grub / rje[s] 'jugs las ldan skyes bu'i bgol byang / phyi rabs bsgrub pa bo'i spyod yul / dam can bsrings rnams kyis phrin las u tra sigs … phyi dus las ldan gyis gshen po blo ldan snying po snyan du brgyud pa mi nub dar ba'i brgyud lags so. [larger letters, new line:] mnga' gsol lo

item.tib: dam can rgya mtsho'i mkha' la rang bzhin mnga' gsol
bon skyong spyi yis bka' skyong rnams la dus rgyun gyis gtor ma btang thabs
dbal gsas rngam pa'i yang gsang drag gzhung brtsod bzlog gyi gzhung
item.coloph: bla chen dran pa nam mkha'i / phyi rabs don du dpang bzlog 'di nyid bstan / dun tse mag du ma shor bar / yum sras lnga la gnyer du gtad / mang mkhar la gter du sbas / dpon gsas khyung rgod rtsal gyi mang mkhar la bton pa'o / de nas rims kyi brgyud pa'o …

item.tib: dbal gsas las mtha' bsad pa'i las drug
item.coloph: gsad pa las drug gi dmig thun 'di / skri ston bsam gtan rgyal mtshan bkod pa'o / 'di med [mdzad?] dang / don ma rtogs pa'i 'phrul gshen rnams skye bo shan pa dang 'dra'o / tha ram rgya nag mi shes sngags pa snying rje / bla yid sems gsum mi shes 'dren ston snyings rje …

item.tib: khro bo sku gsungs thugs kyi rngams bzlogs
gsas mkhar rin po che spyi spungs mdel kha gsang ba'i tan tra bsrung ba'i go cha a dkar gsang ba
item.coloph: gsas mkhar rin po che spyi spungs mdel kha gsang ba'i tan tra las bsrung ba'i go cha bstan pa'o / 'chi med gshen gsum gyi gdung don / sde brgyad gyi phyag len / lha klu mi gsum snang mdog dang bzhi la rgyud do / de lha'i gshen gsum / de zhang zhung gshen gsum / de rgya bod sgom gshen gsum / des phrom bod zhang zhung gsum / de so ldeng mi nyag gsum / de dran pa nam mkha' / de stang chen dmu tsha gyer med / phyi rabs kyi las ldan nam mkha' rin chen / de rims par brgyud nas da lta nya [~bdag] la'o …

item.tib: dbal gsas than bzlog
item.coloph: dbal gsas kyi than zlog sgron pa legs so …

item.tib: dbal gsas drag bzlogs
chung sri 'gugs las
drag po me lha skyabs 'gro bskyed rim
item.coloph: gshen gyi drang srong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyi dpal ldan mkhar sna ru sbyar ba dge'o

item.tib: drag po skor gsum gyis 'phrin las … sgong dril me'i lha
me lha
dbal gsas drag po dgu skor
item.coloph: dra ba dmar nag gis rgyud las / drag po las kyis 'phrin las rnams pa bdun gyis bstan te …

item.tib: las rim me mchod ma mo spyi mthun gyis rgyud las sbyin bsregs dregs po dgu skor
item.coloph: srin po dha sha 'gre ba bsgral ba'i sbyin bsregs yin no / dbal bon stag la me 'bar gyis mdzad pa'o // bla chen dran pa nam mkha'i gter du sbas / lhun grub thogs med kyi gter nas bton pa'o sems can 'gro ba'i dpal du shog …

item.tib: drag bzlogs zor las dgu pa
item.coloph: zor las dgu pa

item.tib: dbang shi ri log gis sgron me bdud rtsi sdugs pa
item.coloph: shi ri log dbang gis sgrom na'i [~sgron me'i] bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gshen gyi drang srong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis sman ri'i [---] khrod du sbyar ba'o …

item.tib: ka ba nag po man ngag rtsa ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: dpe rgan 'di'i rgyud pa ni / 'gar ston jo sras nyi ma rtse la / tshul byung dad tshul gnyis kyis zhus / de la 'a zha dbal sgom yab sras gnyis kyis zhus / de la bdag gsa' bod rang gi zhus / shog ser cho bo la zhal bshus / dpe 'di zhe tsha yin / … ka ba nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u sum cu dgu pa 'di bzhengs mkhan / dam pa g.yung drung tshul khrims dbang rgyal gyis bka' gnang bab tshe 'tsho byed zhar bsod ris

item.tib: nyon mongs rang grol dug lnga rtsad gcod kyi rgyud
item.coloph: dbal phur nag po'i rgyud / bla ma khu tshas bton / rong pa 'gar la bab / mkhas btsun rnams la rgyud / las 'phro can la 'chang / jo 'bum gnyer gyis bris / … dbal phur nyon mongs rang grol rgyud / 'di spyang sprul pa sku yi mchog / bsod nams dar rgyas bka' gnang bzhin / yi ge pa ni she wer

item.tib: ri rong nag po'i rgyud
me ri 'bar ba'i rgyud
sha 'bal nag po'i rgyud
item.coloph: sha 'bal nag po gsang ba ngan sngags 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba… spa gro'i gter shog las / ja bo skal ldan shes rab kyis zhus / bshus / de la me ston gyis / de la dkyil ston gyis / de la bdag gis zhus / … dam pa g.yung drung tshul khrims dbang rgyal gyis / dbal phur sha 'bal rgyud yig 'bri dgos zhes / bka' gnang spyi bor phebs tshe 'tsho byed nges [~ngas] / ma bzhin bu la phabs / [snang zhig bstan pa tshul khrims gyi phyag dpe'o]

item.tib: rgya mdud 'bar ba srung ma'i rgyud
item.coloph: spa dro'i gter ma 'o / skyabs mgon dam pa g.yung drung tshul khrims dbang rgyal gyi brten bzhengs du bris dgos bka' gnang spyi bor phebs tshe 'tsho byed she wer ming des bris ngan rang gsal 'di snang ston gyi ma dpe bzhin bshus pa'o

item.tib: chu srin rngams pa pho nya'i rgyud
item.coloph: spa dro'i gter ma 'o / g.yung drung tshul khrims dbang rgyal gyi bskul ngor gso byed bsod rgyal gyis / lcags stag lo zla tshes la bris…

item.tib: 'jig rten phung byed las mkhan gyi rgyud
item.coloph: spa dro'i gter ma 'o / dam pa g.yung drung tshul khrims dbang rgyal gyi bzhengs pa'i phyag dpe bri dgos bka' gnang tshe / snang ston ma bzhin 'tsho byed bsod ming gi bris

item.tib: khams gsum kun bsgrol gyi rgyud
item.coloph: dbal phur rgyud dgus phyag dpe 'di / be ro'i rnam sprul pur khe'i mtshan can gyi / bka' gnang phebs tshe snang ston ma bzhin du / yi ge pa ni she tshu wer zhi'o /

item.tib: don bsdus rtsa ba'i 'grel chen zhes bya ba'i gzhung don nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bshad 'grel dbal phur drag po'i gting rdzogs
item.coloph: bla ma khu tsha zla 'od 'bar gyis dbal phur nag po'i bon spa dro gcal nas bton / rong ba 'gar khro rgyal la bab / dbus pa rgya jo bsod la gnang / zangs btsun grags pas zhus / de nas rim par rgyud nyang ston sher bzang la yon tan bdag gis zhus

item.tib: 'bum gzungs mdo gsum byams ma'i bon spyod
item.coloph: phyis khro tshang 'brug lhas zar gyis stag sna dang rtse sding yang dben nas gter du drangs te dmyal ston gzhon 'bum la sogs la gnang ba'o…

item.tib: mdo g.yung drung klong rgyas kyi skyabs 'gro
dbyings bskyed

item.coloph: rgyas pa don lnga log tu bzhugs shing / nyung bsdus ngag yongs su gtong ba'i ched du skyabs kyi ston pas sbyar ba dge legs 'phel bar shog …

item.tib: gshen rab kyis phrin las bco brgyad kyi don bstan pa'i mdo g.yung drung klong rgyas cho ga
item.coloph: 'gro ba'i don du phrin las bco brgyad kyi bon bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o …

item.tib: bde bar gshegs pa stong rtsa brgyad kyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo
zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen mo'i rgyud las, zas gtad snang ba kun 'phel
item.coloph: de ltar zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus las / zas gtad snang kun 'phel zhes bya ba / dmu gshen lhun grub rgyal po'i [~pos] bskur [~bskul] ba'i ngor / thos chung smon rgyal mu la bdag gis sbyar / dge bas 'gro rnams sangs rgyas thob par shog / lcags phag zla ba bcu gcig pa'i tshes la gdan sa dpal gyi steng chen du brtsams pa dge'o…

item.tib: yid bzhin nor bu'i smon lam rnam dag
item.coloph: ces pa 'di ni skye sgo gcod pa nas byung ba bcas / smon lam 'dus pa rnams rdzogs so // ces pa 'di yang 'di phyi nang la phan pa'i phyir du bde ldan smin grol bkra shis 'khyil gyi sgom gra ru par du bsgrub pa'o

item.tib: bdud zlog
bzlas chog rin chen sgron ma'i 'phro 'du
item.coloph: ces bsam pa bzang po'i gros kyi rin chen sgron ma'i mgur ma pha ma'i drin gsob tshul 'di ni / bdag gi ma'i spun zla drom btsun tshul bstan gyi ma yum shi ba'i rkyen bskul nas / lhag bsam rnam par dag pa'i dge sdongs su thos chung bsod phun ming gis dge sbyong du thun mtshams su bgyis pa'o … [7v5] ces pa 'di yang gnas 'dren las gud du phyung ba'o / bkra shis

item.tib: 'khrungs sa nyer gsum smon lam dkar po'i 'phreng ba
item.coloph: ces pa 'di yang bag chags rang grol gyi gsol 'debs 'khrungs sa nyer gsum smon lam padma bkod pa'i phreng ba rdzogs so / bkra shis

item.tib: sangs rgyas smon lam mtha' yas smon tshig bzlas chog rin chen sgron ma'i mgur ma mthong ba don ldan
item.coloph: zhes pa tri'i mgur ma mthong ba don ldan ni / bdag ma re ltos ser skya sngags 'chang dga' zhis bon spyod yan lag la thun mtshams su thos chung bsod phun ming gis bgyis pa'o // bkra shis

item.tib: ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbang tshogs bsgrub pa'i phrin las kyi zin ris pa ku la'i do shal
item.coloph: zhes ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbang tshogs bsgrub pa'i phrin las kyi zin ris pa ku la'i do shal 'di nyid mched grogs pradznya pegs ta dang mkhas grub rgya mtsho zung gi dgyes bzhed du sngags rgan 'jigs med gling ming gis go bde nyung bsdus su bgyis pa dge'o

item.tib: dug phyung rig 'dzin tshan khrus dkar bgegs gta' chen
bar phud gser skyems kha bskang mdor bsdus
thar glud skong tshogs
gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi phyag bzhes nyi ma'i 'khor lo
item.coloph: de ltar gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi lag len nyi ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba / bstan pa'i gtsug rgyan chen po gshen chen po gtsug phud 'od zer gyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa'i gshen gyi btsun pa rnam dag 'od zer gyis khri brten nor bu rtse nas sbyar ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi sgrib sel snang ba dpal gyi chu zla bdud rtsi chu rgyun
item.coloph: snang ba dpal gyi chu zla bdud rtsi chu rgyun zhes bya ba / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis / byang gi sa gnas rgyal gyi sa bkod ces bya ba'i nang du brtsams pa dge legs 'phel / shing byi zla ba bzhi pa'i tshes gsum la bris / …

item.tib: gsang mchog lha sum brgya drug cu'i mngon rtogs thugs rje nyi ma'i 'od zer
item.coloph: ma rgyud kyi mngon rtogs thugs rje nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'di / rgyud 'grel dang gshen nyi ma'i phyag len gtsor bzungs nas / bstan pa'i mnga' bdag gshen ston gtsug phud 'od zer gyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa'i / btsun pa rnam dag 'od zer gyis khri rten nor bu'i rtse nas sbyar pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: bla ma'i sgrub pa bsam 'phel nor bu'i rgyan
item.coloph: de ltar rnam dag 'gyur med yan lag bdun pa 'di / mnyam med skyes mchog 'dul ba rgyal mtshan gyis / dpon gsas bla ma mya ngan 'das dus su bstod tshig dbyangs dang bcas nas bstod pa'o

item.tib: gsang mchog ma rgyud kyi lha sum brgya drug cu'i sgrub pa'i gzhung
item.coloph: rgyal gshen mi lus bsam legs kyis grub pa bsnyems pa yang gsang gi rgyud do / … dung phor gter nas gu ru rnon rtses bton pa'i dar dkar ngos nas gnyal ston gzhon nu 'bum gyis bris nas dag par gtugs so

item.tib: gter bdag bya ra ma drug gi bskul ba 'jigs med seng ge'i sgra dbyangs
item.coloph: lam gyi bya ra ma drug bskul ba 'di / lam zhugs rnal 'byor nam mkha' dbang ldan (rab brnga dpon slob) gyis / … lam gyi dmigs bu kun grol grags pas dge

item.tib: dpal mgon drag bskul nyung 'dus
item.coloph: ces pa'i tshul 'di ni dmu gshen gtsug phud 'od zer gyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa'i / gshen gyi btsun pa rnam dag 'od zer gyis khri rten nor bu'i yang rtse ru sbyar ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: ma rgyud tshogs lhag bskul zhing bcol ba'i las phrin tsi rta snying gi phreng ba
item.coloph: de ltar ma rgyud tshogs lhag bskul zhing bcol ba'i las phrin tsi rta snying gi phreng ba zhes bya ba / yul ngan rkyen dbang 'khros pa'i tshe na / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis / byang gi sa gnas su brtsams …

item.tib: gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi dngos grub
mkha' 'gying tshe sgrub kyi mngon rtogs bdud rtsi chu rgyun
item.coloph: de ltar mkha' 'gying tshe sgrub kyi mngon rtogs bdud rtsi chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di btsun pa rnam dag 'od zer gyis sbyar ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: mkha' 'gying rigs lnga'i tshe sgrub g.yung drung lu gu rgyud kyi gter phreng
item.coloph: mkha' 'gying rigs lnga'i tshe sgrub g.yung drung lu gu rgyud kyi gter phreng zhes bya ba / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis lcags mo byi ba'i lor / zla ba dang po'i tshes bcu'i nyin dang [ra] khyung rdzong gi mdun du brtsams pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: theg chen lta ba'i gshen glu gsungs pa'i dbu phyogs
gsang sngags smon lam gdab par bya ba 'brug chen sgra rgyal tshangs dbyangs
item.coloph: ces gsang sngags kyi smon lam 'brug chen sgrogs pa'i sgra rgyal tshangs dbyangs zhes bya ba / dmu rigs nyi ma'i ming can gyis sa bya'i lo cho 'phrul chen po'i zla'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin 'bring mtshams gshen gyi gzim khang du brtsams pa dge legs …

item.tib: gsang sngags smon lam
item.coloph: ces pa 'di ni bya btang ba rnal 'byor tshul khrims dpal bzang gis … sbyar pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gsang ba'i grub chen brgyad cu'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i yan lag mkha' gsang rol pa'i gter chen
item.coloph: grub chen brgyad cu'i phyag mchod dang / tshogs kyi bya thabs lag len khyad par can / rang gzhung nges par gsal bar ston byed 'di / dmu rgyal gsang bdag nyi ma'i ming can te / de yis gsal bar byas nas yi ger bkod / … dmu rgyal rnal 'byor ba dge ba'i bshes gnyen blo gsal mchog tu gyur pa lcogs tsha smon lam rgyal mtshan gyis bskul ba'i don du / … dge sding spel chen gyi mngon dga'i gnas su brtsams te / lcags sbrul zla ba bcu pa'i tshes bcu'i nyin dge legs 'phel

item.tib: ma rgyud grub chen sman gyi kha skong
item.margin: grub chen sman gyi kha skong

item.tib: mchod pa bcu drug dga' dbang gter gyi tshom bu
item.coloph: gsang sngags ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i mchod pa bcu drug pa dga' dbyang gter gyi tshom bu zhes bya ba / dmu rigs rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis / rta sgo lha btsan gyi mdun du ri khrod pa chen po bzhugs pa'i gnas mdun lcags rta zla ba bcu pa'i tshes gsum gyi nyin pad mo gang bzang zhol du bris brtsams pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: phyag mchod kyi rim pa sgyu skar rgyan gyi phreng ba
item.coloph: ces gsang yum rnams kyi bstod pa rdzogs so / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha tshogs bsgrubs shing grub pa mnga' bsnyems pa'i / gsang ba'i grub chen brgyad cu'i mdzad phrin mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i rlabs / gsang bdag dmu dbang chen po'i bshad byang rgyu skar 'phreng ba 'di / gsang sngags rjes 'jug sgrub smon dad ldan bdag gis bzhengs / 'di bzhengs dge rtsa mkha' khyab sems can yongs la bsngo

item.tib: gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi thugs dam rgyud bskul
item.coloph: gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi thugs dam rgyud bskul zhes bya ba 'di ni / gshen chen po gtsug phud 'od zer gyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa'i btsun pa rnam dag 'od zer gyis khri brten nor bu rtser sbyar ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: gsang sngags ma rgyud thugs rje nyi ma'i bskang bshags
item.coloph: gsang sngags la dam tshig bshags sbyong gnad che ba'i phyir / rgyal rigs kyi gshen po mi lus bsam legs kyis mdzad pa ste / … bskang bshags 'di rta nag dung phor nas gu ru rnon rtses gter nas bton te / bla ma gzhon nu 'bum la bon skal du gnang ba'o

item.tib: ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dam tshig gi bshags byang
item.coloph: gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi rgyud chen nyid dang / 'grel ba dang / mi lus bsam legs nyid kyis mdzad pa rnams legs par bsdebs nas rang gzhan gyi don du tshogs rdzogs phyir dmu rigs nyi ma'i ming can gyis bris pa dge legs 'phel bar shog

item.tib: gsang sngags dkyil 'khor bcu drug pa'i bskang bshags rin chen sgron me
item.coloph: bskang bshags rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba / rang gzhung dkyil 'khor stong dang drug brgyar nges pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba dmu rgyal nyi ma'i ming can gyis / byang gi sa gnas rnams klu btsan so 'du ba'i sa gnas / gnam snang gyog po zhes bya ba'i sgar thog tu brtsams pa …

item.tib: dpal mgon lcam dral brgyad kyi dur khrod gnas bskang
dpal mgon drag po'i bskul 'phrin thog mda' 'bar ba
item.coloph: dmu rigs sngags 'chang nyi ma'i ming can gyis brtsams pa …

item.tib: gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi sgrub pa'i sgo dbye ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa
gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi bdag 'jug rnal 'byor rin po che'i 'phreng ba
item.coloph: de ltar gsang sngags ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i bdag 'jug nye bar ston pa'i zab lam rnal 'byor rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba / rgyud gzhung las legs par btus te / … dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis / khri brtan nor bu'i rtser brtsams pa dge legs 'phel / … me glang zla ba bcu pa'i tshes brgyad la dge

item.tib: gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi rgyan mchod phyag rgya dbang 'khor lo
item.coloph: ces gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi phyag mchod 'bul ba / phyag rgya dbang po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba / byang gi sa gnas dar ma nyin / kre ta gnam mtsho zhes bya ba'i mdun du / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i dbang pos brtsams pa sa stag zla ba bdun pa'i nyer lnga'i nyin dge legs 'phel

item.tib: kye ma'i sbyin sreg gi mngon rtogs me'i 'khor lo
yum chen kye ma 'od mtsho'i mkha' 'gro las sbyor gyi sbyin sreg nor bu'i 'od 'bar
item.coloph: de ltar dbang gi las sbyor kye ma 'od mtsho yum gyi sbyin sreg dngos grub nor bu 'od 'bar zhes bya ba dmu rgyal nyi ma'i ming can gyis sbyar pa'o

item.tib: 'khang tshig gnad nas bskul ba'i las bcol
item.coloph: 'khang ba'i tshig gis gnad nas bskul ba'i las bcol / me tog bung ba rol ba'i brda skad ces bya ba / … dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming dpe / khri brten nor bu'i rtser brtsams pas … lcags yos zla ba brgyad pa'i nyer gcig gi nyin grub pa dge legs byon

item.tib: sngags 'chang gi mtshon cha thog mda' dgu bsgril
item.coloph: de ltar brnag pa'i dgra bo la dmod mo drag po'i me dpung thog mda' dgu bsgril zhes bya ba / … dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis brtsams

item.tib: sngags 'tshol thog mda'i thal mo brdab chog gser gyi spu gri'i man ngag
item.coloph: las mtha' bcol ba'i mtha' brdul dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming gis bsdeb pa dge'o

item.tib: bon gyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong nas / phyi nang gsang gsum gzungs sde rin chen phreng / dkar chag yi ge gsal byed me long
item.coloph: dang bcas pa le'u stong dang rtsa brgyad 'di / mi 'chug grangs su bcas pa'i dkar chab 'di / bru chen rgyal ba skyabs ston ratna rje / de'i rjes 'jug [mchan: zhu g.yas] rnam rgyal grags pa ku bu lo / drin can dam pa de'i zhabs btud spyi bor blangs / dge tshul phran gyis dkar chab yi ge 'di / ris su bkod pa dge ba de yis mthus / rgyal bstan 'dzin pa'i gshen gyi drang srong sde / bslab gsum yang smin [fol. 8v] 'gro ba'i don byed shog // … ces pas dkar chab rin chen phreng ba 'di yi nang du / snga phyis bla ma so so'i ma tshangs zur tsam mkhas dbang mu las bgyis pa la sogs pa'i gzungs phran stong rtsa gcig pas yang blon rigs kyi drang srong kun bzang rgyal mtshan gyis phyag dpe 'di las zhal bshus pa'o …

item.tib: stong nyid khyab bdal kun tu bzang // stong zhing bdag med kun la snang // stong gsum khyab pa'i ston par sprul // stobs chen sangs rgyas mtshan 'bum gzungs

rgyal rigs sras 'khrungs sum brgya'i sgra skad bsgyur / bod yul gnas su rgyud gsum mdzod la dbang / g.yung drung bon la bslab gsum rnam par dag / gsang gsum mdzod lnga'i mdo sngags pandi ta / mdo 'bum legs bshad gzungs sngags zab mo
gangs can mkhas pa'i skyabs mgon ston pa rje / 'gro ba'i gtsug rgyan rin chen 'od stong 'bar / mun pa'i tsha zer mdo gzungs don rnams bsdus / lhag pa'i snying po gzungs mchog dam pa
gshen rab chen po 'gro ba'i mgon / rnam par rgyal ba'i phywa yi g.yang / dpal mgon gtso bo 'dod pa dbang / 'gyur med phya g.yang don gzungs
rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas yongs kyi gtso / rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo gzungs dang / rnam bshad le'u drug cu 'di / rnam rgyal grags pa'i nye bar bsdus
item.coloph: sangs rgyas ston pa'i bka' rin po che 'di bzhengs pa'i yon bdag la ka'i khang stod bstan 'dzin lhun grub kyi sems bskyed rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas sgrub pa'i yan lag sogs 'gro ba sems can kun la phan pa dang bde ba'i yon tan yongs su sbyor par gyur cig / drung ming pa rab wer klu phyug gis rang lo bdun cu rtsa lnga'i thog tu bris pas dbang po yan lag thams cad yun tsam rgyud pa'i dbang gi bris skyon lhag chad nyes 'gal mchis tshad rtsa gsum lha la mtho lo bshags so / …

item.tib: yod khams dkar la nyi zla dkar / dkar phyogs dge la srid pa'i lha / mun khams nag la mun pa nag / gdon bcu nag po 'dul ba'i gzungs
rgyal 'phags rgyal sa rgya mtsho'i dbus / rgyal rigs klu rgyal thar par drangs / rgyal bstan gsal ba'i gsas khang bzhengs / rgyud rgyal man ngag gzungs chen
stong gsum 'jig rten dbang ba yis / chen po stobs la sa yi bdag / mchod pa'i yang bcud gzungs kyi sde / kun 'dus nor bu 'bar ba
theg pa yang rtse rgyal ba'i yum / gser mdog sa trig er ti sangs / rnam dag sras yum gzungs kyi sde / pad+ma dkar po'i phreng ba
gshen gyi mdzad pa brgya yi yang / 'khrungs rabs rnam par thar pa la / rigs sngags gzungs sde chen po nas / mdo gzungs le'u gsum pa
rigs brgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dus pa'i rgyud / dbyings shes zab lam a dkar sngags / thabs shes mngon rol chab dkar bon / zab gces bsdus gzungs phreng ba
lung rig bstan pa'i ba dan srid rtser phyar / las dbang sman mo chab dkar sngags kyi sde / lung rgyud ma chad shel dkar 'phreng rgyus lha / las ldan spyod pa'i gzungs mchog 'di kho na
item.coloph: ces pas lung rig bstan pa'i gtsug rgyan bru ston rgyal ba'i dgongs 'dus gtsor bzhag / rgyal ba gnyis pa skyabs ston ratna khi khar gyis lhan du 'thab pa'i dge legs 'phel …

item.tib: bskal bzang grangs med tshe lo yi / khri thub gsang ba tshe yi snying / sgrub chog zab mo'i gdam pa 'di / gzungs kyi rgyal po kho nar 'o
yi ge rgyal po ye nas byung / ye shes lnga ldan zhing khams dkar / ye nas gsal ba yi ge'i sgra / ye 'byung snying po mdo lnga'i gzungs
'phen yul 'bum gzungs phyi yi sde / 'phen byed zab lam sngags kyi 'bum / 'phen dar longs spyod za ma tog / phan byed mdo gzungs legs bshad
mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i yang snying bcud / mkha' spyod gang chen rol pa yin / mkha' 'gro zab lam sde lnga'i gzungs / mkha' dbyings bde chen brgyud thob
zab rgya dgongs 'dus sgron ma las / sgrib sbyongs yi ge brgya ba'i gzungs / ghu ru pad+ma g.yung drung bhi dhi da'i / zab 'dus gzungs sna brgya ba e ma ho
bskal stong sangs rgyas brgyad stong gis / thugs bstan lnga brgya'i gdung tshab gshen / dran pa nam mkha'i mdog 'chang ba'i / zab gsang gzungs mchog rgyal po
rig 'dzin chen po sbas pa'i sku / rig gnas dbang phyug tshe la dbang / rig pa rang gsal 'dzin pa'i gshen / rang grol gzungs kyi rgyal po
ma mo yum chen rgyal ba'i ma / ma mo'i gtso mo ma mchog ma / mi dang klu gnyan phyogs skyong 'dul / ma rgyud gzungs kyi snying khu bzhugs
rig 'dzin gsang ba'i dbang 'bum las / rig pa brjid dang ldan pa'i phyir / rig 'dzin sku gsung thugs gsum gyis / rang grol gzungs kyi yi ge 'di 'od ldan 'bar mas bkod pa
mkha' 'gro mdzad drug man ngag las / mkha' 'gro ma sring dam can rnams / mkha' spyod mkha' 'gro 'bum dang bcas / mkha' 'gro'i snying thig gzungs mchog
lha mo chen mo gnam gyi phyi / nyi zla skyabs mdzod gung gi brgyan / gza' bdud sgrol mdzad mched brgyad sprul / khyab 'jug sgral ba spyi'i gzungs
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi che ba'i yon tan mtha' yas pa rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i nang nas mtsham 'bum gra ba rtse lnga'i gzungs
gsang sngags gsang ba'i bang mdzod nas / gsang ba'i man ngag rgyal po ste / gsang brgya'i don bsdus zab mo'i lam / gsang gzungs man ngag cha drug
lung na med pa'i lha mo gre ma lnga / las kyi dbang gis bod kyi yul du dar / legs bshad gzungs kyi snying po 'di kho na
byang phyogs gnod sbyin nor gyi gling / skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam mang thos / nor lha mched brgyad sras dang bcas / rta nor dre'u ra lug bong bu gzungs
sa bdag rgyal po sa yi rje / sa sna lnga la dbang bsgyur ba / sa bdag 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal
lo yi rgyal po keg rigs dang / lam gyi bar chod bzlog pa'i phyir / las kyi kha tshar rmo mdel gzungs / log 'dren ma lus 'joms mdzad
dri med rnam dag phyi yi rgyud / 'jig rten spyod pa'i dpal gyi mgon / bdun cu rtsa lnga'i yang snying gzungs / 'gro kun phan bde legs bshad
item.coloph: bsngo ba legs bshad kyis mthar rgyan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o // phyi bar gsang gsum gzungs kyi don bsdus pa 'di yang / sngon chad gong ma bru ston rgyal ba dang / bar du skyabs ston rin chen 'od zer [illeg.] / gzungs ma tshangs kha sk[o]ngs nyung 'dus 'di / zhu yi rgyud 'dzin ku su lo ba yis / dri med lhan skyes sgrub pa'i thun 'tshams su / gnas mchog skyid mkhar stod phug brag nang du / mdo rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyud sde dang / mdo gzungs 'phran bu mang po'i nang nas bsdus …

item.tib: phyi nang gsang ba'i gzungs 'dus bklag thabs gsal byed 'phrul sgron
sngags kyi mdo 'dur rin chen phreng ba mu cho khroms 'dur gyi bca' thabs lag len
item.coloph: zhes pa 'di yang bkra shis smin grol khrod du bsgres rgan dznyā na hra dha'i lag rtsed du bris pa mdo smad rgyam khyung dge bshes tshang gi lugs so

item.tib: drag po gshed brdung

sngags kyi mdo 'dur rin chen phreng ba mu cho'i khroms 'dur chen mo las g.yang gzhi'i srid gshed dbang bsdud sa bdag bcos pa
gshen po dur sa'i mdun du chas pa

sngags kyi mdo 'dur rin chen phreng ba mo cho'i khroms 'dur chen mo las lha bon gshen gsum gyer bzhengs kyi dbu

sngags kyi mdo 'dur rin chen phreng ba mu cho'i khroms 'dur chen mo las tshe 'das bla glud lan chags mjal ba
item.coloph: rig 'dzin bla chen gyi bkod pa / spa bro'i gter ma'o

tshe 'das sngags kyi mdo 'dur rin chen phreng ba mu cho'i khroms 'dur chen mo las yang dag don gyi rtsi gsol
sngags kyi mdo 'dur rin chen phreng ba mu cho'i khroms 'dur chen mo las tshe 'das 'dod dgu longs spyod gtad pa

sa mig sprad pa

gsas mkhar rin po che spyi spungs kyis las mtha' rdzu 'phrul nyi zer zhags pa'i 'dur las srid gshen 'gug pa'i mtshan bon
sngags kyi mdo 'dur rin chen phreng ba mu cho'i khroms 'dur chen mo las rin chen phreng gzhung gi mtshan bon dbal tshogs bskul ba
dams nyams srogs gi spu gri 'gugs las zab mo brnags pa'i las byang
sa bdag gtod sprug gis brjed tho yi ge gsal ba'i me long
sa bdag gtad sprugs kyi bca' thabs
gtad sprug pho brang sgu bsgrub yi sngon 'gro sa bslangs thig gdab tshon bkye bum bkod
sa bdag gtad sprugs ris rab lto bshags bcos gzhungs chen mo
mtsho dang chu mig rnams kyi sgo dbye
sa bdag bcos gzhungs las gtad sprug gi dbang bskur
gtad sprug gi sa bdag snying g.yang bskyabs pa
sa bdag gtad sprug gis klu chog gtor ma 'bul ba
gtad sprug gis man ngag kha bskangs gser gyi dum bu mu tig ma
mu tig ma'i khram gtad
mu tig ma las gshegs bskyod
gtad sprug rgya mtsho'i gting bskrugs mu tig ma
gtad sprug gi bkor nor 'bul ba dang mchod rdzas 'bul ba
mu tig ma las sgo dbye
klu mchod yang dag ma lha bon gyis bka'
klu gnyan sa bdag gtod dang gzhi'i mdo las klu cog pho brang gling dgu ma
gta sprug gi bkra shis
klu chog gsal byed me long bdud rtsi gso ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: klu sgrub man ngag gsal byed me long 'di / lung don (spyan 'dren gtsug phud kyi lung don man ngag go) ye shes snying po'i gsungs ste dran pas zhus / de la rig 'dzin sprul sku tshe dbang rig 'dzin gyis zhus / de la dam pa rang grol gyis zhus

item.tib: gtad sprug gi sder chog
gtad sprug gi klu brgyad bsgrub pa
dbal khyung nag po'i mngon rtogs
dbal gsas khyung nag gis cha lag nor bu bang mdzod / khyung nag gi cha lag
dbal gsas khyung nag gi bsgrub gzhung
dbal gsas rngam pa'i khyung nag gi dbang khrid gsal byed me long
gtad sprug gi bsrung gyer
gtad pa 'bum bzlog klu yi spu gri
gab pa gsang mchog thugs la gab rgya
sbal nag sdig pa'i rgyud las mu stegs drag gtad
khram bdag thams cad byad thag bzhi ba'i bskyed rim dang spyen 'dren
gtad sprug gi khram phyes bcu pa
gtad sprug gi khram phyes bcu gsum pa
gtad sprug gi byad thags bcad pa
gtad sprug gis gtad khram bcu gsum pa
khyung chen ldeng ba'i rgyud las gtad sprug gis khyung gis 'phrin las
gtad sprug gi lto sbyor phye ba
gtad sprug gis lto sbyor phyes pa
gtad sprug gis byad ma bsgrad pa
klu bdud kyi gtad sprug
klu bdud nag po'i bsgrub thab bsnol ma dug chu srin sngon mar 'phrin las dug sbal regs chod 'khor lo sdig pa srog len gyis snying gzer slig tso
bla chen dran pa nam mkha'i gtad bkrol gtod sprug lto gsheg 'phrin las
gtad sprug gis khyung bskul
khyung bskangs rin chen phreng ba
bya khyung lding ba'i rgyud las rgya mtsho'i gting bskrug gi skya ba
gtad sprug gis klu bdud gtad sprug gis gzhung bkral
gshen rab khyung gzungs
gtad sprug gis ti ka yang 'grig gi khyung bzlogs
bcing bkrol bla blu
gter chen klu dga'i gter ma klu bdud
gtad sprug gi klu bdud lag gi khram phyes legs pa
gtad sprug gis mnan bkrol
gtod kyis mna' gnyan phye ba
klu gnyan sa bdag gis bcing bkrol
gtad sprug gis gtad bkrol
klu sgrub ye shes snying pos gsungs pa'i gtad bkrol
gtad sprug gsang ba'i gzung
item.coloph: gtad sprug gi yang snying rtsa ba'i gzung 'di / sbar zhabs brag dkar gyi gter ma / khod spung blo gros thog med dngos grub legs so / gong nas rim bzhin brgyud de khro bo rgyal mtshan bdag gis zhus so

item.tib: gtad sprugs gi khyung gzungs dang khyung bzlogs gnyis kyi lo rgyus
mtsho sman rgyal mo'i gur 'dos
sbal nag sdig pa'i rgyud las dgra bo 'phangs pa'i las
sa bdag klu gnyan gtod kyi gtad khrams
gtad sprug gis yas 'gug
ngar yi glud rab bsngo byang
gtad sprug gis khyung bskul dug phyung
gtad sprug gis dug phyung
gtad sprug gis ngar mi bsngo byang
gtad sprug gi nyin thag bcad pa
gtad sprug gi dkar nag dbye gsal gzhi sprug lam bstan
gtad lam bcad pa
khyung chen gtad sprug gis 'khor lo bris thabs le'u dgu ba
rig 'dzin bon bskor gyi zin ris
item.coloph: mched grogs drung mu'i mtshan gyis bskul ba'i ngor phran rmongs mu la'i ming des bris pa la…

item.tib: dug phyung rig 'dzin tshan khrus lha bsang rin chen phreng ba
phyi nang gsang gsum gyi sngags 'grigs
snyan rgyud a gsal 'phrul gyi sgron me zhes bya ba'i 'phrin las
bla ma dgongs 'dus rgya mtsho'i mchod sgrub rin chen gter gyi phreng ba'i rgyud las las byang rnam rgyal khang bzang
bla ma dgongs 'dus rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud las tshogs mchod zad med gter spungs
tshe dbang gsang sgrub kyi mchog khrid dgos 'dod kun 'byung
snyan rgyud rin chen sgron gsal gyi 'phrin las
bod yul ma'i tshogs kyi shog chung
zab mo sku gsung thugs kyi bcud dril sgrub skor
dran pa yab sras kyi bskang ba
bla ma dgongs 'dus rgya mtsho'i mchod bsgrub rin chen gter gyi phring ba'i rgyud las dgyes bskang bkra shis g.yas 'khyil
bla ma rig 'dzin gyi bskang ba
tshe dbang rgya gar ma'i bskang ba
bod yul ma'i bskang bshags mun med snang gsal
bka' srung srid rgyal dpon g.yog gi sgrub thabs dgra srog gcod pa'i spu gri
bla ma'i sgrub pa bsam 'phel nor bu
item.coloph: de ltar rnam dag 'gyur med yan lag bdun pa 'di / mnyam med skyes mchog 'dul ba bru btsun rgyal mtshan gyis / dpon gsas 'a zha blo gros bla ma mya ngan 'das dus su / bstod tshig dbyangs dang bcas nas bstod pa 'o

item.tib: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khams brgyad stong phrag brgya pa
item.coloph: khams brgyad gtan la phab pa stong phrag brgya pa 'di bam po sum brgya drug bcu pa la / tsheg bar dgus bcad pa'i sha lo 'bum phrag tu dag par gzhugs so / u ya / slig tso / dmu rigs gshen chen klu dgas lho mtsho rnga brag dkar nas gdan drangs shing / cog la g.yu skyid la brgyud do / bkra shis so

item.tib: byams ma chen mo rtsa ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: byams ma rtsa ba'i rgyud gl[e]gs bam gcig pa / bam po sum bcu rtsa gcig pa nas / rtsa ba'i mchod pa dbang chog bsgrub thabs mdor bsdus te / bcud phyung nas bstan pa de dang / rgyud gnyis dril ba / byams ma yan lag gi rgyud las las tshogs 'jigs pa myur skyor go cha'i bsgrub pa'o / rje btsun khro tshang 'brug lhas gter tham phyes nas / dmyal ston gzhon nu 'bum la gtad pa legs so / des sgom pa rnam gnyis sogs la brgyud de / kun tu 'phel ba'o

item.tib: byams ma chen mo rtsa ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: rje btsun khro tshang 'brug lhas gter nas bton pa'o / bla ma gzhon la dngos grub tu bab ste / rim gyis brgyud de / da lta rig 'dzin gshen gyi bzung mdo gam shar rdza gro [illeg.] thugs dam rten du bzhengs pa'o

item.tib: mkha' 'gro rin chen gsang skor g.yung drung rig pa'i rgyud
shes rab blo 'phel gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: h+ri nyi'am hring a a a / zhes pa 'di ni / sang rgyas bstan gtso ni / yi gshen seng gzhi la gnang / des sna[ng] ba mdogs can la bshad / de'i ye shes snying po la bshad / de'i mi lus bsam legs la bshad / de'i stong rgyung mthu chen la byin gyis brlabs / de'i sha ri dbu chen la byin gyis brlabs / de'i gyim tsha rma chung la byin gyis brlabs / de'i lce tsha mkhar bu la byin gyis brlabs / des mkha' 'gro shes rab blo 'phel nas dbra btsun shes rab dgongs rgyal la / rgyal ba zhes pa lo dri zhim ldan pa dbyar gsum zla ba'i dkar phyogs rgyal ba gsum pa'i rgyal phur 'khrun sbyor bzang po la mkha' 'gro'i zhal lung ci ltar bzhin bris

item.tib: snang srid gsal ba'i sgron ma / rdzu 'phrul rig pa khu byug gis mdo'
item.coloph: kyai ston pa'i thugs la nges pa'i bcud 'dril ba // yang dag ma nor bden pa'i don 'di ni // bder gshegs bka' la slob dpon mu cho yis // sham po'i rtsa ru bye brag mang po phyes // brgyad khrid bzhi stong so sor gsal bar stan // phyogs bcu'i mkhas pa gshen po grangs med byung // lha klu'i stag gzigs zhang zhung bru sha dang // [162r] rgya gar rgya nag phrom dang tho gar bod // rang rang skad du lo tsas sgra bsgyur nas // phyog[s] bcu kun du dar zhing rgyas par mdzad // rgyal ba'i bka' la brten pa'i bon 'di yang // mu tsa tra ba 'gu hi li spar dang / khri thog bar tsa gsum gyi rka dka' bas bsgyur // leg tang rmangs pa gser thog lce 'byam gyi // phrom dang rgya nag yul du dar ba byas // sad ne ga bu zhang zhung yul du bsgyur // stong brgyung bdag dang mkhas pa'i du [~bu?] gsum gyi // rka [~dka'?] ba spyad cing bod khams gnas su 'ong // 'gro ba'i don du dar cing rgyas par spel // bar du rgyal po'i sems la bdud zhugs nas // log pa'i btsun mo blon po 'phra mas rkyen // dun tse'i 'phrag dog gdub pa'i shed btab cing // bden pa'i don bsnub bon bsgyur la thugs // [162v] bon sde rang rang gnyer blangs so sor bris // gter kha grangs su sbas pa'i bka' bsgros nas // rang rang lus su bsgyur ba'i sgra la sbyar // zab mo bden pa'i bon gyi bcud 'di ni // stong rgyung bdag gis rgyas 'breng [~'bring] bsdus gsum phyes // khyung lung mkhar du rgya shog ldem por bris // khrung khrung khal 'gal rdzu 'phrul gom pas gshegs // bon sde cha gcig lha gnyen g.yas zur la // bkra shis padma gsal ba'i brag khung du // srid pa'i yum la gsang ba'i gnyer gtad nas // bka' rtag g.yung drung rgyas btab gter du sbas // phyi rabs las 'phro can dang 'phrad par shog // khug byug rig pa'i mdo rdzogs s.ho // rgya rgya rgya / smar ro // dge'o / bkra shis / e ma ho // bon nyid bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas // … [163v1] bkra shis gnas mchog sham po lha rtse ru // mkhas pa phul phyin lo pon rnam 'byed gyis // phyogs bcu'i lo tsa bsgyur ba'i bka' gnyer blangs // ston pa'i bka' las bcud bsdus zab mo'i lung // snod bcud skal srid 'khor 'das gtan phebs bon // kun 'byung sgron ma snang srid gsal ba'i mdo' // rigs 'dzin chen pos zhang zhung yul du bstan // stong rgyung mthu chen rdzu 'phrul rtsal chen gyi // 'gro ba'i don la sprul pa du ma'i sgos // bod khams gling du dar zhing rgyas par mdzad // bar du bstan pa'i 'phel 'grib byung dus su // rgyas 'bring sdud gsum rgya shog ldem pa bris // rgyas par snang srid rnam 'byed dag pa'i mdo // [164r] sum rtseg ka mo yang dben gnas su gter // sdud pa kun 'byung dag pa ye bsrid mdzod // gsang ba mtsho rnga brag dkar gnas la gter // 'bring ba rdzu 'phrul khu byug rig pa'i mdo' // lha gshen dbang rgyal gsang ba'i g.yas zur du // brag dmar stag chen 'khros pa 'dra ba'i 'go // dkar la dmar gyis padma'i mdangs chags pa // bkra shis rtags su g.yung drung rgyas btab nas // srid pa'i yum la gnyer gtad gter du sbas // phyi rab dar zhing rgyas pa'i smon lam btabs // // rgya rong se gnyen mu 'od bsnyon pa la // lcag[s] mo glang lo stag zla'i yar tshes su // srid pa'i rgyal mos nges pa'i lung stan na // chu mo glang lo dgun zla ra ba'i // bcu dgu tho reng gsal ba'i dngos grub bsnyems // las grub mkha' 'gros khrid nas gter sgo 'byed // [fol.164v] bdag lus 'od ltar ma lags bya rgod // gsang phug brgyad la yud re rim bzhin bsgrod // klu srin khung bur bon gyi skal thob nas // bse dung gleng gsum kha phyes dos cig blangs // 'gro ba'i don du dad ldan dge spel ba'i // sgo gsum gus btud 'dun pas rab tu bskal // smyug gu bar brgya'i 'bru la rka bas bcad // shog gser dmar smug rgya shog ldem pa'i // zhing la mdzub gang sna la mdzub gsum du // shog dril gnyis la yig 'phreng bzhi bcu gcig // stod smad 'bru len byas cing zhal bshus nas // bon shog dkar la yi ger btab pa dge // 'gal 'khrul gter bdag gnyen la bzod par gsol // dri med zab mo bden pa'i bon 'di yang // dus gsum mi nub nyi ma'i 'od gsal shog // dge'o / dge'o / bkra shis par gyur cig

item.tib: srid pa khams gsum sems can skye 'chi yis mdo
snod rten 'byung ba chags 'jig pa'i mdo
item.coloph: snya li shug [~shu] stag ring gis / bod dang zhang zhung bru sha'i yul dang / stag gzigs gi yul du bon rin po che 'tshol nas bod kyi yul du bstan [113r] pa spel bar dgongs nas / glang po che rta mchog grang ser khyer nas chas so / bod dang zhang zhung dang stag gzig gis bar nas lam 'phrang shin tu rtsub pa dang / mi thar pa'i lam 'gags ni chu srid ma bu dgu 'drol ba dang / bdud khyab pas gshen ri la me bskyel ba'i sol ba'i ri la nyi ma bdun song bas / rkang mgyog gi sgrub pa ldan pas mchod par rtag gzig gi yul du thon / grub pa bsnyem pa'i bon po ni / kha nas gser dzo 'phro ba / lags [~lag?] nas thog 'phong bas / lha srin bran du 'khor [~'khol] ba mchog thun mong gi grub rtags du mar dang ldan pa rnams la / gser la sogs pa'i rin po che phul nas / rgyu 'bras kyi bon la sogs thams cad zhus nas / bod du yongs bsam nas / bya rgod dang / bya glag khrung khrung dang / kang ka bzhi la[s] bkal nas 'ong pas / kang ka la bka' [~bkal] pa'i bon ni / rgya nag gi yul du 'phur te song ngo / rgya nag gi bon po legs rmong po tang rmang po'i phyag tu babs so / phyis [113v] ma gsum po la bkal ba'i bon ni / bod du thon nas de [~da?] lta zhang zhung gis spyod pa'i bon rnams so / li shu stag ring la spyod pa'i dbang med rje la phul / lo tsa ba stag ring gis ye shes yi ge thams cad bon du bsgyur nas btsad po khri srong lde la [!] btsan la phul to / btsan pos zhus pa bon thams cad la rtsis byang dang yang byang re gdab par zhus byas pas / li shus gsungs pa'i bon thams cad la rtsis byang brgyad re dang bcas nas 'dug / de'i nang nas mdo chen po bzhi dang / gshen rab kyis gsungs pa'i bon rnams kyi nang nas kyang snying po ni 'di lta ste / dus gsum ston pa 'byung khung mdo las snga rabs 'das dang ldan pa nas slad kyi bar le'u ni bco brgyad yod par ston / snod rten 'byung ba 'jig rten chags 'jig mdo las / 'jig rten chags dang mnyam par bzhugs / bar du bcu gcig yod par ston / bla med gong [~go] 'phang sgrub pa thabs kyi mdo las / snga rabs 'das dang [114r] 'jig rten bzhugs / bar du nyi shu rtsa drug go / khams sum sems can skye 'chi mdo las / phun sum tshogs nas zlog / gtor bar du drug cu yod par ston / zhes rgyal po la phul nas / bsam yas khri thar [~thang] dur khrod mchod rten dmar po la sbas so / bsam yas kyi lde mig thams cad spung bza' dmar po rgyal gyis 'dzin to / zhib tu le'u dang / rtsis 'byung chen mo'i nang nas gsal lo / shad thams cad gnyis brtsegs yin no / 'bru re chad pa 'dra ba yongs shog ser nang nas yang de 'dra yin no / dpe btsan du byas pa yin no / gshen rab kyis zhal nas gsungs pa'i snod rten 'byung ba'i chags 'jig gi mdo rdzogs so

item.tib: 'dus pa rin po che yi rgyud dri ma med pa gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba'i mdo las sman lha'i cho ga
item.coloph: 'dus pa rin po che'i rgyud la dri ma med pa gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba'i mdo las / sman lha dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste / sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o // bkra shis so // [82v] gang zhig […] thugs bskyed nyi ma'i 'od // dri med bstan pa'i pad tshal legs bzhad mtshungs med bla mar rje / g.yung drung 'phrul ngag bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gi […] srid rtser sgreng / […] 'khor lo gsum gyi dpung pas legs pa phyag rgyas bsdams…

item.tib: bstan pa'i rnam bshad dar rgyas gsal sgron las bstan pa gnas tshad dang lo rgyus kun gsal
item.coloph: da lta pa bstan pa gnas pa'i yun tshad ni / mdo las sum cu sku'i 'dul / sum cu gsung gi 'dul / sum cu thugs kyi 'dul / [225r] de lta dgu bcu lon nas / slad kyi ston pa 'byon zhes pa / gshen lo gu bcu mi lo stong tsho dgu byung ngo // de la gshen rabs tshe lo brgya pa'i ston pa la byon nas / sku'i sprul ba la mi lo sum stong tshig brgya song / de nas mi lo brgya nas gdung sob mu cho byon / de nas bsgyur ba la brgya tsam song ste sum stong sum brgya / li shu'i zhal nas / 'gyur nas lo dgu brgya nas rgya gar nas chos byung zhes pas / bod du lo stong dar bas bzhi stong nyis brgya / de nas 'gog mu zi gsal bzang dang bsdus nas / gter du nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa brgya gshegs pa'i gzhi stong bzhi brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad song / gshen sg[u]r gyi me mo sbrul la gter sgo phyed nas / gnam lo rgyal po shing pho byi ba yan la / drug cu skor bdun dang lo bzhi bcu song / drug cu skor bdun po lo bzhi brgya nyi shu ste / dril bas bzhi stong brgyad brgya brgyad cu rtsa brgyad song nas / da man bzhi stong dang sum brgya drug chu gnyis yod pas / tshe lo yang lnga bcu kha ral tsam yin no // zhes de ni slob dpon rgyal mtshan dpal gyis bzhed do // bstan pa'i rnam bshad dar rgyas gsal ba'i sgron me [225v] las / bstan pa gnas tshad kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o // … ces 'di ni rang gzhan gyi sde snod la / dad pa'i snang ba cung zad thob cing / rje mkhas btsun rtogs ldan gyi bla ma mang du bstan pa'i / sngags sems mtshan nyid la thos bsam gyi blo kha cung tsam phyogs pa'i / spa'i btsun pa bstan rgyal bzang po la / skyi btsun kro ta wer zhi'i dad pas bskul nas / gnas chen bde sgong du / shing pho byi ba'i dbyar zla ra ba la / re zhig yi ge bkod pa tshar ro //

item.tib: klu 'bum nag po
gtsang ma klu 'bum bsdus pa'i rgyal po
item.coloph: gtsang ma klu 'bum don bsdus chung ngu ces bya ba las / bcad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o // gtsang ma klu 'bum don bsdus chung ngu zhes bya ba rdzogs so // bkra shis par shog

item.tib: gnam sa snang brgyad kyis mdo 'gro la phan phyir
item.coloph: ston pas gsas khang dkar nag bkra gsal bzheng[s] pa dang / phyi rab[s] la ston pa dang phan bsnyam nas / gshen rab ston pa'i sgron me'i 'gro la phan phyir kong tse'i zhus pa'o // gnam sa snang brgyad kyi mdo rdzogs so // dag par gtug s.hô / gtsang nub ma'i brag nas [p. 166] gnyen mthing gi sa'o // ithi / dag go // bkra shis / zhal dro // byan che'o // gtug go // dge'o // zhus s+hO

item.tib: sa bdag klu gnyen gyis pang kon smon lam dang bcas pa
item.coloph: sa bdag klu gnyen gyi bshags pa rdzogs s.hô // klu gnyen sa bdag gis pang bskongs / byin brlabs yon tan rmad 'byung zhes bya ba / rgyal po'i bla gter bsam yas nas phyung[s] pa'o // dge'o / bkra shis / zhus so

item.tib: gtsang ma klu'i pa kong zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: sa bdag klu'i pang bskong dang bshags pa dang smon lam gsol ba'i mdo sma rdzogs s.hô / bkra shis par shog / lha sdong nye la bdag gis dang sems rlung dkyil mar me lta bu'i ngang du bris so

item.tib: sa srid pa'i rgyal mo'i zhus pa'i klu gnyan sa bdag gi pang kong
item.coloph: klu gnyan sa bdag gi spang skong las / byin brlabs phan yon bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o // klu gnyan sa bdag gi spang skong rdzogs so // bkra shis par shog

item.tib: rnam dag rin chen gtsang ma'i klu'i 'bum dkar nag khra gsum 'dus pa
item.coloph: klu rgyal dga' bde dang / klu bon dbyangs bsnyen gyim bu dang / klu grub ye shes snying po dang / rgyal gshen mi lus bsam legs bka'o // zhang zhung stong rgyung mthu' chen gyis / bod skad du bsgyur pa'o // klu rgyal bdud rtsi rin po [che]'i rgyud rdzogs s.ho // [smaller letters:] 'di bzhengs dge ba'i bsod nams gyis / nad mug mtshon gsum zhi ba dang / phan bde dngos grub thobs par shog / slar yang bod khams yongs bkra shis shog

item.tib: klu'i snying bcos 'bum nag
item.coloph: 'di la gter shog ngur ser dar leb / mtshal gyi spyan / bskor can dgu gda' ba yang / zhal [609] bshus pa'o // dag par gtugs so // mu tsug smar ro // bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling dar rgyas yun gnas bde skyid 'joms par shog

item.tib: gtsang ma klu 'bum dkar po
item.coloph: nam mkha'i khams dngos por cir yang ma grub pa'o // sarba mangga lam // bkra shis // dge'o // yon gyi bdag po ma'o mchog rgyal gyis zas gyis mchog gyur sha dmar khrus (illeg.) ma snang skom gyi mchog gyur rgya (?) 'o zho drangs / e ma ngo mtshar che // // yon gyi bdag po bo 'o gsang bu'i zas skom snang bka' drin che ba lags // bkra shis par shog / dge'o /

item.tib: bon rin po che 'khrul ngag bden pa gtsang ma klu 'bum nag po'i gzhung
item.coloph: gtsang ma klu 'bum nag p[o] bsdus pa'i mdo rdzogs sho //

item.tib: gtsang ma'i klu 'bum dkar po
item.coloph: zhu bas bgy[i]d do // d[e] nas ston pa gshen rab mi bo // thugs rje mnga' bdag la / klu las grub pa'i bon po ye shes snying po zhus pa'[i] rig[s] lnga klu [p. 261] yi dkyil 'khor las dug lnga rtsad nas gcod pa'i bon // bka' rtag[s] phyag rgya mi 'gyur ba rin po che phyag rgya rnams pa bzhis rgyas rnams btab pa rdzogs s.hO // bkra shis par shog // gtsang ma'i klu 'bum dkar po'i 'go legs so

item.tib: gtsang ma klu 'bum khra bo
item.coloph: zhu bas bgy[i]d do // d[e] nas ston pa gshen rab mi bo // thugs rje mnga' bdag la / klu las grub pa'i bon po ye shes snying po zhus pa'[i] rig[s] lnga klu [p. 261] yi dkyil 'khor las dug lnga rtsad nas gcod pa'i bon // bka' rtag[s] phyag rgya mi 'gyur ba rin po che phyag rgya rnams pa bzhis rgyas rnams btab pa rdzogs s+hO

item.tib: khams brgyad gtan la phab pa bka' rnam par nges pa las dum bu 'og ma
item.coloph: bka' rnam par nges pa 'di nyid / mi yi dbang po khro chen rgyal po kun dga' nor bus legs tshogs mi mdzad pa[r] du bskrus [~bskrun] pa'i tshe / khro chen nang so rin po ches zhus dag legs par mdzad cing / rjes sor yang lan gnyis yang sogs zhus dag par bgyis shing / spar byang nyung du tshigs su bcad pa phran smon rgyal sad sa rin gyis shing sprel zla tshes bzang po la …

item.tib: khams bsdud tshigs bcad ma
item.coloph: gnyen 'thing gi gter ma'o / sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa / tsheg bar dgu'o

item.tib: khams brgyad gtan la phab pa thig le'i mdo'
dpal gshen bstan sman ri'i tshogs 'dod las // // thig chen yum gyi mdo
item.coloph: dpal gshen bstan mi ri'i [~sman ri'i] 'tshogs 'don nor bu'i gter / sde dge'i spar dpe ci bzhin 'khrul med pa / gu dag ni dpal dpe'i ci bzhin bris kyang / par dpe 'dra ba ni gnyis byung tshe thar tshom mang pa'i / par gnyis cig sgril du bris pa yin gsungs pa'i / gru dbang rin po che'i phyag dpe'i nas zhal bshus so

item.tib: khams 'dus
stong phrag brgya pa rtsa ba'i 'bum
khams brgyad gtan la phab pa
khams brgyad gtan la phabs pa'i rtsa ba don rnam pa nges pa
zhi khro bar do thos chog rang grol las / ngo sprod rgyas 'bring bsdus pa gang la yang / nyer mkho sngon du 'gro ba'i rim pa la / lam gyi 'jug sgo tshor ba rang grol
zhi khro bar do thos grol las myur lam 'pho ba 'ja' zug ma bde chen zhing bgrod
item.coloph: myur lam 'pho ba 'ja' zug ma bde chen zhing bgrod 'di ni / gar dbang kun grol grags pa 'ja' tshon snying po can gyi gsal stong brda'i thig le shar bzhin / shar sja [~rdza] a khod ljong sgar la yod tshe / khro rgyal tshang dbon po rnam rgyal gyis bskul ba ltar / chu bya'i zla tshes la bkod cing / phyis su mkha' 'gro bde chen dpal 'dren gyi sku tsha phun tshogs rnam rgyal gyis gsung ngor / bar do gsum gyi ngo sprod mdor bsdus gyis brgyan nas spel bas 'gro ba'i don rgya chen por 'byung bar gyur cig bkra shis so / bka' chab bdud rtsi bskyems la rnyogs gang zhig / drung phyungs sangs rgyas rin chen dpal bzang ste / khro chen kun dga' mi 'dzad par gyis sbyin / bon char 'bebs 'di sa glang zla tshes la

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen po'i rgyud las thugs rje chen po rigs drug gnas 'dren thar lam them skas
item.coloph: ces pa'i zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen po'i rgyud las / thugs rje chen po'i rig drug gnas 'dren thar lam bsgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba 'di ni / dus snyigs ma'i kho bo rig 'dzin g.yung drung gling pa bdag / … dbyibs lung gong sangs zhes pa'i sa char 'brog sbyin tshe brtan du 'bod pa 'phos tshe / mkho char byung nas 'phral du sug bris bgyis …

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus kyi rgyud las rigs drug gnas 'dren skabs chog 'gug pa
zhi khro bar do thos grol las gnas chog chung ba zur du phyung ba ngan song dong sprugs
zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen po'i rgyud las dbang khrid rang gsal ye shes 'od kyi 'khor lo
item.coloph: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen po'i rgyud las / dbang khrid [182v1] rang gsal ye shes 'od kyi 'khor lo 'di ni / dmu rigs rgyal gyi gdung rgyud chen po gshen lhun grub rgya mtsho'i gsung gis bskul te / dus snyigs ma'i kho bo smon rgyal kun grol grags pa nam mkha' ngang tshul zhes bya bas / 'gal byed kyi mo 'du byed zla ba'i dkar phyogs la / khyi za rma lha mched gsum gyi mdun zhol / gdan sa chen po steng chen rnam rgyal gling mgon du grub pa bgyid pa / yi ge pa ni sdom brtson gtsug phud 'od zer gyis byas … khro chen rgyal po'i par du bsgrub pa 'dir / gnam lo sa byi bon bstan dan rgyug tshe / hor zla drug gi tshes bzhi dge ba ru / smon rgyal sangs rin ming gis dag zhus bgyis

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol gyi dbang khrid bsdu ma
zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol gyi dbang khrid bsdus pa bde blag rtogs byed
item.coloph: de ltar zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus bar do thos grol gyi / dbang gi bsdus don bde blag rtogs byed 'di / grogs kyis bskur phyir kun grol grags pas bkod / … snying grogs dam pa rtogs ldan shes rab tshul khrims kyis dbang chen ye shes rang gsal 'od kyi 'khor lo 'di ni gang yin la bskur du mi thub phyir / dbang khrid 'bring po dang bsdus pa gnyis byed dgos kyi bka' mchid lus skyobs rtogs bcas bskul ba'i don du / dbang zhu ba'i tshe che ba thob nas chung 'bring gnyis ma thob rung ste / dbang bskur ba'i tshe che ba ma thub na chung 'bring [5v] gnyis gang bde chog pa ru / thos chung kun grol grags pas rgyal mo rgya yi rong chen ngo mtshar nor bu'i gling du me 'brug zla tshes la brtsams pas …

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus las zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ye shes me dpung
item.coloph: rje rin po che'i gsang sngags grags pa ye shes snying po can gyis 'di ltar dgos kyi bka' mchid snga nas yod pa dang / nye bar mtshungs med 'dzam gling bla ma sangs rgyas gling pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la phan par bsngags pa'i lung dang / slad kyang dmu gshen [25v] khod spyod wer zhi la sogs bstan dang 'gro la thugs brtser gzigs pa mang gis bskul ba'i ngor / snyigs ma'i rnal 'byor kun grol grags pas dpal gyis bgyis pa …

item.tib: mchod 'phreng rgyug byang
sbyin bsreg sngags byang
zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen po'i rgyud las drag po'i sbyin sreg bskal pa'i me dpung
item.coloph: ces zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus las / drag po'i las tshogs sbyin sreg bskal pa'i me dpung 'di ni / mtha' khob mun pa'i gsal sgron du gyur ba rtogs ldan shes rab tshul khrims kyis nye bar bskur [~bskul] bas thos chung snyoms las pa / kun grol grags pa'i ming gis rgyal rong khro chen rgyal po'i mnga' ris / g.yung drung bon gyi mdun sar chen po ngo mtshar nor bu'i gling du me 'brug zla tshes su brtsams pa …

item.tib: drag po'i sbyin sreg gi mchod phreng mde'u thung
zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus las zhe dgu ma rdzogs tshun gyi ngo sprod chen mo thos chog rang grol
item.coloph: ces zhi khro [80v] bar do thos grol gyi ngo sprod chen mo 'di ni / snyigs dus kyi rnal 'byor ba kun grol grags pa'i dpal yon can gyis shar rdza 'bum thang dgon pa'i mi g.yo bsam gtan gling du / … me glang hor zla gsum pa'i dkar phyogs su grub pa'i drung yig pa ni / nye gnas chos bzang rdo rje …

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen mo las 'pho ba nye lam zab snying
item.coloph: de ltar 'pho ba nye lam zab snying 'di … [32r6] snyoms las pa kun grol grags pa'i dpal gyis bgyis pa … [32v1] me lo mgu byed zla ba'i 'phel phyogs su dre'u shog padma brtsegs pa'i nye 'dabs gdan sa dar rgyas g.yung drung du dge'o / yi ge pa ni gtsug phud 'od zer gyis bgyis …

item.tib: rkang dung 'bud thabs
item.coloph: rig 'dzin kun grol grags pas bkod

item.tib: khams 'dus
shes rab kyi bla na med par phyin pa mngon rtogs rig pa'i rtse mo
item.coloph: dang po bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' / bar du 'od zer dpag med kyi thugs dam / tha mar 'gro ba sgrol ba'i rten gnas / bod dang zhang zhung gnyis kyi 'tshams / yul bya [~bye] ma la g.yung drung chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gor / zhang zhung mkhas pa stong rgyung mthu chen dang / se ne dmu tsha sha ri dbu chen gyis nges par bsgyur te bla zhus gtan la phabs / dran pa nam mkha' rgyal po'i phyag tu phul / rgyal pos yer pa'i rdzong la gter du sbas / [274r2] shes rab kyis bla na med par phyin pa 'di / dus la ma bab yer pa'i rdzong la / dran pa nam mkha' la sogs gshen rab rnams kyis / lung bstan smon lam btab nas gter du sbas / smon lam mtha' btsan yin pa gshen rab bka' nyan [~gnyan] pas / gtsang gi ban dhe gsum gyis zhal phyes nas / mdo stod du brang gnyag ston gzi brjid la / g.yung drung 'phrul ngag gter rdol dngos grub babs / mkhas pas sprul pa lung bstan yin par nges / tha mar dad ldan mas pa dgyer ston la / las dang smon lam thugs rjes shugs kyis babs / rgyu dang shes rab bla yis mi 'byor dang / dad pa'i stobs kyi yum 'di dgrol byas nas / phyi rab gshen la mos tsam bstan la gzhag / yum sras rgyud gsum gsung rab 'di / yar [~yer] pa sjong [~rdzong] gi gter nas thon / gnyag dang gyer gyi phyag na bdog / bzhengs ni dpa' gor dben tshar bzhengs
pradz+nya shri lar 'bod pas bris pa'i dges…

item.tib: dug phyung rig 'dzin tshan khrus bsang bcas
item.coloph: 'gro mgon tshe dbang rig 'dzin gyis rnyed / shar pa rnal 'byor bon skor lags so

item.tib: zhi khro bar do thos grol gyi las gzhung chen mo yid bzhin nor bu'i gter mdzod kyi phyag bzhes nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer
item.coloph: ces zhi khro bar do thos grol gyi las gzhung chen mo yid bzhin nor bu'i gter mdzod kyi phyag bzhes nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba 'di ni rjes bzung gshen po dgyes pa'i dga' ston du dmigs nas kho bo kun grol grags pa'i sgra bo che des / dbang phyug ces pa me glang lo'i hor zla bzhi pa'i dkar phyogs su shar rdza mi g.yo bsam gtan gling du bcad rgyar gnas pa'i thun mtshams su bgyis …

item.tib: zhi khro'i gzhung chung bdud rtsi'i thig pa nyams su len pa'i zin ris shel gyi me long
item.coloph: ces zhi khro'i gzhung chung bdud rtsi thig pa nyams su blangs pa'i tshod zin gyi yi ge ris su bris pa shel gyi me long 'di ni / kho bo kun grol grags pa'i dpal yon can gyis a khod dar rgyas gling gi yang dben ri khrod du sgo gsum bcad rgyar gnas pa'i thun mtshams su bgyis pa me glang zla tshes la dge'o

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen mo'i rgyud las sngon du 'gro ba bon spyod sku gsum rang grol
item.coloph: zhes sngon 'gro bon spyod kyi sku gsum rang grol 'di yang kho bo kun grol grags pa'i dpal yon gyis bgyis …

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus dbang gi las byang gsal byed sgron ma
item.coloph: zhi khro bar do thos chog rang grol gyi / dbang gi las byang gsal byed sgron me 'di / … thos chung kun grags ming gis brtsams

item.tib: ma mgon lcam dral gyi bstod bskul ngo mtshar don ldan skal bzang mgrin rgyan
item.coloph: ma mgon lcam dral gyi gtor bskul ngo mtshar don ldan bskal bzang grin [~mgrin] rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni / thos chung mu las g.yung drung gling gi dgon du bgyis pa'o

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol gyi spyan dbye dgos 'dod phun tshogs
zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol las zhugs mar ma rig mun sel
item.coloph: ces zhugs mar ma rig mun sel 'di yangs [~yang] / … thos chung kun grol grags pa 'ja' tshon snying po can gyis brtsams pa dge legs 'phel bar shog

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol las zhi khro'i klong bshags brjod pa rang grol
item.coloph: dam pa rgya zhig gi bka' lung la brten nas bsgrigs pa'o / g.yung drung gling gi pho brang gzim khang nyi 'od 'khyil pa'i nang du drin can mu la'i zhabs drung du bgyis pa dge legs 'phel lo

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen po yid bzhin nor bu'i gter mdzod
item.coloph: ces pa'i zhi khro'i bar do thos grol yi[d] bzhin nor bu'i gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni / rje rin po che dge bshes ye ses snying po'i bka' lung la brten nas / thos chung mu la ha ra bdag gis 'gro ba'i bgon [~mgon] po smon rgyal dam pa rags grol [~dam pa rang grol?] gyi snyan rgyud ltar gtsor bzhag nas / bka' lung gzhan dang rigs 'gres phyir du / med pa bsnan cing nyung ba cung zad tsam du bkrol bar byas nas / bgyis pa

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus las bzlas pa 'dzab kyi rim pa
item.coloph: bzlas pa 'dzab kyi rim pa 'di yang mu las brtsams pa'o

item.tib: zhi khro bar do thos grol gyi las byang 'bring po bag chags rang grol gyi lag len gsal sgron
item.coloph: zhi khro bar do thos grol gyi gzhung 'bring po bag chags rang grol gyi lag len gsal byed sgron me 'di yang dbyug ces pa me mo glang gi 'dod 'phel zla ba'i dmar phyogs shar rdza a khod dar rgyas gling gi yang dben ri khrod tshe ring brag gi bya skyibs su / snyigs dus kyi rnal 'byor pa kun grol grags pa 'ja' tshon snying por 'bod pas rtsam …

phyis su gshen rab mi bo sku bltams nas shing byi sum brgya dang dgu pa'i sa mo glang gi bzhin ras ngoms dus / khro chen kun dga' nor bus spar du bsgrun [~bskrun] pa'i dag ther gza' khur dang / dkar chag brgyud rim bcas pa bdag smon rgyal sangs rgyas rin chen dpal bzang gis / hor zla drug pa'i dga' ba gnyis pa'i tshes bzang por bkod

item.tib: zhi khro bar do thos grol gyi las byang bag chags rang grol
item.coloph: zhi khro bag chags rang grol 'di ni / sprul sku tshe dbang rig 'dzin gyis 'gro ba'i mgon po smon rgyal dam pa rang grol la snyan du brgyud nas / shar pa rnal 'byor la bka' babs / de nas rnal 'byor rtog gi rgyal mtshan la brgyud / bru rgyal ba g.yung drung sogs nas rim bzhin du brgyud do / yongs 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho'i phyag dpe la bshus so
'di ni shar phyogs zhing rong rje rab brtan rgyal khab bka' rngom dbang drag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su / bdag mo nga zhes thos grol tshogs brgya grangs su 'bul dus kun grags kyis spel ba'o

item.tib: zhi khro thos grol gyi tshogs bskang 'dod yon gter ldan
