item.coloph: ces tshogs bskang 'dod yon gter ldan 'di yang kun grags kyis bgyis pa'o

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus kyi rgyud las bskang bshags nyon mongs rang grol
item.coloph: ces zhi khro bar do thos grol gyi bskang bshags nyon mongs rang grol 'di ni / kho bo kun grol grags pa 'ja' tshon snying po can gyis zhing skyong mi yi dbang po rab brtan rgyal po'i pho brang du bkod …

item.tib: smon lam rin chen 'phreng ba
item.coloph: ces pa 'di ni me nyag rab 'byams pa tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: bar do'i smon lam
item.coloph: ces de ltar bar do'i smon lam 'di ni / 'gro ba'i don du rgyal rong se gnyon zhig pos sbyar …

item.tib: ltung bshags dri med mchog byang
item.coloph: tshe dbang rig 'dzin chen pos shar pa rnal 'byor gyi snyan du brgyud pa'i / bshags pa dri med mchog byang bon spyod 'di / rjes 'bring [~'breng] rnams kyi don du yi ger bkod …

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol gyi dbang khrid 'bring po skal ldan rjes 'dzin
item.coloph: ces zhi khro bar do thos grol gyi dbang khrid 'bring po skal ldan rjes 'dzin 'di ni / theg chen bstan pa bon gyis gsal byed rgyal rong rtogs ldan pradznya tshu mi rin po che'i / nyon mongs g.yul ngo bsrung ba'i go khrab kyi rtags dang bcas nye bar gsung gi bskur ngor / snyoms las pa kun grol grags pa 'bod pa bdag gis shar rong rnam dag bkod pa'i zhing khams / khro chen rgyal po phu nya ma ni'i skyongs ba'i tha gru mu la spo lo lung / ngo mtshar nor bu'i gling du a na la'i tha skar lo mdzod du brtsams …

item.tib: zhi khro bar do thos grol gyi las byang chung ba bdud rtsi thig pa
item.coloph: ces zhi khro bar do thos grol gyi gzhung chen yid bzhin nor bu'i gter mdzod dang / 'bring po dam pa rang grol gyi bag chags rang grol gnyis ma thub tshe / las byang chung ba bdud rtsi'i thig pa zhes bya ba 'di la 'jug bde ba'i blo gros kyis bskul bzhin kho bo kun grol grags pas bkod pa dge …
item.margin: bar do bdud rtsi thig pa

item.tib: rigs drug gnas nas 'dren pa'i cho ga bde chen myur bgrod
item.coloph: ces rigs drug gnas nas 'dren pa'i cho ga bde chen myur bgrod zhes bya ba 'di ni / don grub ces pa sa mo lug gi lo hor zla lnga pa'i dkar phyogs su / shar rdza'i ru lag lding chen u du lha gdan khang du / … kun grol grags pa 'ja' tshon snying po can gyis brtsams …

item.tib: zhi khro bar do thos grol gnas 'dren dbang bskur rgyas par spros pa nor bu do shel
item.coloph: ces zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen po'i rgyud las / rig drug gnas 'dren dbang bskur rgyas par spros pa nor bu'i do shal 'di yang kho bo kun grol grags pa can gyis shar rong rnam dag bkod pa'i zhing khams / chu chen rab brtan rgyal po'i pho brang du bgyis …

kun grol grags chen po / 'bri klung mkhar gsum mdo yi lcog sgar du / shing khyi hor zla bcu pa'i tshes la dge / phyis su khro chen kun dga'i [~dgas] spar bskrun tshe / sangs rgyas kyis dag ther byas …

item.tib: zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus thos chog rang grol chen po'i rgyud las zas gtad snang ba kun 'phel
item.coloph: de ltar zhi khro dgongs pa kun 'dus las / zas gtad snang ba kun 'phel [9v1] zhes bya ba / dmu gshen lhun grub rgya mtsho'i bskul pa'i ngor / thos chung smon rgyal mu la bdag gis sbyar / … lcags rta / stag [??] zla ba bcu gcig pa'i tshes la / gdan sa dpal gyi steng du brtsams pa dge'o

item.tib: sa bdag klu gnyan gtod 'bum bzhi
item.coloph: bka' 'di yang dbang gi khri sgo gser stong nyi mkhar nang nas / dbus kyi ston brgyan 'bar la / glang ston pa g.yung drung 'phan gyis mnos pa lags so / de la ston pa yang po'i sgo brgyud nas / lting ston pas zhus / de las ston pa sgrun gyis chab / de la dbra a la'i bu yis zhus pa'o

item.tib: gtsang ma klu 'bum dkar po
rnam par dag pa'i 'bum bzhi las rdo bdag gtod po bcos pa ste bam po bzhi pa
item.coloph: gtod rin po che'i bka' / rin po che'i gtod 'bum 'di / dbus rtsis chu gnyer mkhan na / dbal rgyal ba snang nyi 'od kyi bka' bsgom nas / ston pa dbang chen gyi mnos te / mdo khams rngul rdzas sgang du spel pa

item.tib: rnam pa dag pa'i 'bum bzhi las stong gsum gnyan 'bum
item.coloph: gnyan gyi lugs sa bdag klu gnyan gtod 'khor bcas pa'i rgyud / jo bo gshen rab kyi bka' / 'phrul gshen gtsug phud kyi lung / rin po che gnyan 'bum zhes bya ba rdzogs so

item.tib: rnam par dag pa'i 'bum bzhi las sa bdag dbang chen gyi sgyur bcos ste bam po gnyis pa
rnga gshang gi sgra phyung la
bzlog pa'i byang bu shing byang bri lugs
bzlog pa'i byang bu shing byang bri lugs
item.coloph: de ni bzlog pa'i bca' gzhi'o

item.tib: gu ru'i gtor ma bca' thabs
badzra ril sgrubs 'khor ba kun grol
item.coloph: the colophon is difficult to read. here is the most relevant part. [5v5] badzra ril sgrubs '[kh]or ba kun grol 'di / smon sprul ming gis a blo dgon du bris /

item.tib: gu ru drag po'i glegs bam gyi rtsis brgya
item.coloph: le'u lnga bcu tham pa bzhugs pa dge legs phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu ru gyur cig // bkra shis
rig 'dzin gsang ba'i cha lags las / dag gtsang ma dag kun bsal ces bya ba / slob dpon padma 'byung gnas kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la rgyud pa dge legs 'phel // shu b+ham

item.tib: da 'di nas mar la mnol thub kyi khrag sna rnams
item.coloph: zhes pa 'di d+harma badzra gyis gsungs so …

item.tib: shar phyogs rgyal po shel dkar 'od
gu ru drag po'i cha lag las phyi mtshams bcad pa'i yan lags
dmar byang thugs kyi dril sgrub las sngon 'gro dkar mchog kyi rim pa
item.coloph: de phyir sngon 'gro'i rim pa ni / slob dpon padma 'byung gnas kyis / brag dmar yer pa'i g.yas mgul du / sbyar ste mtsho rgyal khyed la gtad / phyi rabs rnal 'byor gcig la sprod …

item.tib: bar phud mchod pa dang le'u kha thor du ma
item.coloph: skyabs mgon mchog gi phyag dpe'o …

item.tib: drag po rdo rje gur khang gi sa blang rgyan bkod kyi rim pa'i shog chung
item.coloph: de ltar rgyan bkod lag len rim pa 'di / slob dpon stang chen dmu tsha gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa'o // legs so

item.tib: tshe sgrub yan lag gi rgyan bkod
item.coloph: de ltar tshe sgrub gsang ba'i cha lags 'di / yum cig mkha' 'gro ye shes mtsho rgyal gyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge legs 'phel …

item.tib: khyung 'dul drag po khyung gi sgrub pa'i shog chung rgyan bkod
item.coloph: klu 'dul khyung gi sgrubs pa las / rgyan bkod rim pa bstan pa 'di / stong chen dmu tsha gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen ma [~la] rgyud pa dge'o …

item.tib: phyi mtshams bsdus pa
item.coloph: gu ru thugs kyi dril bsgrub las / phyi mtshams bcad pa'i yan lag 'di / sprul sku'i dngos slob g.yung drung bstan 'dzin bdag gis bkod pa'o / bkra shis so

item.tib: dbang chen gu ru zhi drag gi bsnyen sgrub las ma sbyor ba'i phyag bzhes 'phrul gyi lde mig
item.coloph: ces dbang chen gu ru zhi drag gi bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi phyag bzhes 'phrul gyi lde mig 'di ni nang so g.yung drung bstan 'dzin khu dbon gyi mdzad pa'i srol la gzhi blangs / cung zad 'thad min du byung ba rnams rang rig ye shes gyi legs par sgrung nas bkod pa 'di dag / drung yig pa ngag dbang yon tan rgya mtsho'i bskul ba la brten nas / kun grol grags pa 'ja' tshon snying po can du 'bod pa bdag gi shing phag hor zla gsum pa'i tshes la rtsom pa dge legs su gyur cig // bkra shis par shog

item.tib: zhi ba mi 'gyur gur khang gi gzhung
item.coloph: de nas dus dung spyi dbang bsgyur nas / dben gnas dam pa she le rdzong drug tu / yum cig mkha' 'gro ye shes mtsho rgyal gyis / dus mtha'i rnal 'byor bdag la snyan du brgyud / bdag gis sbas dang gsang rgya thub par byas / dad ldan grogs po rkyen gyis bskul ba'i ngor / dkar chags yi ge ris su bris pa 'di / rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro rnams la mthol lo bshags / slob dpon chen po'i sku la bzod par gsol / bka' skyong srung ma'i rko long ma mdzad zhu / dge ba'i 'gro kun bla med sa thob shog / legs so

item.tib: skye 'chi mi mnga' tshe yi rig 'dzin gtso
shar du lha lcam mandha dkar
thugs kyi rgyud chen gsal byed 'phrul gyi me long
item.coloph: bal chen thugs kyi rtsa rgyud las / las kyi go rim gnad kyi man ngag bstan pa'o …

item.tib: gu ru'i mtshon cha'i 'khor lo'i mngon rtogs gsal byed sgron me
drag po rdo rje'i gur khang gi gzhung
item.coloph: yum cig ye shes mtsho rgyal gyis / gnas mchog khyad 'phags gug leb stag rtse ru / dus mtha'i rnal 'byor bdag la snyan du brgyud / bdag gis sbas dang gsang rgya thub par byas / dad ldan grogs po'i rkyen gyis bskul ba'i ngor / dkar chags yi ge ris su bris pa 'di / rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro rnams la mtho lo bshags / bka' skyong srung ma rnams la bzod par gsol / dge ba'i 'gro mgon sangs rgyas thob par shog / mkha' 'gro mas bdag mi shig rdo rje rtsal la snyan du brgyud pas dge legs 'phel bar shog / zhus so / dag go

item.tib: gu ru'i rgyud phyag rin po che'i phreng ba
item.coloph: zhes pas gu ru'i brgyud phyag 'di / ris shig smyon pas bkod pa dge legs shog / ces pas tshul 'di ni / dmu rigs g.yung drung mthong grol gyi brgyud phyag zhes bya ba / lnga brgya'i ston pa gsang mchog mi shig rdo rje rtsal gyis / slob ma dad ldan can bde chen mi 'gyur snying po bya ba / bon chos gnyis la dbyer med gcig tu rtogs pa'i bsnyo ba stag la rje bya ba / 'dul ba dang du len pa'i g.yung drung bstan 'dzin gtsug phud ming can / mtha' bral nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor bas / kun bzang rang shar sku gsum mngon du gyur / lta ba'i bya bral thams cad gcig tu rdzogs / spyod pa dang bsgom nyi zla bzhin du gsal / sgom pa dmigs med mkha' mnyam klong du gsal / thams cad sems myen zhes pa gsum la 'dus / rnam dag rgyud phyag de'i 'di kyis sbyar / 'gu brtsol ma legs drin chen nyid la bshags / bka' skyong srung ma rnams la mthol lo bshags / bkra shis g.yung drung bon bstan rgyas par shog / dge'o

item.tib: pad+ma'i thugs kyi rtsa rgyud las 'phro 'du 'dzab bstod
item.coloph: drag po mtshon cha'i 'khor lo las 'phro 'du zhes bya ba rdzogs so …
zhes thugs rgyud dang gzhung gi sku stod sbrag lugs 'di nyid dge bshes 'chi med grub dang rin po ches mdzad pa yin zhes smon rgyal rgyal ba lhun grub bstan 'dzin gyi zhal nas gsungs so

item.tib: gu ru'i tshe sgrub bdud rtsi 'khyil ba mi shig tshe'i rdzong chen
item.coloph: de ltar rig 'dzin gsang ba'i dril sgrub 'di / stang chen dmu tsas brgyud pa ci bzhin du / dus mtha'i rnal 'byor mi shig gling pa la / dad ldan grogs po'i rkyen gyis bskul ba'i ngor / dkar chags yi ge ris su bris pa 'di / rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro rnams la mtho lo bshags / bka' skyong srung ma'i tshogs la bzod par gsol / dge ba'i 'gro mgon sku gsum mchog thob shog / bkra shis so …

item.tib: gu ru drag po'i tshogs skang rin chen phreng ba
item.coloph: slob dpon pad+ma'i thugs bcud sdus / stang chen dmu tsha gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge legs 'phel bar shog …

item.tib: g.yung drung rgyal po
item.coloph: g.yung drung rgyal po'i gsungs so …

item.tib: klu 'dul khyung gi sgrub pa gser dzwo 'khyil pa
item.coloph: de ltar sngags kyi yang snying bon / klu 'dul drag po khyung gi sgrub pa 'di / slob dpon chen po'i thugs kyi bcud phyungs nas / ye shes mtsho rgyal dgongs pa'i mdzod bskul te / dus mtha'i rnal 'byor mi shig rdo rje rtsal / nges med phrang po bdag la snyan du brgyud / bdag gis sbas dang gsang rgya thub par byas / dad ldan rkyen bskul dpe phab 'di / yi dam dbal khyung lha la mthol lo bshags / bka' skyong bstan srung rnams la bzod par gsol …

item.tib: khyung sgrub drag po'i bskang ba rin chen gter spungs
item.coloph: de ltar khyung bskul drag po'i bskang / rin chen gter spungs zhes bya ba legs so …

item.tib: dge bshes g.yung drung bstan 'dzin gyis mdzad pa'i dmar lam spyi bsdus
item.coloph: rgyun tshogs rin chen gter phreng zhes bya ba 'di / sprul sku rin po che mi shig rtsal gyis / che mchog dpa' bo gcig sgrub la sogs pa'i / snyan rgyud kun gyis nang nas bstun pa'i / 'gal 'khrul mchis na bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams la bzod par gsol / bka' skyong srung ma rnams la mtho lo bshags / dge ba'i 'gro mgon bla med sa thob shog …

item.tib: gu ru'i zlog sngags
dbal chen drag po khros pa'i thugs rgyud las bsrung zlog bsad pa'i thim yig
item.coloph: de ltar dbal chen drag po'i thugs rgyud las / bsrung zlog bsad pa'i thim yig zhes bya ba / bdag 'dra rmongs pa rnams kyi don phyir du / mtshan nas brjod dka' g.yung drung bstan 'dzin rin chen gyis / dgongs bzhed phyag len gnang ba ci lta bar / shes chung yid bzhin bdag gis nye bar mdo bsdus / nor 'gal mchis srid skyabs yul rnams la bshags …

item.tib: bdag bsrung ye shes gur khang
item.coloph: de ltar bdag gi rmi lam 'khrul snang gi / bdag bsrung ye shes gur khang zhes bya ba 'di / dad ldan grogs po snying 'dra ba'i / la btsun shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis / yang yang bskul ma byed nas su / dkar chags yi ger bris pa 'di / rig 'dzin slob dpon sku la mtho lo bshags / …

item.tib: drag po rngam pa'i zlog mdos las gur khang byad ma 'bum sdug
item.coloph: 'di nyid med kha med pa yin / dmar chen drag po'i thugs rgyud las / gur khang byad ma 'bum sdug ces bya ba / slob dpon pad+ma'i thugs kyi bcud phyung nas / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge legs 'phel / bkra shis par gyur cig

item.tib: dbal chen khros pa'i brgyud las dmar chen gsang ba'i zlog mdos byad ma gting bzlog
item.coloph: de ltar gsang ba sngags kyi yang snying / drag po mtshon cha'i 'od zer las / dmar chen drag po'i gtor zlog ces bya ba 'di / sgrub chen gyi bar chod zhi ba dang / yon bdag gi kegs ngan bzlog pa'i phyir du slob dpon chen po'i thugs kyi bcud phyung nas stang chen dmu tsa la dams pa'o / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la rgyud / dam nyams log 'gro can la ma shor cig …

item.tib: 'gres byang steng ma shog gcig
item.coloph: gzhung sngag re dang 'gres so …

item.tib: dbal chen drag po rngam pa'i rgyud las spyi rje khyung gi zlog pa snang srid zil gnon
item.coloph: slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis / brag dmar yel pa'i mgur du mdzad / stang chen dmu tsha gyer med gyi / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge'o …

item.tib: drag po rngam pa'i thugs rgyud las dbal mo'i bzlog pa mtshon cha'i 'khor lo
item.coloph: dbal mo gsang ba'i zlog chung / mtshon cha dbal gsas kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba / slob dpon chen po'i thugs bcud / stang chen dmu tsha'i gdam pa / phyi rabs rnal 'byor gyi byad zlog 'di / yum cig ye shes mtsho rgyal gyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge legs 'phel …

item.tib: dbal mo'i 'gres byang
drag po mtshon cha'i 'khor lo las lag len gzir drug
item.coloph: de ltar drag po mtshon cha'i 'khor lo las / man ngag lag len gzir [~gzer] drug bstan pa 'di / gzhung don gtsor bzhags bka' lung mthun bzhin du / cher 'gag med tsam rang bstan phan bde'i phyir / drin chen sprul sku'i dngos slob g.yung drung [bstan] 'dzin bdag / gu ru'i bon skor dang du len pa'i bu / skal ldan slob ma 'ga'i yongs bskul nas / bkra shis ri khrod dben pa'i gnas nyid du / bkod pa'i dge rtsa rman dag dri med mthus / sbyor sgrol spar gsum dbyer med gcig gi ngang / sku gsum rang gnas phyir mi ldog pa'i rgya / ma bcos khyab bdal klong du e ma ho / mu tsug smar

item.tib: mdos kyi 'jug chog sgo dbye'i rim pa
item.coloph: de ltar zlog pa'i man ngag dam pa 'di / mtshan ldan 'gro mgon rgyal ba gtsug phud kyis zhus / bla ma dge bshes ci gsung gis bskul ngor / dus mtha'i rnal 'byor rdo rje gling pa yis / dkar chag yi ge ris su bris pa 'di / rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro rnams la mthol lo bshags / bka' skyong srung ma rnams la mtho lo bshags / bzod par gsol / dge bas 'gro kun rig 'dzin sa thob shog …

item.tib: dbal 'bul rgyas pa'i rngam rol
item.coloph: grangs bcu gcig po'i mgo mjug gnyis la sbyar bar shes so

item.tib: rgyang thag bcad pa
pad+ma thugs kyi rtsa rgyud las bzlog mdos drag po'i smad chog gi cha lag lha lam drang zhing byad thag bcad pa dkar nag shan 'byed srid pa'i drang shing
item.coloph: de ltar bzlog mdos drag po'i smad chog gis cha lag dmu dag lha lam drang zhing byad thab bcad pa dkar nag shan 'gyed srid pa'i drang zhing zhes bya ba 'di / rtogs 'dod can rnams kyis bskul ngor dang / bon sgo gzhan dang mthun pa ru bkra shis ri khrod du shing lug gis zla tshes la legs par bkod pa'i mthus / 'gro kun bar chad ma lus sel bar shog / don 'gal 'khrul pa mchis na lha dang bla ma rnams la bshags gsol lo …

item.tib: gu ru drag po'i las mtha'i gser skyems dang zor las
item.coloph: zhes mchod rol bya la rdo rje glu gar bro gsum gyis mthar rgyan no / zhes pa 'di nyid gzhung 'dir dben phyir o rgyan snying thig dmar nag me 'phreng nas bris pa dge'o

item.tib: rta mgrin yang gsang gnam lcags dra gur gyi rgyud las dmod sngags dug mtsho 'khyil ba
item.coloph: zhes rta mgrin yang gsang gnam lcags dra gur gyi rgyud las dmod sngags dug mtsho 'khyil pa 'di ni / dus kyi sprang sdom 'jigs med gling bas rma rong sbas lung gi sde ba'i rim gro'i ba kha cha ru me 'brug zla tshes la bgyis pa 'du ya

item.tib: lha rgyal dga' dbang tshangs pa'i gter ldan
item.coloph: dga' dbang tshang pa'i gter ldan zhes bya ba rdzogs so …

item.tib: bdag nyid gu ru drag por bsgom la
item.coloph: rdo rje gur khang gis spyi lam bcad pa 'di / bsnyon pa bstan 'dzin gyis bkod / bkra shis so

item.tib: dbal rngam khro rgyal drag po khros pa'i gtso
dbal chen drag po'i thugs rgyud las rnga rab sgra rgyal 'brug gi sgra dbyangs
item.coloph: stang chen dmu tsha gyer med kyis / slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas la / dka' ba du ma spyad nas zhus / dad ldan bu yi spyod yul te / dam med rnams la gsang rgyas thob / u ya agtham sa ma ya / shin tu gnyan pa'i mchog yin pas / gar 'dod spyod la ma sbyin cig / stang chen dmu tsha gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge'o

item.tib: drag po rngam pa'i thugs rgyud las rtsang bstod rno dbal stobs ldan
item.coloph: dbal chen drag po rngam pa'i thugs rgyud las / drag po rtsang gi phrin las zhes bya ba / slob dpon chen po'i thugs mdzod bskul nas / ye shes mtsho rgyal bka' yi gnyer gtad nas / stang chen dmu tsha gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge'o / dam nyams log 'gro can la ma shor cig …

item.tib: drag po rngam pa'i thugs rgyud las dung rab sgra rgyal 'bum dbyangs
item.coloph: drag po rngam pa'i thugs rgyud las / dmar nag me yi phreng ba las / dung rab sgra rgyal 'bum dbyangs zhes bya ba / byad ma dam nyams sgrol ba'i man ngag / slob dpon pad+ma'i thugs bcud / stang chen dmu tsha'i rno dbal gdam pa 'di / byad kha / phur kha bzlog pa'i las kha ru / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa 'dis / byad ma ru tra rtsad nas chod pa dang / g.yung drung bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'jug par shog

item.tib: drag po rngam pa'i rgyud las dar rab srid gsum zil gnon g.yung drung bstan pa'i ba tan
item.coloph: gtor mdos drag po'i cha lag tu / slob dpon pad+ma [--] bkod nas / stang chen thugs kyi bcud bstims / phyi rabs gang zag don ched du / las ldan gshen la brgyud pa'o / dge'o

item.tib: drag po rngam pa'i thugs rgyud las rtsang gi rgyan bstod srid gsum zil gnon
item.coloph: drag po rngam pa'i thugs rgyud las / dmar nag rtsang gi rgyan bstod zhes bya ba / stang chen dmu tsha gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge'o

item.tib: drag po rngam chen 'khrus pa'i rgyud las dmar chen drag po'i gtor zlog gi shog khra'i zlog pa
item.coloph: dmar chen drag po'i gtor zlog las / kengs ngan zlogs pa'i 'khor / byad kha zlog pa'i dbal phur / than ltas bzlog pa'i tsa kra / bdud zhi zlog [--] kyis man ngag / g.yen khams dregs pa'i byad zlog / g.yen sde gting bzlog zhes bya ba / slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis / shel brag pad+ma dges kyi phyogs su mdzad / mkha' 'gro la gtad / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud [---] / dam nyams log 'gro can la ma shor cig …

item.tib: las mkhan brgya rtsa'i zlog pa byad ma 'bum sgrol
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po'i thugs bcud / phyi rabs gshen gyi spyod yul / dam nyams log 'gro can la ma shor cig / rgya sya mya y.ya / stang chen dmu tsa gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge legs 'phel lo

item.tib: las mkhan brgya rtsa'i 'gres byang
dbal chen drag po'i thugs rgyud las shing byang gi zlog pa byad ma 'bum sdug
item.coloph: drag po dbal gyi gtor zlog las / zlog chung byad ma 'bum sdug zhes bya ba / shing byang gi zlog pa 'di nyid slob dpon pad+ma'i phyi [6v] rabs don du gsungs / stang chen bdag gi thugs gter brdol nas gsungs / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge'o / bkra shis so

item.tib: dbal chen drag po'i thugs rgyud las gyad dmag gi rngam zlogs ltas ngan gnas sgrol
item.coloph: drag po mtshon cha'i 'khor lo las / gyad dmag gi rngam zlogs / ltas ngan gnas su sgrol byed zhes bya ba / o rgyan gyi mkhan po'i legs par sbyar te / stang chen dmu tsha gyer med la snyan du brgyud de / phyi rabs don du las ldan gshen la brgyud / dam nyams lot [~log] lta can la ma shor cig …

item.tib: gyad dmag zlog pa'i 'gres byang
item.coloph: 'gres byang 'di kun la ma nor bar 'gres so

item.tib: dbal chen drag po rngam pa'i rgyud las dregs pa'i rngam bzlog byad ma sgrol byed
item.coloph: dbal chen drag po'i thugs brgyud las / dregs pa'i rngam bzlogs byad ma bsgrol byed zhes bya ba / slob dpon chen po'i thugs bcud / stang chen dmu tsha'i rno mdel / byad ma sgrol byed mtshon cha zhes bya ba / stang chen dmu tsa gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge legs 'phel bar shog

item.tib: dbal chen drag po'i thugs rgyud las rgyal chen lcam dral gyi bzlog pa dregs bzhi dbang bsdud
item.coloph: dbal chen drag po'i thugs rgyud las / rgyal chen lcam dral gyi bzlog chung dbang sdud ces bya ba / srid pa'i byol kha bsgyur byed / chab dkar sngags kyi yang snying / sgrol byed drag po'i las mtha' / byad ma bzlog pa'i yig chung zhes bya ba / slob dpon pad+ma'i thugs kyi bcud phyung nas / stang chen dmu tsha gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa 'di / bstan pa nyi ltar rgyas pa'i rgyan du shog / dam nyams log lta'i rigs la ma ston cig …

item.tib: drag po rngam pa'i thugs rgyud las brtan ma'i zlog pa dal khram gting zlog
item.coloph: ces gsungs nas yum chen [10v] ye shes mtsho rgyal la gnyer gtad do / yum chen gyi stang chen dmu tsha la bstan pa'i gnyer gtad de / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge legs 'phel bar shog

item.tib: brtan ma'i 'gres byang
dbal chen drag po'i thugs kyi gnag pa las sde brgyad kyi zlog pa gtad khram gnad bzlog
item.coloph: dbal chen drag po'i thugs rgyud las / sde brgyad dregs pa'i zlog chung gtad khram gnad zlog ces bya ba / slob dpon pad+ma'i thugs kyi bcud phyung nas / yum chen ye shes mtsho rgyal gnyer gtad nas / stang chen dmu tsa gyer med kyis / dregs pa'i gdug sems zlog pa dang / bar chod bdud bgegs dbang du bsdud pa'i phyir / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa 'di / dam nyams log lta can la ma shor cig / las ldan bzungs thub man ngag gnad / shes pa / de dang 'phrad na bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan tshugs / mi nub phyogs bcur kun tu dar rgyas shog …

item.tib: yi dam thugs kyi rtsa rgyud las las sbyor drag po'i brnag pa srog gi spu gri rno gcod mtshon cha'i 'khor lo
drag po mtshon cha'i 'khor lo las sbyin sreg rgyal bsen kun phung
item.coloph: gu ru'i sbyin sregs rgyal bsen kun phung 'di / drin chen sprul sku'i mdzad byang bkod pa 'di la / mi tshangs bsam dang bka' la bka' min dang / tshod yod ra chod byas pa tsam min te / tshig don rgyas sdus lha grangs bstun phyir do / gzhung don gtsor bzhag 'di nyid bsgrig pa 'di / skal ldan slob mas nye bar rab bskul nas / rgyal rong g.yung 'dzin bdag gis yi ger bsgrigs / 'gal ba gang mchis drin chen sprul sku dang / yi dam zhi khro mkha' 'gro lha tshogs dang / bka' skyong srung ma'i tshogs la mtho lo bshags / de ltar bkod pa'i nus mthu dpal brten nas …

item.tib: me las
sbyin sreg gnam lcags thog mda' rgyal 'gong sreg pa'i me dpung
item.coloph: slob dpon pad+ma'i thugs bcud / rgyal bsen dregs pa bsreg byed 'di / drag po'i mdel thung zhes bya ba / stang chen mu tsa gyer med kyis / phyi rabs las ldan gshen la brgyud pa dge'o …

item.tib: mdel thung
spyan 'dren
zhi ba khro bo tshe sgrub gsang ba khyung sgrub sogs kyi dbang bskur
item.coloph: yang gsang man ngag 'dus pa 'di / yum cig mkha' 'gro ye shes mtsho rgyal gyis / dus mtha'i rnal 'byor bdag la snyan du brgyud / bdag gis sbas dang gsang rgya thug par byas / dad ldan grogs po'i rkyen gyis bskur ba'i ngor / dkar chags yi ge ris su bris pa 'di / rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro rnams la mtho lo bshags …

item.tib: bka' lung dri ma med pa'i mdo drung mu bskal bzang sangs rgyas stong gi mtshan brjod
item.coloph: bskal bzang 'gro ba 'dren pa'i mdo rdzogs s.ho / bskal bzang 'gro ba 'dren pa'i mdo 'di ni / sngon dus rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i gshen rab kyis / dgongs lo bdun stong bzhes pa'i dus su / khri smon rgyal bzhad sham po lha rtse ru / 'khor gyi g.yung drung sems pa rnams la bshad / mi brjed lung thob yid rgyus yod pa la / bla chen dran pa stong rgyung tshe dbang gis / yang yang gsol btab snyan du brgyud / yi ger bkod pa'i dbang lung gnang / srid pa rgyal mo las grub mkha' 'gro yis / chad lhag med cing gong 'og ma nor ba'i / ldang 'dzin bka' yi bya ra mdzad / gzhan gyis rab skul bdag gis sems bskyed kyis / yi ger bkod bgyis 'di dag la / mchod chad lhag 'gal srid na / gshen rab g.yung drung sems dpa' dang / bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro bon skyong rnams la bshags / dge tshogs sems can don du bsngo / nam mkha' khyab pa'i sems can dang / bris klog nan tan bgyid pa'i skyed bu rnams / lha gshen srid pa'i sa thob nas / don gnyis mthar phyin 'bras bu thob par shog / 'di bris dge ba'i rtsa ba de / 'gro drug sems can kun kyi don du bsngo / yon mchod gnyis la bkra shis shog / bskal bzang 'gro ba 'dren pa'i mdo las 'bras bu'i le'u sde nyi shu pa'o / legs byas bsod nams stobs kyi rgya mtsho las / don gnyis rnam dkar nya gang rab smin pa / khro chen kun dga'i dad sems bsil zer gyis / 'gro blo ku mud bzhad byad par bsgrub dge

item.tib: 'dul 'bum
rgyal ba'i gsung rab rnams kyi klog bsgom
bon nyid snying po thugs rje nyi ma dgu shar gyi 'bum
dkar chags snang ba'i dpal bskyed
item.coloph: dkar chag snang ba'i [dpal] skyed zhes bya ba / rgan chen tshul khrims bzang po thugs bzhed du / bkod pa po ni ha ra wer zhi sad / sam bhu tra yi phyag lan gnang ba la / ye ge pa ne [~yi ge pa ni] spe rdzu wer zhi'o

item.tib: byang chub sems gab pa dgu skor gyi dbu yi sa gcod kyi le'u
item.coloph: dang po sgom chen gshen sgur gyi gter lugs so / de nas brgyud do dpe rgan du byed pa la / rgya bla ma khri rjes gtug pa'o / [8v] de la bru ston bla mas gtugs / de la rong ston jo sras kyis zhus / de la ltod ston me pos zhus / 'gro don mtha' ru phyin par shog …

item.tib: byang chub sems gab pa dgu skor
item.coloph: gshen sgom chen gyi gter ma'o // … [the following in smaller letters:] par byang / byang phyogs bstan pa dmar pos bcom brlag skabs / byang sems theg mchog gab pa dgu skor 'di / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan gyis / byang chen sa la 'gro kun dge phyir spel …

item.tib: sdong po dgu 'dus lta ba'i rgyud chen
item.coloph: smar gyer [50v] rgyung spungs kyi bka' gter / rma la seg gis gtug go // // bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon bdag 'gro ba kun… ces yang ston gyi phyag dpe ltar bshus lags / bstan pa'i yang rtse gsang sems lta ba'i rgyud / bstan pa yi […?] phyogs bcur rgyas phyir du / bstan 'dzin rnam dag mchog gi par spel bas…

item.tib: gsas mkhar g.yung drung ye khyebs lta ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: gter gyi snying po dung shog dpe rnying las / rong gi mgar ston khro 'dul gyis blangs / de la glan mi tis zhus / de la yang ston tshab mas / de la tre ston bdud rje mched kyis zhus / de la bdag 'dul seng gis yi dam du zhus lags so // … [smaller letters:] dpar byang / g.yung drung bon sde rgya mtsho'i snying po che / g.yung drung ye khyeb gsas mkhar rdzogs pa'i rgyud / g.yung drung bstan pa 'dzam gling khyab pa'i phyir / g.yung drung slob dpon bstan rnam mchog gis spel …

item.tib: sems lung gab pa dgu skor gyi 'grel pa rgya cher bshad pa
item.coloph: de ltar byang chub sems gab pa dgu skor 'di / ston pa kun tu bzang po gshen lha 'od dkar gis / gshen tshad med 'od ldan la bstan / des 'phrul gshen snang ldan la bstan / des gshen 'chi med gtsug phud la bstan / des gshen gsang ba 'dus pa dang / yum bzang za ring btsun gnyis la bshad / der yum gyis klu yi yul du snams so / gshen gsang ba 'dus pas lha yi yul du bsnams nas / lha'i gshen po yongs su dag pa la gtad / des klu nas grub pa'i gshen po ye shes snying po la bshad / des rgyal rigs gshen po mi lus bsam legs la bshad / de nas gdung brgyud bcu gsum du / gcig la gcig [163r] gis bshad de / tha ma ni se dmu tsa sha ri dbu chen dang / zhang zhung stong rgyung mthu chen dang / lde gyim tsa rma chung dang / me nyag lce tsha mkhar bu chung dang bzhis bon thams cad dar cing rgyas par mdzad cing bzhugs pa la / rgyal gri gum btsan po'i ring la / bon sems phyogs thams cad nub pa ltar gyur nas / gter du bzhugs pa la / de rjes bstan pa phyi dar dus su gshen bon sgom chen la dngos grub tu babs te / lo brgyad thugs kyi dkyil du gab pa lags so / des zhu g.yas jo bo legs po la bshad de / rigs pa thabs kyis brgyud / de nas rim gyis brgyud nas bla ma gung thang ba la mnga' ba bdag shes rab bzang pos dad pas bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don du zhus nas bris pa lags so // … theg chen byang sems gab pa'i 'grel gzhi 'di / theg chen rnal 'byor brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan gyis / rgya chen thugs bskyed dge bas par bskrun pas / rgya chen bon bstan phyogs bcur dar rgyas shog / zhus

item.tib: gshen rab rnam par rgyal ba'i yi bzhin nor bu'i smon lam sogs smon lam rnam gsum
item.coloph: rtse drug sgrub mkhan brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan gyis par bskrun pa lags

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal g.yung drung thigs pa man ngag rtsa ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: nor 'dod bu pho chags sdang bdag 'dra yis / rin chen lnga yi snying po gser khyer nas / rin chen srog la ma 'dzem dka' ba'i las rnams brgal / man ngag gdengs pa'i snying po byang chub sems rgyud smad bco lnga rtsal / li mu khod stong gshen rab bla ma dang / sgra skad bstun te gtan la phab na yang / bod kyi yul du rmongs pa tshan gsum 'byung / dus dar bar shog / rgya rgya rgya / 'gro rnams mi 'gyur g.yung drung sku thob shog / bkra shis

item.tib: byang chub sems kyi thigs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud phyi ma
rgyud bu chung bcu gnyis
item.coloph: na 'dod phung po chags sdang bdag 'dra yi / snying po nges pa man ngag thams cad du / dgos bu po so dum bcu gnyis rgyud / 'khor ba spyang thag gcod pa'i man ngag 'di / mi bu gong sdang gshen rab bla ma dang / rgya skad bstun pa'i rin chen gser gyis bslus / 'dir drangs mnga' bdag rgyal po'i phyag tu gtad / dad mos nges par 'dzin las gzhan du min …

item.tib: rgyud bu chung bcu gnyis kyi sa gcod
rdzogs pa chen po lung drug
item.coloph: skad rigs mi mthun mi la phan gdags phyir / logs re skad re bkod nas 'gro don byas / kun tu bzang po'i thugs kyi bcud 'di yang / ye gshen gtsug phud dgongs pa'i man ngag 'di / kho mo mo [~mi] ngan li shu stag rings kyis / smrar gyi skad bsgyur lo tstsha'i tshig sbyangs nas / bod kyi bla ma rnams la spel te bstan / srog gis btsal yang don 'di mi rnyed de / las 'phro dag pa gcig dang 'phrad par shog / dus la bab na smon lam brtson par shog // kho mo mi ngan li shu stag rings [22v] kyis / lung dang man ngag thams cad thag bcad nas / rang gi blo sbyangs 'gro ba'i don byas nas / spyad dbang med nas rgyal blo phyag tu gtad / dus la bab nas dar bar gyur gcig par / smon lam btab nas tha ram rgya yis btab / skal ldan 'phro can dang 'phrad par shog / … [205r1] kun bzang thugs las gtsug phud snyan du bsgrags / 'od zer dpag med li shu stag rings bstan / bstan pa 'phel 'grib byung nas pa'i gter du sbas / bdag 'dra bzhod ston dngos grub grags / skye ba gong ma'i smon lam dang / lho brag khom mthing gter sgo 'di / 'brug lo ston zla tha chung gi / tshes grangs bco lnga'i gdugs la ni / dkor mdzod phyes te zhag gsum la / ma lus rdzogs par phyes nas ni / lo gsum gsang nas bka' rgya bkrol / dar bar gyur pa smon lam mthus rdzogs so // sprul sku bzhod ston nas rim gyis brgyud nas / bdag la'o …

item.tib: lung drug gi sa gcod
lung drug gi 'grel pa
item.coloph: ces rang 'byung nyag gcig sems kyi lung zhes bya ba / kun tu bzang po'i thugs / ye gshen gtsug phud kyi dgongs pa / gtan la phab pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so …

item.tib: man ngag brgyad
item.coloph: 'brug lo ston zla tha chung gi / tshes grangs bco lnga'i gdugs la ni / bzhod ston bdag gis bton nas bcangs / rgya rgya rgya // dge'o

item.tib: zhe sdang gi lam gud du sbas pa'i man ngag shin tu zab pa zhig
kha byang
yig chung bzhi
don gsum
item.coloph: lho brag khom mthing gi gter ma / lha rje bzhod ston la mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub tu gnang nas / rim pas brgyud nas bdag la'o // dge'o

item.tib: lung gi kha byang
ye shes ngos 'dzin
item.coloph: kho mo mi ngan li shu stag rings [2v] kyis / sems don ma lus gdams pa rtsad bcad nas / dus dman rgyal blon phyag tu gtad nas bzhag / nam zhig dus la bab na dar bar shog / las can gang zag gcig dang 'phrad par shog / …

item.tib: stong thun gsum
item.coloph: zhes stong rgyung mthu chen gyis co za bon mo la gdams pa'o …

item.tib: lung nyi ma dgu bskor
lta ba la shan sgron ma
lung drug brnag pa
lung gi yang zhun gsal ba'i sgron ma
item.coloph: lho brag khom mthing gi gter ma / rnam snang gi gdan khri'i nang nas / lha rje bzhod ston gyis bton pa'o …

item.tib: lta bsgom spyod gsum gyi yang zhun
zhi khro phur gsum dbang sogs kyi yig chung
item.coloph: bzhod ston dngos grub nas rim gyis brgyud pa'o …

item.tib: g.yung drung spyod pa'i phreng ba
spyi rgyud chen po nam mkha' dkar po ye khri mtha' sel gyi rgyud las gnas pa gzhi'i bam po
item.coloph: bder gshegs dgongs pa'i bcud / sangs rgyas kun gyi snying / rje ri khrod pa'i thugs kyi thigs pa / dbus phyogs yar lha sham po'i gangs khrod du / [28r] sprul sku lung ston lha gnyan la / mjal res tha ma la brgyud pa lags so / des bdag lung sgom 'khor lo rgyal po la brgyud pa'o …

item.tib: la zlo ba'i bam po
mkha' 'gro rin chen phreng ba gsang sngags phyi nang 'byed pa'i bam po
item.coloph: mkha' 'gro rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud …

item.tib: dgos 'dod gsal byed bshad gzhi'i mchong
item.coloph: sprul sku lung ston lha gnyan la mjal res tha ma la brgyud pa lags so // des [75r] lung sgom 'khor lo rgyal po la brgyud pa lags so // thugs rgyud yi ge ris su bkod gyur pa / bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro bon skyong la / 'gal 'khrul nongs pa ci mchis bzod par gsol / phyi rabs rjes 'jug 'ga' la smin par shog / dgos 'dod gsal byed bshad gzhi'i mchong … rdzogs chen bla med […] / 'brel byas 'tshos pa'i mkha' mnyam sems can rnams / …

item.tib: pho brgyud mo brgyud gnyis kyi don gyi gdams skor
item.coloph: rje ri khrod pa'i thugs kyi thigs pa / sprul sku lung ston lha gnyan la brgyud / de yis lung sgom 'khor lo brgyal po la brgyud pa'o …

item.tib: rnam par bkod pa dam tshig gi mchong
item.coloph: rje ri khrod chen po nyid kyis / las dang skal par 'dzom pa'i / sprul sku lha gnyan la brgyud / des lung sgo[m] 'khor lo rgyal po la brgyud / mjal res tha ma'i gdams ngag gtugs so …

item.tib: man ngag rin po che thun mong gi bon bdun
spyi rgyud ye khri mtha' sel gyi lo rgyus chen mo skos ki mchong
le grangs gsal byed don bsdus mchong
rdzogs chen me long bdun pa
bon bstan rgyas pa'i smon lam
item.coloph: g.yung drung slob dpon sangs rgyas bstan 'dzin gyis / g.yung drung bon bstan rgyas smon gsung bzur ngor / g.yung drung gling gi slob rgan tshul rgyan pas / g.yung drung shad bar brgya dang rtsa brgyad spel / g.yung drung bstan pa rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig … [4v] rdzogs chen ye khri mtha' sel bla med des / [illeg.] bkra shis rnam dag gus nyid gyis / bstan 'gro'i don du par skrun zhus pa'i dges / mi nub bstan pa byas pa'i rgyu ru shog …

item.tib: tshe dbang snyan rgyud kyi lo rgyus
snyan rgyud dbang dka' rab 'byams ye shes spyi blugs
lag khrid lag len mun sel
snyan rgyud rtsa ba'i tshig rkang rnams
khrid kyi rgyab yig lung gi 'phreng ba
shog dril chung pa dang po snyems thag gcod pa gcod kyi khrid yig
sgrub pa bsrang 'jug dang rlung sems dbang bsdud rlung 'byongs zab mo snang ba sku ru lam 'khyer gsung du lam 'khyer thugs su lam 'khyer rnams
zhe sdang rang grol lam kyer me drod ras kyang sman chog bcud len rnams
shog dril lnga ba / 'pho ba dran chog
shog dril drug pa / rig pa gcer bur ngo sprod pa'i mdzod
shog dril bdun pa / tshe dbang bla ma'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu
phrin las kun 'byung khebs lag len
snyan rgyud kyi bka' bsrungs srid rgyal dpon g.yog gi sgrub thabs dgra srog gcod pa'i spu gri
lung bstan ngos bzung
bon bstan 'di nyid
item.coloph: gter ston bon zhig gling pas yol [~yos] bu lo zla ba bzhi pa'i tshes bcu'i nam phyed yol tsam na / phyug mo dpal ri'i gsang phug rtse nas / srid pa'i rgyal mos dngos su gdan drangs so / shog dril zab mo che ba lnga / chung ba bcu byung ba la lo gcig sgrub pa byas nas nyams su blang gsang nas / 'brug lo zla ba […?] pa'i tshes bco lnga la / bla ma'i gdan sa dga' ldan du / mtha' bzhi'i drang srong ye shes rang shar gyis bskul [p. 300] nas / skal ldan du mthong nas / lung zin rnams 'dzoms nas legs par phab / dag par btugs / gtsang par sgyur / dbu zhabs tshang par tshar mchod [gcod?] bcas pas / zin no / zhang zhung gi krug [dkrug?] yig mi gcig pa drug las sgyur ro…

item.tib: snyan rgyud rin chen sgron gsal sa bcad
rin chen sgron gsal gyi phyag bzhes yid bzhin gsal byed
dran chog rkyen ngan phyir zlog dran mchog sku gsum lhun grub go chog 'da' kha 'chi grong rnams
rdzogs pa chen po'i khrid rim gsal ba'i me long
tshe dbang snyan rgyud rin chen sgron gsal gyi khrid rim gsal ba'i me long
rgyal pa kun 'dus lta ba yang rtse'i phug / me ngag yang rtse'i phug du gyur pa yi / rig 'dzin kun gyi yang rtse lo rgyus gsal ba'i me long
tshad med 'od ldan yab sras mjal theb gser zhun
kun bzang yab sras zhal mjal ba'i zhal gdams snying gi me long
'chi med yab sras mjal theb rang rig don gyis gdams pa
sku gsum ston pa'i gsung rab bka' 'gyur rin po che'i lung rgyun ji snyed pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa'i bzhugs byang brgyud rim bcas pa dri med shel gyi phreng ba
item.coloph: ces bka' 'gyur rin po che'i brgyud rim gyi thogs mtha'i mtshams sbyor 'di yang phyogs so so nas 'dus pa'i g.yung drung gi mched grogs du mas nye bas bskul ba las / mchog gzigs gling 'chi med 'gro 'dul gar dbang gsang sngags gling pa'i [186r] zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i gus 'bang gyi na ba khod spungs pa dbra ston ngag dbang skal bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nas / ye shes spos brgyad dgon gyi gtsug lag khang mdo sngags 'phel rgyas gling du sa sbrul zla (5) ba'i / yar tshes (13) kyi rgyal zla gsum gyi snga dro'i char sug bris su sbyar ba'o // …

item.tib: g.yung drung bon gyi bstan rtsis ngo mtshar nor bu'i phreng ba
item.coloph: ces g.yung drung bon gyi bstan rtsis ngo mtshar nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba yang / tshul 'dir mos pa'i grwa slob mang pos yang yang bskul ba la brten nas / mkhan ming nyi ma bstan 'dzin dbang gi rgyal por 'bod pa bdag gis tshad gsum zung du 'brel ba'i sgo nas sman ri'i bla brang du rtsis pa'i dge des mnyam med bla ma'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig / … [second colophon:] klog pa po rnams la zhu ba / bstan rtsis 'di brtsams pa'i lo rab byung bcu bzhi (14) ba'i chu stag lo [i.e. 1842] nas / rab byung bcu drug (16) pa'i tha ma me stag lo yan la / lo grangs brgya dang bzhi bcu zhe lnga (145) song yod / (de'i steng) phyi chad rab byung bcu bdun (17) pa'i me yos [i.e. 1987] nas gang brtsi'i bar gyi 'das lo bsnan par bya'o // zhes glog dpar du gdab rgyu'i ma phyi 'di / rab byung bcu bdun pa'i me yos lo'i zla (1) bar bris so.

item.tib: u du 'bar ba'i gzungs rgyas pa sangs rgyas rdzong chen
rin po che tog gi gzungs
item.coloph: spyi gtsug u du 'bar ra rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di… [9v3] spyi gtsug u du 'bar ra rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba / ston pa gshen rab kyis gsungs pa'o // ldem gyim tsha rma chung gis bod la bsgyur ba rdzogs so // ston pa gshen rab kyis 'gro ba sems can drang ba'i don du mdzad pa'o…

item.tib: zhi khro na rag pang kong gi gzungs
item.coloph: sta bo rgyud bsrub nas / 'od sgom phug pas dngos grub bsnyem / zhi khro na rag pang kong sgrib pa sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzogs so…

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi gzungs
item.coloph: 'di ni bon glang gdong gi gter ma'o… [25r5] nag mo 'di ni zhal zang gi gter ma'o… [25v6] gtsug tor 'bar ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so // rta nag dung phor gsang brag nas / gu ru rnon rtse gter nas bton ni / gzhon nu 'bum la brgyud de dar ba'o

item.tib: zil gnon 'jig med rtogs 'jom gyi gzungs
item.coloph: zil gnon 'jigs med rtog 'joms kyi gzungs rdzogs so // le'u ste gnyis pa'o…

item.tib: yang snying thig le sgrol byed gzungs
item.coloph: yang snying thig le glo rdeg gi gzungs las / [19r] bsgrol byed las skal pa'i gzungs bstan pa'i le'u ste / gsum pa'o // rnam sprul dam pa rang grol gyis gsungs so / bstan pa bsrung ba'i don du mdzad / dkar chags la btab po // de nas slon dpon ye shes brag gi dbang dang dngos grub tu bzhag go

item.tib: zlog pa 'khor lo stong 'joms gzungs
item.coloph: yang snying glo rdeg gi gzungs las / bzlog pa 'khor lo stong 'joms kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o…

item.tib: dri med rnam dag khrus kyis gzungs
item.coloph: yang snying thig le glo rdeg gi gzungs las / dri med rnam dag khrus kyi le'u ste / lnga pa'o // legs so / khrus gzungs chung ba la 'di skad do…

item.tib: tshogs gnyis rin chen nor rgyun gyis gzungs
item.coloph: yang bsnying thig le glo brdegs gis gzungs / las / [18r] tshogs gnyis rin chen gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o…

item.tib: 'gyur med g.yung drung tshe yi gzungs
item.coloph: yang snying glo rdeg gis gzungs las / [12r] tshe bsgrub 'gyur med g.yung drung gi gzungs kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o…

item.tib: yan lag bdun pa bskangs ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: yang snying thig le glo brdeg gi gzungs la / yan lag bdun pa bskang ba'i gzungs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o // [smaller letters:] yan lags bdun pa bskang ba'i gzungs rdzogs so…

item.tib: yang snying thig le mdo rtsa'i gzungs
item.coloph: yang snying thig le glo brdeg skor… [40r1] yang snying thig le glo brdeg gi gzungs le'u dgu pa rdzogs so // [smaller letters:] 'di gsang ba 'dus pa'i bka' / des rgyal gshen mi lus bsam legs la bshad / de dpon gsas tha mi dad ke la bshed… de ltar rin chen rgyal mtshan bdag gis dad pa byas nas zhus pa'o // de la g.yung drung rgyal mtshan bdag gis dad pa dang mos pa'i brten du bzhengs pa'o…

item.tib: rtogs jom gza' brtags pa
rtogs 'joms kyis sngags 'grigs
mu med bdal ba
item.coloph: dbang ldan mo lto'i gter ma se gnyan zhig po'i dngos grub / sbyang 'phro g.yung drung rgyal mtshan kyis bskul nas / shog dril mdo bsdu'o / dmar smug sna la 'dzub gsum / zhing la 'khyud gang gang yod pa'i smar smar 'phring bcu'i la zhal bshus s.ho …

item.tib: mu med bdal ba'i gsal sgron
item.coloph: zab don man ngag 'phrul gyi sgron ma zhes / rjes 'jug don phyir se zhig kho bo yis / 'dir bkod 'gal 'khrul ra chod ci [15v] mchis gang / bder gshegs rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro rnams la bzhags / dge byung 'gro kun byang chub myur thob shog / sems can don la dar rgyas bkra shis shog

item.tib: mu med bdol pa'i sa gcod
rdzogs pa chen po mu med bdal pa'i rgyud las man ngag
item.coloph: shog ser yig 'phreng bdun la zhal bshus pa'o / 'gro ba'i don du dar cing rgyas par shog // dge'o // ithi / dbang phyug lha gnyan gyi gsang gtor / stong rgyu [~rgyung] bla bon gyi thugs bcud / lde bon gyim tsha'i zab yig / rgyal dang [~dbang?] se zhig gi dngos grub / g.yung drung rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa dge'o // bkra shis par shog / zhus so

item.tib: mu med bdal pa'i 'grel pa
item.coloph: mthar phyin mdo' bsdu' ba ni / kun bzang thugs kyi dgongs rgyud / lung dang man ngag gi yang bcud / rdzogs chen mu med bdal pa'i don gyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so // de ltar brgyud lung man ngag 'dus [237r] pa'i bcusd [~bcud?] / gnas lugs don 'grel gsal ba'i sgron ma 'di / gzhan don bsam pas dran shar zur sbyar kyang / shes chung rig rmongs go rtogs cha zhan pas / ci ltar lung gi dgongs pa lon men te / bstebs nyis ra chod bder gshegs rnams la bshags / 'dir 'byung dge' bas 'gro mun rab bsal cing / mkha' khyab sems can rig grol sangs rgyas shog // rtogs pa'i don ldan ye rgyal rin po 'di dang / theg chen sgor 'jug ye shes seng ge yis / 'dun pa'i bskul ngor se gnyen zhig pos bkod / bkra shis 'gro ba'i don du rgyas par shog / [smaller letters:] sa byi zla (3) tshes (8) la / len [~lan] gcig 'bris zhus byas so

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po byung khung bstan pa
item.coloph: dbang phyug lha gnyan la gter du sbas ste 'gro ba'i don du dar zhing rgyas pa'i smon lam btabs // dus 'dar [~'dir] se zhig bdag ma [~la] dngos grub bab ste / chu mo glang lo dgun zla ra ba'i bcu dgu'i tho rangs dngos grub bsnyems so // bdag gis sems bskyed dag pas bod shog dkar la btab / 'ga' [~'gal] 'khrul bde bar gshegs pa bzod par gsol …

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po mu med gdal pa'i rgyud las / sngon 'gro khrid kyi rim pa
item.coloph: de bzhin rdzogs chen man ngag btus pa'i bcud / se zhig kho bos gzhan don bsam phyir bkod / 'gal 'khrul ra chod bder gshegs rnams la bshags / dge byung 'gro rnams sangs rgyas myur thob shog

item.tib: srung ba 'jig med btsan rdzong gi gzungs bstan pa
item.coloph: yang snying glo rdig gi gzungs las / srung ba 'jig med btsan rdzong gi gzungs bstan pa'i le'u ste gcig pa'o …

item.tib: kun tu bzang po mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyud
phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs lta dgongs 'dus pa'i rgyud
ye shes gsal rdzogs gsang ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: spa gro'i gter / ku sas bton / mgar gyi bshus nas gter dpe la dam par gtub bo / dge'o

item.tib: kun bzang a dkar gsal ba 'od kyi lung
item.coloph: phyi skor la brgya dang cu gnyis yod dam / kun tu bzang po'i bon skor rdzogs so / spa gro'i gter / ku sas bton pa'o

item.tib: g.yung drung gting rdzogs gsang ba'i rgyud
g.yung drung gsang chen gyi rgyud
g.yung drung yang rtse gsang ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: gter shog las zhal gshus so / gtugs so

item.tib: g.yung drung gsang ba gsang chen gyi rgyud
yang rtse gsang ba'i rgyud
g.yung drung rang grub kyi rgyud
gsang sgrub skye 'gag med par rang grol du sgrub pa
gzhi rtsa gtan la phabs pa'i thig pa
gsas mkhar zhi ba g.yung drung yongs rdzogs bsgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor
item.coloph: de nas dkyil 'khor zhal bsgyur la / khro bo dbang chen drag po sku rdzogs bskyed pa'i bsgrub pa bya'o / gsas mkhar rin po che spyi spungs thig le dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor / gsas 'khor dbyings kyi phrin las zhes bya ba rdzogs so / dang ra khyung rdzong nas rma ston srol 'dzin gyis gter nas gdan drangs nas / bri ston nyi ma rgyal mtshan la brgyud / de nas me gnyos rnam gnyis bcas rim par brgyud nas bdag la'o

item.tib: che mchog dran pa yang gsang drag po'i rgyud / rtsa rgyud dbang 'bar ba'i phreng ba
item.coloph: bdag 'dra o rgyan sangs rgyas gling pas rab brtan lcags phag lo'i tshes 15 la ge ta brag bse ga se'u rging ljongs nyi ma rang gyis / gro seng gdong phug du rigs mthun gyi mkha' 'gro bsten pa'i sa nag po dang brag brag slob bdun dang bcas te song nas zab mo gter la drangs pa'o / slar zla tshes rang la bsten pa'i sa nag po bsod nams kyis 'byor ba'i grong chen po'i drug zur rnams rgyal rdzong gi dbu rtse nas / [illeg.] bod yig tu bsgyur pa'o / [...] rin chen rgyal mtshan 'jug par smar cig

item.tib: me drag 'bar ba me phreng me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyud / gsas mkhar gsang ba'i mdzod che
dbang drag 'bar ba me phreng gi sngon 'gro phyi'i bsnyen pa'i rgyud
bsgrub pa'i yan lag bco brgyad kyi don bstan pa'i rgyud
dbang drag 'bar ba me 'phreng las kyi 'phyong chen pa'i rgyud
'dus pa rin po che gzer mig gis mdo las gshen rab la bdud kyi cho 'phrul sna dgu bstan pa'i le'u
item.coloph: 'dus pa rin po che gzer mig gis le'u bco brgyad pa 'di ni / ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i bon sgo bzhi mdzod lnga'i nang nas / gtsang ma mtho thog spyi rgyugs su rtogs so // gtsang ma mtho thog spyi rgyug nas mdo sde chen po bzhi bzhugs so // bzhi bzhugs pa gang zhe na / dus gsum gshen rab byung khung gi mdo dang gcig / khams gsum sems can skye 'chi'i mdo dang gnyis / gnas rten 'byung ba chags 'jigs kyi mdo dang gsum / bla med go 'phang sgrub thabs kyi mdo dang bzhi'o // 'dus pa rin po che yi rgyud 'di ni / mdo chen po bzhi yi nang nas 'di gshen rab byung khung gi mdor gdags so / de la yang snga rabs 'das pa dang / slad kyi ston pa 'byon [317v] po rnams kyi zur tsam sgra 'phang nas bstan no // da lta'i ston pa gshen rab ci ltar 'byon pa ltar / zhib par 'di yi nang du bstan pa'o // 'das dang ma byon gnyis ka'i gtan tshig ni / dus gsum gshen rab byung khung kyi [~gi] mdo yi nang nas zhib / 'dus pa 'di ni mdo yi nang nas btul pa'i 'di / dang po gshen rab nyid kyi zhal nas gsungs / gshen rab mya ngan mya ngan 'das nas gdung tshob ba / mu cho ldem drug gi bka' dang bka' las brtan nas rig pas mang por phye / mu cho 'das nas mkhas pa rim pa mang por byung / stag gzig la mkhas pa mu tsa tra he se dang / khro tog par tsa ma dang / 'gu hi li spar ya gsum byung / de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa'i lo tsa ba gsum gyis bsgyur / rgya gar la mkhas pa lha bdag sngags grol / rgya nag la mkhas pa legs tang rmang po / phroms la mkhas pa gter ston lce 'byams / de gsum la bsgyur ba / bod la mkhas pa ldem gyim tsha rma ge / me nyag la mkhas pa lce tsa gang bu / sum pa la mkhas pa mu spungs gsal tang / zhang zhung la mkhas pa sha ri dbu chen / de rnams las bsgyur ba [318r] yang gis bstan pa dar ba las / bar du chos kyi 'phrag dog gis nub pa / drang rje btsun pa gser mig gis / gling gi lho phug gi / khri dang dur khrod kyis nang nas rnyed pas 'phel pa'o // slad kyi ston pa ci ltar 'byon pa'i le'u ste / bco brgyad pa'o / bkra shis byin che'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po bar mi yul du bsgrags pa dang / 'og klu yul du bsgrags pa gnyis kyi dkar chag
rgyud drug las g.yung drung gsang ba dbang gi rgyud bar mi yul du bsgrags pa'i skor
item.coloph: bdag 'dra mi ngan li shu stag rings kyis / phyi rabs rnams la phan gdags bya ba'i phyir / g.yung drung gsang ba dbang rgyud dam pa 'di / mnga' bdag phyag tu gtad de rin po che sbrom [~sgrom] bur sbas / lan gcig las can sprul pa'i gang zag rigs / dam pa gcig dang 'phrad par shog / zhes smon lam btab nas sbas so / rgya rgya / rgya rgya / rgya rgya / … sprul sku bzhod ston nas rim par brgyud nas bdag la 'ong

item.tib: ba ga mngon rdzogs kyi rgyud
phun sum tshogs pa gsum gyi rgyud
gol sgrib rnam par phye ba'i rgyud
gsang ba thams cad ma lus rdzogs pa'i rgyud
rtsa ba gcig las rnam par bgrangs pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: … kho mo mi ngan li shu stag rings kyis / rin chen gser gyis btsal nas rang rgyud sbyangs / dus dman rgyal blon dag gi phyag tu gtad / skal ldan gsang ba'i don go ba / sprul sku gcig dang 'phrad par gyur cig / ces smon lam btab nas tha ram rgya yis gdab / rgya rgya / rgya rgya / rgyal po rnams ni shin tu gdug pa che / bon po rnams ni mkhas pa'i nga rgyal che / blon po rnams ni bar tshig lce gnyis smra / 'od 'bar rnams ni tshor ngas gzhung mi rtag / dus bzang bstan pa cha nyams mar 'grib pas / rgyal po rna khung srab nas bon bsnubs nas / lho bal chos btsal bod khams cha nyams so / g.yung drung bon bsnubs pa'i dbu g.yogs kyis / bod khams sil bu rgyal gyi khrims nyams shog / dus kyi mtha' la g.yung drung bon dar shog / rgyal po blon po grong sprang byed par shog / rgyal bas rmang drag dus su bon dar nas / skye 'gro yi kha lo gyin du 'dren par shog / ces smon lam dang dmod par bcas nas / rgyud kyi bsham du btags nas / rgyal blon la gtad do / rgya rgya / sbas rgya / sbas rgya / rgya rgya / dar rgyas mi nub 'gro don rgya che bsngo / dge'o / yig bris pa mkhas mchog rdo rje bon tshogs su bris pa dge

item.tib: rgyud drug gi sa gcod
item.coloph: sprul sku gzhod ston nas rim par brgyud nas bdag la 'ong / dge'o / bkra shis so

item.tib: sems don sde bcu'i skor
item.coloph: bka' dam pa 'di ni dang po kun tu bzang po'i thugs las / ye gshen gtsug phud kyi man ngag 'di / lha yul klu yul mi yul gsum du gsum du bsgrags / mi la bsgrags pa'i rim pa la / slob dpon bzhi dang / de nas mkha' [~mkhas] pa bzhi yis spyad / de nas mkhas pa nyi shu spyad / slob dpon bla ma bzhi ni / 'od zer [d]pag med dang / mun pa kun gsal dang / 'khrul gshen snang ldan dang / gsang ba 'dus pa'o / mkhas pa mi gzhi ni / stong rgyung mkhas pa / gyim tshwa rma chung / lce tshwa mgar bu / sha ri bu chen dang bzhi'o / mkhas pa nyi shu ni / khyung po stag sgra dun tsug / snya li shu stag rings / bhe shod tram / gu rib btsan po ri mi sar / bla mu gru 'dzin / sde gyim thang rma bo / sum pa dmu phywa / bhas dug 'dul / phra stag sgra ge shag / ba gor 'od zer rgyal ba / ljang tsha 'phan snang / bsnubs mang gnyen bzhi btshan / phris po ga ra mon par / mkhar lha bzher ches pa / sku gyim thang rma bo / gshen dran pa nam mkha' / bon blon gsas chen / dbas khri gzung stong lo / co za bon mo / 'gos khri stong rgyal po / de tshos bon gyi bstan pa bzung nas yod pa las / rgyal blon gyis bon bsnub par chad nas / bon po rnams gyis bgros nas / nub kyi rigs la yig chung du gdams ngag thams cad gdab ste / la la ni g.ya' ri dang gangs ri la sbas so / la la ni rgyal blon la gtad do / de nas tha ram rgya yis btab ste sbas so / rgya rgya rgya / rgya rgya / rgya rgya

item.tib: klong lnga / brnags pa gsum / thig le drug pa / gol sa bcad pa / gces pa'i phreng ba 'brus thus kyi man ngag / mtshan ma rang grol / sho lo ka'i man ngag rnams
phur pa'i don bshad
item.coloph: lung sde rgyud sde kha byang tshig gi don / gter sgo ri dang dben gnas kun la btab / man ngag gter gsum shin tu zab par byas / lung dang rgyud la brtags pas dam pa'i don mi rnyed / dam pa'i don ni gcig las ma bstan yang / blo dang sbyar nas dam pa rnam pa gsum / snying gi gter yin 'ba' ra sa ma ti / dam tshig / rgya rgya rgya rgya / slob dpon 'od zer dpag med kyis / stong rgyung mkhas pa la gtad / de nas gro mo la sgor stag rings la gdams / slob dpon gyis stag rings la smras pa / stag rings lung sde rgyud sde rgya yi btab pa yin / de ni bstan pa'i ched du byas pa yin / snying gi bu la de bstan mi dgos te / 'dreng gdams gcig gis go bar ma byis [~byas?] na / lung dang rgyud dang man ngag la / skye ba gcig gis shes dang mi srid la / thos par bya ba rang yang dka' ba yin / des na 'di don nges par zung gcig snying gi bu / der kho mos brnag pa ni dkar nag mtshams su sbas so / rgya rgya / dge'o

item.tib: rgyal mo gsum gyi sgrub pa dang / go cha mchod rten can
sgom thabs nyi shu rtsa bzhi
gshen rab bcu gsum gyi mgur ma
sems nyams drug pa
'phrul gyi me long dgu bskor
item.coloph: bdag 'dra li shu stag rings kyis / man ngag nyung la 'dus pa 'di / rgyal blon dag dang lag bsdebs nas / phyag mdzod dkor khang nang du sbas / dus la bab nas dar bar shog / ces sbas so / rgya rgya sbas rgya rgya

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po'i thugs rgyud smar byang rnam gsum klu yul du bsgrags pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: … rgyal blon dregs pa che ba dang / ban btsun phrag dog che ba yis / g.yung drung bstan pa rgyal po bsnubs / bdag gis nyams su blang pa'i bon / khom mthing lha khang dag tu sbas / smar byang brtag pa'i skor rnams / rnam snang rgyab tu sbas / tha ram rgya yis btab / g.yung drung ngo sprod dang mu tig btab nas sbas pa / nam zhig dus na dar bar smon lam btab / sa ma ya / ag tham / rgya rgya rgya / dge'o

item.tib: smar rgyang yid chung
smar byang bar do'i gdams pa
item.coloph: bar do'i gdams pa li shu stag rings kyis gter du sbas

item.tib: seng ge sgra bsgrags lta ba lung gi sa gcod
lta ba seng ge sgra bsgrags
man ngag lung gi tshad ma'i sa gcod dang 'grel pa
item.coloph: mkhas bzhi'i rigs 'gros / li shu stag rings kyi gter du sbas so / phyi rol gyi rtsod pa sel zhing / lta ba'i sgro 'dogs gcod pa yin / kun gyi shes par mi 'gyur te / sprul pa gcig dang 'phrad par shog / rgya rgya rgya / rgya rgya rgya / u yang kha tham / ti rgya ni rgya / su rgya'o

item.tib: nyi 'od gzer bu / zla 'od gzer bu / nyi zla gnyis med kyi gzer bu
'og klu yul du bsgrags pa'i lo rgyus
item.coloph: … ces lho brag khom mthing gi gtsug lag khang du / rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs khar sbas so / de las dang skal par ldan pa'i bzhod ston dngos grub grags kyis / 'brug lo ston zla tha chung gi bco lnga rta la dkor mdzod kha phyes zhag gsum gyis / ma lus rdzogs par bton nas ni / lo gsum gsang nas bka' rgya bkrol / de nas las can rnams la spros pa'o / dge'o / bkra shis

item.tib: man ngag 'khor ba dong sprugs
item.coloph: zhod ston dngos grub grags kyis / khom mthing lha khang gi dkor khang nas / ke tshang sgo chung bco lnga bod pa'i dbus ma nas bton pa'o / dge'o / …

item.tib: man ngag thugs kyi brnag pa shar chung nyi shu rtsa bdun
thugs gsang ston pa'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba dug lnga mi spangs lam khyer dbang bskur gyi man ngag
gtan tshig gal mdo rig pa'i tshad ma
item.coloph: kye / bla na bzhugs pa'i rgyal po'i glen pa gsen [~gson] / thad na bzhugs pa'i ban btsun zhe ngan gsen / 'og na 'dug pa'i blon po gdug pa nyon / yang 'og na 'dug pa'i rgyal 'bang tha bran nyon / ya tha rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor man chad nas / ma tha dmyal ba'i gser ga na yan chad kyi / bar na gnas pa'i lha 'dre dreg pa can / de ring kun kyang ma lus bdag la gsen / gshen rab bla bon dran pa nam mkha' bdag / dang po lo tsa'i tshig sbyangs thos pa mang po sbyangs / sgra tshad mi mthun drug chu rtsa bdun shes / bar du theg pa mtha' dag bon rnams kun / khong du chud nas sems nyid mnyam par bzhag / tha ma 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa kun / nyag cig thugs la g.yos pa med par rtogs / de nyid lhag mthong gyur nas kun bzang gral la gnas / rgyal po glen pa blon po gdug pa che / rgyal 'bangs kha 'phra mchu la ngur smig chags / ban btsun gnyis pa zhe sdang me ltar 'bar / nyon mongs chags sdang gdug rtsub dug ltar khol / ngan pa kha drag de'i dbang gyis ni / nga yi g.yung drung 'phrul ngag bden pa'i bon / bstan pa'i rgyal po 'jig rten nyi ma bsnubs / nyon mongs dbang song ban btsun snying re rje / nga ni kun bzang gshen lha'i thugs nyid na / skye shi dar nub ye nas med pa'i phyir / bde ba chen po'i ngang du rtag tu gnas / g.yung drung nyi ma'i 'od 'bar 'di bsnubs nas / lho bal bstan pa'i chos rnams yongs btsal nas / rgyal po tshe thung grong sprang byed par shog / btsun pa nang 'khrug grong btsun byed par shog / ban dhe gcig gis gcig smod mthu rgyas byed par shog / mangs rnams sil bur chad de rgyal 'bangs kha drag shog / chos kyi bstan pa dbus nas nub par shog / bon gyi bstan pa mtha' ru rgyas par shog / 'dzam bu gling du sprul pa 'byung bar shog / gter kha thams cad de dus brdol bar shog / sprul pa'i bu yis rtag tu ston par shog / g.yung drung mtha' nas rgyal mtshan rtse bzhin shog / kye gsen gcig rgyal 'bangs ban btsun rnams / 'jig rten lha srin kun kyang gzu dpang mdzod / kho mo mi ngan li shu stag ring bdag 'dra bas / lo lnga lon nas g.yung drung bon skor zhugs / lo bdun lon nas lo tsa'i sgra la sbyangs / lo dgu lon nas lung dang man ngag shes / nyi shu gcig la bden pa 'phro mo mthong / srog gis btsal yang mi rnyed don 'di dag / rang gis blo sbyangs 'gro don mtha' ru phyin / de ltar btsal ba'i man ngag spyad dbang med / zhe sdang can gyi ban btsun ngan rigs kyis / rgyal po glen pa dag la phra ma bcug / tha ram rgya yis btab nas gter du sbas / g.yung drung bon bsnubs lho bal cho[s] btsal bas / rgyal blon khyod la mod pa 'di sdig ste / mi 'dod sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung bar shog / nag po rgya yi dbang 'og tshud par shog / nga'i man ngag dus la bab pa'i tshe / sbas kyang mi sbos sprul pas spel bar shog / mtha' ru g.yung drung dar rgyas 'phel bar smon / dpon gsas mkhas pa dran pa nam mkha' dang / bdag 'dra li shu man ngag dam pa rnams / phyi dus gshen rab rnams la sprul pa'i bus / gter 'di rgyas par 'chad cing spel bar shog / ces gsungs so / kye gsen dang rgyal blon bon btsun glen dang smongs / bdag 'dra mu tsa lo tsa sgra mkhas kyis / tshe stod g.yung drung bon gyi sgor zhugs spyad / ming yang ba gor rin chen gsas su btags / tshe smad dam pa chos kyi sgor zhugs spyad / ming yang ba gor be ro tsa nar btags / bon chos gdul bya'i dbang du tha dad can tsam las / don la dbyer med ngo bo gcig pa la / gud gud log bcas bzung bas 'khrul zhing gol / bon bsnubs chos dar dus kyi 'khor lo 'di / bstan pa'i 'khor lo res 'jog yin pas na / des kyang mtha' ru bon kyang dar bar spyad / bon chos 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba bzhin / gnyis ka de bzhin dar nas bdag gi smon lam mthus / mtha' ru gnyis ka mi nub dar bar smon / sprul pa bu yis spel bar smos ci dgos / ces so / gal mdo nges pa'i gtan tshigs su lung bstan pa rdzogs so / … lha sa g.yer pa'i gter su bon dbang tshul las sogs te / gter gyi sgo 'byed gsum gyis bsnyoms pa'o

item.tib: bya ra ma gsum bskul pa
rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud phyi lta ba spyi gcod kyi 'chad thabs
rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi bka' rgyud skor bzhi'i 'chad thabs
zhang zhung snyan brgyud kyi bon skor bka' brgyud skor bzhi'i dpe rtsis mu tig phring ba
item.coloph: [. . .] nyag rong [. .] mchog sprul tshe dbang [. .] nas snyan rgyud bka' rgyud skor bzhi'i par bkod [. . .] dpe rtsis . dgos [.] gsung gis bskul ba la brten nas [. . . . . . . .] chab gcig tu shar rdza'i bya bral bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba dge'o / par bkod pa grub ngan mdzad byung 'di nyid nas [. . . . . .]

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen pos zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyis bla ma'i rnam thar lo rgyus rnams rgyas pa
snyan rgyud kyi mi rtag pa
snyan rgyud gsol 'debs
item.coloph: nyams rgyud khyad par can gyis gsol 'debs / rim par brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs chen mo cung zad bsdus te / gang [~gong] ma'i dgongs pa ci lta bar / bru rgyal ba'i bsdus shing phyi rabs pa'i dag snang gis yan lag tu sbyar ba'o

item.tib: rje ta pi hri tsa la gsol ba phur tshigs su gdab pa
item.coloph: rje ta pi hri tsa la / gyer spungs chen po snang bzher lod pos / phur tshugs su gsol ba gdab pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs
item.coloph: gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'beb 'di / gyer spungs nas 'bum rjes 'od kyi bar la / bzhag nas smon pa cig gang nas yod pa de la brten nas bkod / gyer spungs yan chad ni rgyud kha gsum po bsdus zhing / ye shes skye ba tshigs gi rgyud pa'i lho rgyud la yang brten nas / ri bkra mtsho long dben gnas kyi khrod du / khrom ston pa tshe dbang rgyal po sbyar ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: zhang zhung snyan rgyud las rig drug rang sbyong gi gdams pa
sgrib sbyang lam sel gyi khrid
rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud phyi lta ba spyi gcod las man ngag le'u bcu gnyis pa
item.coloph: kun tu bzang po ta pi hri tsa sprul pa'i sku des / … [18v] ces gsungs nas … ta pi hri tsa snang bzher lod po nas rims kyi rgyud nas / rtog ldan dad pa shes rab la gnang / de nas rim par bdag la'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi lta ba spyi gcod kyi rtsa ba'i glad [~klad] don, rgyud bu chung bcu gnyis
item.coloph: sprul pa'i sku'i las can gshen la bsten / … sprul pa'i [9r] sku nyid nam mkha' la dgongs pa mkha' la gzha' yal ba bzhin du gshegs so / gyer spungs nyid dgongs pa mkha' ltar grol lo / de nas rim par rgyud nas da lta bdag ngo sho tshul rgyal 'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi lta ba spyi gcod rgyud bu chung bcu gnyis kyi don bstan pa
rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi lta ba spyi gcod gyi 'khrul 'khor lde mig
item.coloph: sprul pa'i sku yis gsung ste / lta ba spyi gcod du bsten pa / 'khrul 'khor lde mig gis man ngag rdzogs so

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi phyi lta ba spyi gcod gyi mdo 'grel gsal ba'i sgron ma
item.coloph: mdo 'grel gsal ba'i sgron ma rnam grangs so so'i bye brag man ngag rgyas par bshad par rdzogs so // [7v] ces sprul pa'i sku'i gyer spungs gshen la gsung / gyer spungs nyid kyis / pha wa rgyal tig gsas chung la sogs / zhang zhung grub chen drug la rim rgyud / de nas gu ge blo ldan la sogs / 'khrul zhing drug la rgyud / de nas spang lha nam gshen / des lung sgom rtog med / des snyel sgom 'khrul med / des snyag sgom ri pa / des mtshan ldan u ri bsod rgyal / des kong tsa bkra dar / des co ston smon lam blo gros / des tre ston rgyal mtshan dpal / des mkhan po nyi dpal la / des gar tsha rtogs ldan bsod blo gros / de nas rim par rgyud nas bdag la'o // … spa ston bstan rgyal bzang po'i phyag dpe la zhal bshus pa bu dpe la zhal bshus so

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi phyi lta ba spyi gcod, mnyam bzhag sgom ba'i lag len
item.coloph: mnyam bzhag bsgom pa'i man ngag 'di / … ces sprul pa'i sku'i / gyer spungs chen po la gsungs so

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi phyi lta ba spyi gcod las rgyal ba dgongs rgyud dgu'i bshad byang
item.coloph: sprul pa'i sku'i las can gshen la bsten

item.tib: phyi lta ba cig chod kyis klad don bshad thabs 'jal tshul rgyud de rnams bzhugs so / man ngag gnad kyis gdams pa swa mwa ywa smar ro
rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud gyis sgron ma drug pa
item.coloph: ces gsungs pas / sprul pa'i sku de nam mkha' la gzha' yal ba bzhin mi snang par 'gyur ro / gyer spung gu rub snang bzher lod po yang / rigs pa dmar thag chod par mchogs mong thun mong gis rdzu 'phrul du ma mnga' bsnyems par 'gyur ro // gyer spung gu rub snang bzher lod po'i [~pos] / pha ba rgyal gzig gsas chung la gdams / des dmu tso ge la gdams / des dmu tso stong las [~la] / des dmu shod khram pa / des dmu rgyal ba'i blo gros la / des dpon tson po la / des bla ma khyung byid la / des gu ge shes rab blo ldan la / des pu rang kun [22r] dga' ring mo / des rnal 'byor gsas mchogs / des khyung byid mu thur / des tsi bde ba ring mo / des rong bsgom zhigs po / des bla ma yang ngal gong bkra ba chen po / des ya ngal 'bha ru / des ya ngal ston rgod / ya ngal drang srong gnyis la gdams / de gnyis la bsgoms chen shes rabs tshul khrims kyis zhus / de la zhang ston bsod ring gyis zhus / de la bdag gis zhus so / yang rgyud lug gcig la / gong bkra ba chen po la / lung bsgom rtogs med kyis zhus / des la la stod bla ma 'khrul yod / de la nyags bsgoms ring pos zhus / de la dbu ring bsgoms chen gyi zhus / de la brgyud na / bsgoms chen ston pa la zhang ston gyis zhus

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung rgyud kyi yang khyad / byang chub sems kyi gnad drug zhes bya ba'i lag len gnad drug
item.coloph: lag len gnad drug 'khor lo bzhi sb[r]ag man ngag zab mo 'di / sprul pa'i bu skyes bu gshen la gsungs / phyi rab dngos grub rnams la rim par brgyud / … bstan bsrung mkha' 'gro nag ra gdong / leg ldan tri 'i lag ring / sman btsun ma bzhi / na ga klu rigs rnam pa bzhi / zab mo'i man ngag bka' rgya dang bcas pa yod do / sprul sku ta pi hri tsas lo rgyus bstan nas / gyer spungs snang bzher lod po man chad nas / rtogs ldan gcig chod dad shes yan chad du

item.tib: ngo sprod thig le drug pa
zhal shes rnams
rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi 'khor lo bzhi sbrag
'khor lo bzhi sbrag gi yig chung
snyan rgyud bya bral rjes med
item.coloph: rjes sprul pas sku yis / rjes snang bzher lod po la gdams pa rdzogs so

item.tib: ngo sprod le'u brgyad pa
item.coloph: de skad gsungs nas sprul pa'i sku des / nam mkha' la 'ja' yal bar ltar thim nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro / … snyan rgyud zab mo 'di ni / pha ba rgyal gzigs la gdams so / des dmu tsog ge la gdams so / des dmu tso stong la gdams so / des dmu shod dram la gdams so / des slob dpon tsan po la gdams so / des gu ge shes rab blo ldan / des pu rang gi kun dka' ring mo la / des rnal 'byor gsas mchog la / des bla ma khyung byil la / des rtsis 'deb ring mo la / des ring bhom rtogs med zhig po la gdams so / des rim pa ltar brgyud pa la / des rnam sprul gyi grub chen lnga la brgyud / des bka' rgyud kyi bla ma brgyad la brgyud / des thugs rje rtse ldan pa'i bla ma gnyis la brgyud / des khung ldan bla ma bcu brgyud / des sngags sems kyi bla ma lnga la brgyud / des man ngag gyi bla ma gsum la brgyud / des zab don ston pa'i bla ma lnga la brgyud / des cig rgyud ston pa'i bla ma drug la brgyud / des 'dzam gling bstan pa'i mnga' bdag nyi ma rgyal mtshan la brgyud / [14r] drin can de'i drung du sprang btsun tshul khrims shes rab bdag gis zhus so …

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan brgyud kyis gzer bu nyi shu rtsa gcig pa
gzer bu'i 'grel pa
item.coloph: sprul pa'i sku gyer spungs nyid la gdams / grub thob rtogs ldan rnams kyis rims kyi brgyud / da lta bdag la'o

item.tib: 'od gsal sems kyi me long
rtag tshad gsal sgron
rdzogs pa chen po snyan rgyud gyis zhal gdams 'pho ba dang bcas pa
rdzogs pa chen po zhang zhung snyan rgyud kyi spyi don gsal ba'i sgron ma
item.coloph: 'di ni bla ma ba yes mdzad pa'i spyi don la gzhung blang / [54v] sa bcad yang ston gyis rnam thar che chung la sogs la brten nas / cung rgyas tsam cig blo la bzung ba / mi brjad [~brjed] pa'i phyir du bdag gis (mchan-note: …? tshe dbang rgyal po) zin ris byas pa lags so / bla ma'i spyi don ni / bcos bslad med par zur du bzhugs so

item.tib: srid pa las kyi gting bzlog gis rtsa rgyud nyi zer sgron ma
item.coloph: snying gting bzlog gi rtsa rgyud ts[o]ng ka skad nyan mtsho nag la sbas te rma pom ra'i mtsho sman mch[e]d bdun klu bdud g.ho (~mgo) dgu pa la gter srungs bkod / gter ston grub thob bra bo bsgom nyag gis dngos grub lags s.ho / bkra shis par shog / dge'o
item.margin: rtsa rgyud nyi zer sgron ma

item.tib: ma rgyud thugs rje nyi ma'i khrid rim thar lam myur bgrod
item.coloph: ces ma rgyud thugs rje nyi ma'i khrid rim thar lam myur bgrod ces pa 'di / bon sgo 'di la blo kha phyogs pa'i shar rdzas bya bral tshe ring dbang phyug dang / lhun grub thogs med gnyis kyis bskul ba'i ngor theg pa chen po la mos pa lam du byed pa'i ku sa lu rig pa rang shar gyis shar rdza'i dben ri bde chen ri khrod du sbyar ba la / thog ma'i yi ge pa ni dam pa'i dngos slob shes rab mchog ldan bdag gis sam byung ba'i ngos las zhal bshus pa bstan 'gro'i don du gyur cig / dge'o / dge'o / dge'o / mang+ga lam

item.tib: 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud kyi dgongs 'grel rnam par nges pa gsang ba mthar thug nyi zer drwa ba
rgyud kyi rgyal po gsang ba bsen thub
don 'dus rtsa ba'i 'grel chen
item.coloph: bla ma rin po che khu tsha zla 'od 'bar gyis / dbal phur nag po sde skor don gsum cha lag cha rkyen dang chas pa / spa gro'i gcal nas bton pa'o / de nas rang gi mgar ston khro rgyal la dngos grub du bab / de la bla ma tre ston gyis zhus / de la lha ston gyis zhus / mgar gyi 'od zer me la spros te / me ston rnams dang / 'a zha gshen po rnams dang / bru sha'i gshen po rnams dang / rje btsun sman ri ba chen po gong 'og nas rim par rgyud

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i bsnyan bsgrub phrin las kyi rtsa ba dbal phur gsang thig
item.coloph: gter shog la bris pa'o / bla ma zla 'od 'bar gyi sa pho stag gi lo la gter sgo phyes nas / rang snang du lha rje 'gar nag 'bum chung la bab shing gnang pa'o

item.tib: dbal phur gsal ba'i sgron ma shes bya drug skor gyis man ngag
item.coloph: bla ma dam pa bru ston nam mkha' 'od zer gyi phyag dpe blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis gtug pa'o

item.tib: sdong 'dzab gsum gsal byed kyi 'gril pa
item.coloph: bla chen dran pa nam mkhas bkrol ba / gsal ba'i me long 'grel zhes…

item.tib: spyi khog 'grel chung
item.coloph: rong pa 'gar la babs / dbus pa rgya la gnang / lha rgye jo blas zhus / de la jo bsgom gyis zhus / de la ston pa shel seng gi zhus / de la slob dpon jo rtsas zhus / de la slob dpon jo dpal gyis zhus / de nas rim par brgyud nas 'phel lo

item.tib: ka ba nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud kyis lde mig bshad thabs
ka ba nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi sa gcod
nyon mongs rang grol rgyud kyi sa gcod
dbal phur nag po'i rgyud las rgyan gyi 'od lnga
item.coloph: spa dro'i gter ma khu tsha mgar ston gco me ston / bru ston / zings syon kyi ston

item.tib: gdam pa rtsa'i sgron ma
dbal phur nag po'i gzhung las gdam don brgyad bcu rtsa drug
item.coloph: rngo btsun shes ston kun bzang gis / spa gro'i gter shog la zhu thug byas pa'o / gter ma 'o

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i kha byang
item.coloph: spyir dbal phur nag po'i bon la / kha byang re don byang re rtsis byang re bzhag pa la / mi 'khyar ba'i thabs 'di rgyud 'brel rtsa bar 'khyams pa lung don rgyas pa'i kha byang yin te / bla chen dran pa nam mkha'i shin tu dmar bar dgongs nas / mnga' bdag khri srong nyid la gtad / mnga' bdag nyid kyi lcags kyi sgrom bu dang / shing sgrom dang bse sgrom du de rnams bsnam nas / spa dro phug gcal gyi gyon phyogs… su sbas so

item.tib: gab pa mngon phyung stag la'i skyes rgyud
item.coloph: stag tshang spa gro ma / rong po mgar gyi phur mo che las /… las 'phro ldan pa'i 'gar ston la / mos gus ldan pa mkhas pas zhus

item.tib: 'jigs byed dbal phur nag po'i cha lag / dgra bgegs sgrol ba'i las kyi kha tshar / 'chams yig phyag rgya drug cu rtsa gnyis pa
thugs kyi yang gab nyi ma'i rgyud
item.coloph: de ma rgyud thugs rje nyi ma rgyud lung man ngag gsum dang bcas pa / shang rta nag dung phung [~phur] nas / sprul sku 'gu ru non rtse bton pa lags so / de yang yang ston dpal bzang bdag gis / se rib khyeng kha bla ma nam mkha' bsod nams la / dpe' stebs (bcug gin) dka' ba spyad nas bris /… mi rgun bzhi bcu zhe dgu'i bris sud+ha'o /

item.tib: rgyud thugs rje nyi ma'i lung dri med 'od gsal
item.coloph: … gyis / zhang zhung sad ne ga'u la bshad pa'o

item.tib: rgyud thugs rje nyi ma'i man ngag ye shes zang thal
item.coloph: man ngag ye shes zang thal zhes bya ba rdzogs so / zhang zhung sad ne ga'u yi sprul pa / sprul sku ghu ru mnon rtses / rta nag dung phur nas gter bton pa'o

item.tib: rig 'dzin 'dus pa thabs chen mkha' yi rgyud las dpe rtsis
rigs 'dzin 'dus pa thabs chen mkha' yi rgyud
gsang ba skabs kyi 'phrin las
item.coloph: rigs 'dzin skabs kyis 'phrin las / … 'chi med gtsug phud kyi lung don / dran pa nam mkha'i mdzad srol / stong dmu tsa gyer med kyi thugs bcud gsang ba'o

item.tib: rigs 'dzin 'dus pa thabs chen mkha' yi rgyud las bsgrub gzhung
gsas mkhar rin po che spyi spungs rtsod bzlog ya skyabs bso man dal
item.coloph: de ltar khro bo bsnyen bsgrubs kyis cha lags / sngon 'gro skyabs sems man dal 'bul ba / … gyer spungs dran pa nam mkha'i mdzad srol / sprul sku blo ldan snying po'i snyan rgyud / bar du snyan rgyud tshul nas 'byung ba bzhin du / 'gru rigs sngags 'chang shes rab 'od zer gyis / … 'brug mo dgun zla tha chung gi tshes gcig la / dben gnas bsam 'grub dgon du yi ger bris

item.tib: spyi spungs zhi khro rtsod bzlog gi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs rmad 'byung

item.coloph: rig 'dzin 'dus pa thabs chen mkha'i rgyud las / dpon gsas bla ma'i bsgrubs pa / phun sum tshogs pa ngo mtshar rgyas pa zhes bya ba / 'chi med gtsug phud kyi lung don / bla chen dran pa nam mkha'i gtan la phab cing / rjes 'jug grol thob kyi rig 'dzin brgyad las [~la] gdams pa'o / phyis bstan pa dar nub kyi dus su / stong dmu tsha gyer med kyi gnyer nas bka' gter gnyis su phyes…

item.tib: rig 'dzin 'dus pa thabs chen mkha' yi rgyud las thos chog g.yung drung gsang ba'i gzungs
rigs 'dzin bsgrubs pa'i gtor bskang
item.coloph: nang gtor mas bskang pa'i cho ga / rgyung yar bla chen khod spungs gi gtan la phab nas / stong dmu tsa gyer med la gdams pa'o

item.tib: yid bzhin nor bu'i mdos bskang
item.coloph: nor bu'i bskong chung zhes bya ba / bla dran pa nam mkha'i sham po gangs kyis [~kyi] ra ba [~bar] mdzad nas / phyi rabs kyi don du stong dmu tsa gyer med la gdams pa'o

item.tib: thugs dam dgyes spyod gyi bskong ba
item.coloph: thugs dam dgyes spyod skong gi 'phyang [~'phyong] zhes bya ba / bla chen dran pa nam ka'i [~mkhas] khyung lung dngul mkhar du gtan la phab nas / sems dpa'i rje blon stong gsum / ra sang khod ram bzhi la gdams pa'o

item.tib: bka' skyong ma mo'i mdos
dbang rgyud rin chen 'phring ba'i gzhung
item.coloph: rig 'dzin 'dus pa thabs chen mkha' yi rgyud las / thugs rje byin rlabs dbang gi 'phyang [~'phyong] zhes bya ba / bla chen dran pa nam mkha'i / mkhar khyung lung dngul mkhar du gtan la phab nas / rjes [76r] 'jug grol thob kyi rigs 'dzin brgyad la bskur nas…

item.tib: dus gsum mi nub bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan kun du bzang po nam mkha'i rgyal po thugs rje chen po 'khor ba kun grol gyi rgyud
item.coloph: de ltar bdag 'dra u rgyan bde chen gling pa 'am / rig 'dzin kun grol gsang ba rtsal gyi ma mkha' 'gros lung gi bskul ba dang gnas bdag 'jig rten skyongs mas mthun rkyen bskul ngor / [47r1] dbus phyogs yongs rdzogs rin chen brag ke ke'u tshang du rgya rim pa drug gi rgya gdab ste sbas pa grol nas bzhugs su gsol ba dag / sa pho rta yi lo la zab mo rin chen gter du spyan 'dren drangs / slar rnga chen zhes pa chu khyi sa ga zla ba'i tshes bzang por mtshan bcas shog ser ngos la sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro' dha ris la gnas / dus kyi rten 'brel 'phun sum 'tshogs pa'i bshud pa dag [~dge] / … dpon gsas g.yung drung rgyal mtshan gyis yi ger mthun skyen [~rkyen] mdzad…

item.tib: kun bzang nam mkha'i rgyal po'i rgyud las sgrib pa kun sbyongs gzungs kyi le'u
gsang ba rin chen yan lag snying rgyud

item.coloph: bdag 'dra o rgyan bde chen gling pa 'am / rig 'dzin kun grol gsang ba rtsal gyi sa rta zla tshes bzang por skang [~kong] yul dga' tshal gyis / yongs rdzong dpal gyis phug nas zab mo gter du spyan drangs nas slar lcags bya lor bod yig du btug pa'o / drung yig pa ni dmu wer [illeg.] gyis pa'i dge
gter chen ngos kyi phyag dpe la zhal bshus te len cig dag

item.tib: 'dus rin chen g.yung drung gsang ba'i rgyud las bder gshegs dgongs 'dus
item.coloph: kho bo rig 'dzin kun grol gsang ba rtsal gyis bod dang bod gyi sa mtshams / sa skyongs se chen hor gyi rgyal po'i sog rgyal khab dpal 'byor lhun grub rnam rgyal pho brang gi shar phyogs / spu rgyal ri bo'i tshe lung dpal 'bar gdong can brag gi mthil nas / rang lo so drug gi sa 'brug zla ba dang [19r] po'i nyi shar du [~dus] me tog gi char dang chas te 'dus pa'i skal ldan shag rigs bstan 'dzin grags pa gtsos lnga tsam gyi dbang po'i spyod yul du gyur par spyan drangs shing / de 'phral sa skyong mi yi dbang po tsung tshe hu rnam rgyal dbang 'dus bkra shis sogs la byin gyis brlabs nas / slar shel brag tshal du mchu [~chu] zla'i tshes bcur shog ser las bka' [~dka'] ba ched dus dpyad de tshar lnga bshus shing… bla brang gi phyag dpe gter chen nyid kyi phyag bris gter tshal bris zhus dag…

item.tib: bder gshegs dgongs pa thugs bsgrubs yid bzhin nor bu'i lung gi rtsa ba sa bon lta bu'i rgyud
item.coloph: mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pas [sa] 'brugs [~'brug] zla ba dang po'i tshes bcu'i nyi shar du / spu rgyal gnas kyi lho shar tshe lung dpal 'bar gdang can brag gi ngog dgyil [~dkyil] gyer spungs rigs 'dzin chen po'i phyag rgyas gdab pa bkrol nas / skal ldan 'dus pa'i thog mar shag rigs bstan 'dzin grags pas gtsos lcam gral lhan gyis mthong bar spyan drangs nas / … bde ldan gsang ba lhun grub khang du gtan la phab ste yig ge 'di phrin las lhun grub kyi byas…

item.tib: g.yung drung sems dpa' ltung ba bshags pa'i mdo
item.coloph: mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang grags pas gtan la phabs pa dge'o

item.tib: g.yung drung sems dpa' ltung ba bshags pa'i mdo chog 'brel pa'i man ngag
item.coloph: kho bo mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pas gtan la phebs par dge bar byas so

item.tib: ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga ngan song dong sprug g.yung drung sems dpa'i mdo
bon skyong gi mngon rtogs gsal sgron
drag btsan dmar po'i mngon rtogs
rang nyid gar 'dug yul sa'i mchod sgrub yan lag 'dod 'byung nor bu'i do shad
srid pa'i rgyal mo dre'u nag mo'i gzer bu
brag btsan dmar po'i phyi sgrub
nag po bdud kyi lha zor sri zhon ma'i phrin las
brag btsan dmar po'i bskang ba
brag btsan gyi brten 'dzug phrin las gsol ka'i bskang mdos
snyan rgyud bka' srung srid rgyal dpon g.yog gi sgrub thabs dgra srog gcod pa'i spu gri
ma bdud btsan gsum 'dzab kyi gsang sgrub
item.coloph: dbyil ston dpon gsas kyis 'gro mgon 'a zha blo gros la gtad / rim par brgyud nas bdag la'o

item.tib: ma bdud btsan gsum gyi sngags 'grigs bla med pa zab mo 'ga zhig
bstan pa'i bka' srung chen mo btsan gyi bskul ba
rang nyid gar 'dug yul sa'i bsang mchod bde legs kun 'byung
'dzab kyi dgongs them 'dod gsol
yul sa 'gras gsum
spyi rgyug mdos mchong rin chen phreng ba
spyi rje khyung gi zil gnon
spyi rgyug mdos kyi mnga' rabs
srid rgyal dre'u dmar mo'i bskangs mdos
ma mo 'dus pa'i yang snying gi rgyud las gsang ba'i mdos chen gyi gzhung
srid pa'i rgyal mo'i nang / bdud mo ru sgrub bskang gsang mdos
ma bdud srid pa'i rgyal mo'i sgos kyi gsang mdos
srid pa'i rgyal mo nang bdud mo ru bsgrub pa'i gnad bskul
nang bdud mo ru bsgrub pa'i drag bskul
srid pa'i rgyal mo nang bdud mo ru bsgrub pa'i cha lag gtor bskang
dra ba nag po'i rgyud las thugs bsgrub drag po'i bskang mdos
mi bdud gsang bskang
dra ba nag po bdud kyi bskang mdos kyi byang bu
mi bdud bya nag dbang rgyal gyi bskang mdos
bstan srung brag btsan mdos kyi mngon rtogs
brag btsan gyi srung bzlog bsad bsum mdos
brag btsan dmar po'i bskang bzlog bsad pa'i mdos
btsan rgod kyi bskang ba
dam can skyes bu'i bskul ba gnam lcags thog mda'
bstan srung pom ra'i thugs bsgrubs
skabs su 'gres byang
gzhi bdag gnyan po bang btsan gyi bstod bskul dran pa nam mkhas gsungs pa
gzhi bdag cho mchog drang srong mchod bstod 'dod 'byung nor bu'i mgul rgyan
srid rgyal dre'u nag mo can gyi mnga' gsol
mi bdud mnga' gsol
a bse'i mnga' gsol tshe nor rgyas 'debs
smad mchong mtshams med pa
mi bdud gsang mdos kyi sgo dbye lam bstan
item.margin: mi bdud sgo dbye lam bstan

item.tib: dam can brag btsan dmar po'i sgo dbye dang chas rabs
rgyal mo gsang ba'i mdos kyi cha lag gtor mdos
mkhyen gsol
dug phyung rig 'dzin tsan khrus bsang dkar rnams
bar phud
item.coloph: bar phud gser skyems kyis bskangs mdor bsdus pa

item.tib: gzhi thog rgyang 'bod
gshen po rang glud mchongs
phyi brten bskos kyi shog chung
