dbal gsas las rim gyi bsdus don nyams len nyi ma'i snying po
kun tu bzang po rgyal ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs nyams len skor lnga las phyi gnyis gcig tu dril ba'i las byang snyan rgyud a gsal 'phrul gyi lde mig
dbal gsas las rim gyi mngon rtogs mu tig phreng ba
drag po'i gur khang
khro bo dbal gsas rngam pa'i skyabs 'gro
dbal gsas rngam pa sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub gzhung
gsas mkhar rin po che spyi spung gsang sngags kyi rgyud phyag
dbal gsas rngam pa'i tshe bsgrub
srid rgyal dre'u dmar po'i tshe sgrub
'byung lnga rim brtsigs gzhal yas brjid dang ldan
srid pa'i rgyal mo'i skyabs sems gsol 'debs zhu phrin thugs rjes nyer gzigs
rgyal mo thugs kyi gzer bu'i sgrub thabs
mi bdud
dngos grub rnams gnyis blang ba na
rig 'dzin rgyud skang
dbal gsas rdzogs kyi bkang ba
srid rgyal dre'u dmar mo'i bskang ba
ma mo 'dus pa'i yang snying las gtor bskang yid bzhin nor bu
ma mo 'dus pa'i yang snying las 'khrugs bskang rgyal mo'i gnad 'bebs
dbal gsas rngam pa'i rgyud las drag po dgu skor sbyin sreg chen mo
dbal gsas bon skyong sbrag sgrub kyi phyag bzhes dka' gnad sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig
dbal gsas rngam pa'i gur khang
dbal gsas rngam pa'i srung ba'i gur khang
dbal gsas rngam zlog khyad par 'phags pa
gzhi bting gzu dpang gi gser skyems
rnga rab sgra rgyal 'brug sgras log lta
dmar chen mngon rtogs gsal byed
gtor ma'i sgron ma bdud du bkol ba
gbal gsas rngam pa'i drag bzlog
dbal gsas rngam pa'i drag bzlog gnad kyi gzer bu
drag bzlog gsas kyi snying phur
dbal gsas drag po'i bzlog mdos
dbal gsas drag bzlog gtor ma'i mdos
ltas ngan brgyad cu'i bzlog pa
stong 'jom byad ma 'bum bzlog
ling ga'i g.yen sel
gsang sngags kha tshar spyi rgyug tu / 'gug pa glog 'phreng zhags pa
bsad las rin chen 'phreng ba
drang mkhan bskul ba
yi dam bon skyong gis dmag bskol chen mo
mdos kyi sgo dbye
chas rabs
mdos kyi gser skyems chen mo
dbal gshen gsang ba'i rgyud las bsad pa srog gi mda' zor le'u
lha rgyal me tog char 'bebs
item.coloph: lha rgyal me tog char 'bebs 'di ni / shing [x] phun tshogs 'od zer ming gi thugs 'dod [x] phyir / sngags kyi bdag po bsod nams phun tshogs kyis smin grol bkra shis 'khyil gyi [x] grwa ru bgyis shing / rang dgon dkon 'jigs ming gis yi ge'i gzugs su spel ba'o

item.tib: shi ri log dbang gis snying thig bsam 'phel nor bu'i gter
gzhi ye sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud
lam mngon sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud
gsang mchog mthar thug ma rgyud thugs rje nyi ma'i 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: brgyud pa ni / bon sku kun tu bzang po / rdzogs sku mkha' 'gying dkar po / sprul sku gsang mchog mthar thug / yum chen bzang za ring btsun / de nas nye brgyud dang ring brgyud de / nye brgyud ni / rgyal gshen mi lus bsam legs / zhang zhung phug [13r] pa'i snang ba mdog can / bar pa'i a nu phrag thag / sgo pa'i sad ne ga'u / de'i lam gyi bya ra ma drug la gtad de gter du sbas so / phyis gter ston gu ru rnon rtses bton pas dar dkar ngos la btsun pa gzhon gyis zhus nas dag par bris / de la sgom pa g.yung drung skyabs kyis zhus / de'i sgom pa rin chen dpal la brgyud / de'i bka' gdams ye shes rgyal mtshan la gnang / de la kam nang so bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhus te dag par btug pa'o

item.tib: zang zang lha brag gi gter ma ma rgyud thugs rje nyi ma'i rgyud
item.coloph: don rtags bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i skyes bus gter sgo 'byed

item.tib: mdo sde khod po bskal bzang
item.coloph: de ltar dngos grub brgyud tshul cung zhig bshad pa nyid / dang po rig 'dzin mchog gi mnga' bsnyems nas / zhang zhung gu wer stong rgyung mthu chen gyis / sems dpa' brgya'i thugs bcud blangs / gsas mkhar ting mur g.yu rtse ru / ye gshen 'chi med gtsug phud la / bskal pa bzang po mdo sde 'di / dngos grub dbang rka chas pa zhus / 'gro don rgya lag phyed pa'i phyir / zhang zhung stag gzig yul du spel / de nas khyung lung dngul mkhar rtse mo ru / [313r] khod spungs dran pa nam mkha' yi / 'tshogs 'khor brgya dang rtsa brgyad btegs / zhang zhung stong rgyung mthu chen la / bskal pa bzang po mdo sde 'di / dngos grub dbang rka chas par zhus / de nas rig 'dzin brgyad la brgyud / sgra bsgyur lo pan mchog brgyad kyis / rig 'dzin lo tsa bzhi la brgyud / zhang zhung bod dang rgya gar gshen bzhi / bod du bsgyur te spel ma nus / rgya bod bon bsnubs gu ge ru / de dus gshen po bzhi bzhings [~bzhengs] nas / mdo sde zab mo phug su sbas / yang gsang sbas pa'i lde mig rnam [~rnams?] / zla 'od mkhas pas thugs la gab / phyi dus dar ba'i smon lam btab / rig 'dzin smon lam mtha' btsan nas / da lta dus babs las su sdzom [~rdzom?] / kho bo blo gros thog med la / rig 'dzin rnams kyis mchog tu rgyud / mkha' 'gro rnams kyi nyes legs ltang lang [~yang] 'dzin / sems nyid klong du bon gyi gter kha phye / sprul pa bkrid drang nges pa'i rgyud tshul ni / zla ba rgyal mtshan rnam sprul sgra 'gyur gshen / yon tan kun 'byung yid bzhin nor bu ltar / 'phrin las zad med rin chen gter gyi mdzod / dus gsum snga phyi ma rmong [313v] rnam par dag / sbyongs thob chen po yang dag rmad du 'byung / … blo gros gyer med gang gi mtshungs pa med / rang 'byung khye'u chung mkhas pa kun gyi dpal / mi yi mchog gyur smra ba'i seng ge'i / bskal pa bzang po mdo sde rnam grangs 'di / gyer spungs bka' bzhin bdag gi bkod pa las / mi brjed gzungs thob dpal 'byung lhugs pa'i tshigs / chad l[h]ag nor 'khrul mi mnga' rnam par dag / bka' dang lung las ma 'gal tha dad med / tshig gi grangs las brgal ba ci mchis pa / dus gsum bde gshegs rnams la bzod par gsol

item.tib: ye srid thog mtha' 'byung ba'i bder gshegs bskal pa'i grangs rtsis kyi mdo khro gnyen
item.coloph: srid pa mu med pa'i bon la mkhas pa / bskal pa grangs med pa'i cho rab thon pa / lha gshen bskal srid thog mtha'i bon rgyud sel bur mkhyen pa'i / skos mkhan mu cho ldem drug gi 'gag med gsung gi bstan pa ru / dpe'u tser bkod nas bka' yi gnang bzhag go / e ma ho / thugs rje bzhi ldan 'gro mgon ston pa'i mchog / mkhyen rtse stobs ldan sprul sku khro gnyen gyi / srid pa stong rtsis bon rgyud gtan la phab / 'gro ba yongs la bka' gnang bzhag pa yang / slob ma dad ldan nam mkha' 'od zer gyis / 'gro ba yongs la tshig gis skul btab nas …

item.tib: mdo sde bskal pa bzang po gling gshen nam mkha' mthong gsal la snyan du brgyud pa
go sde'i bskal bzang 'gro ba 'dren pa'i mdo
item.coloph: go sde 'phags sgom g.yung drung ye shes kyi bse 'brug nas rta'i [~rta'i lo?] zla ba gsum pa'i tshes bzhi'i nyin gter nas bton no

item.tib: gshen rab rnam par rgyal ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dpal mgon rgyal po'i gzungs
item.coloph: zhang zhung phug pa'i yul nas lo tstsha ba gyim tsha rma chung gis bsgyur pa'o … [216v1] chu dar gser mdangs can las / rke phu na ro'i gong gsing du / dag pa lha'i yi ge bod yig tu bsgyur ba'o // mchod rten ka ru'i rtsa ba nas / gyim tsha rma chung gi sprul pa dbang ldan gshen sras nyid kyis bton pa sems can 'gro ba'i dpal dang mgon du shog …

item.tib: phywa g.yang bsgrub pa'i glud 'jal byur 'gong bse rag bkar ba
nor bu rin chen bskang ba
gser 'od nor bu 'od 'bar
item.coloph: glang gshen bdag gis dka' ba'i nyams blang te / phag lo ston ra'i yar tshes bcu gsum nyin / sku bla rmog mtho'i dben sar bkod pa lags / bon 'di zab po shin tu bkra shis so / 'gro don mthar phyin rdzogs sangs rgyas par shog / [smaller letters:] sngon bsags 'bras smin mi'i dbang khro chen gyis / 'di phyi'i legs byas rgyu ru par bsgrubs dge…

item.tib: bon nyid snying po bdal pa'i 'bum rtsa
item.coloph: log lta dbyar 'jom khro chen rgyal po'i sras / sngon bsags 'bras smin skal bzang rgyal mtshan gyis / bden gnyis zab mo'i gter bzhin spar bsgrub dge / sems can thams cad rdzogs sangs rgyas gyur cig / kha lags 'brel tshad thar pa thob par shog

item.tib: bon nyid snying po bdal pa'i 'bum rtsa
item.coloph: khro chen kun dga'i dad sems bsil zer gyis / 'gro blo ku mud bzhed byed par bsgrubs dge

item.tib: bon nyid snying po bdal pa'i 'bum rtsa
lha bu pad ma 'phrul gyi mdo
item.coloph: mtshan dang ldan pa lha bu padma 'phrul gyis / zhes bya ba des / ma dmyal ba'i sas nas grangs pa'i mdo rdzogs so // e ma ho / drin chen bla ma rje la phyag 'tshal lo / tshe cig lus cig sangs rgyas ma thob par / nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can 'dren pa'i bon ni e ma ngo mtshar che / 'khor ba dong sprug na rag sgo gcod mdo / ldong rig mkhan bu bdag gi drin chen pha ma'i drin len bsam nas rtse cig dad mos gus par bzhings / bzhings [~bzhengs] pa'i yon tan dpag med 'di dag gi / bdag dang 'gro ba sems can ma lus thams cad dang / drin chen pha ma'i gtsor byas nam mkhas khyab tshad 'gro ba ris drug gi don du bsngo bar bgyi'o / tshe 'phos de dag ma lus kun / ston pa gshen rab kyi zhal mthong nas / 'bras bu bon gyi sku bde ba rin po che thob par shog / de dag thobs nas kyang / de rnams phyir rdog med pa'i sa la 'khod par shog

item.tib: drin len 'bum gyis bswabs mdo
g.yung drung bon gyi bka' brten 'gyur gyi sde tshan bsgrigs tshul gyi dkar chags nyung thus gshen bstan pad mo rgyas byed nyi 'od
srid pa'i sgron me rgyal ba'i bka' dang brten gyi rnam bshad nyung thus rab gsal nyi 'od
item.coloph: ces rgyal ba'i bka' dang bka' brten gyi rnam bshad nyung thus 'di yang / snyigs dus bstan 'gro'i dpal mgon rig 'dzin chen po / gyim tsha rma chung dngos byon mchog sprul rin po che tshe dbang rgyal po'am / sum ldan gshen gyi drang srong ba mchog gis / bka' yi nye bar bskul ba la brten nas / skam rigs kyi sdom brtson pa sman ri'i mkhan ming ba / nyi ma bstan 'dzin dbang rgyal du 'bod pa des / [106r] 'du gnas so bdun gyi nang tshan / g.yas ru mkhar gdong gi bde gsal gsang phug tu / nyams len thun 'tshams su 'phral brtsams bgyis pas / rtsa gsum lha dang srung ma'i bden mthus / mchog sprul rnam gnyis kyi dgongs bzhed / g.yung drung bstan pa'i don rnams lhun gyis grub cing / bgegs med mtha' ru phyin pa'i bkra shis par gyur cig …

item.tib: bdud rtsi sman gyi mdo dgu las gso rigs rtsa ba thugs 'bum mkha' sngon
item.coloph: gso rigs pa'i rtsa ba bdud rtsi sman gyi mdo dgu'i / mdo sde gsum pa bdud rtsi bang mdzod 'bum bzhi'i mdo las / 'bum sde bzhi ru yod pa'i le'u dang po rtsa ba'i thugs 'bum nam mkha' sngon po rdzogs so // // rgyal ba gshen rab thugs dbyings kun gsal khyon / zab mo bka' yi chu 'dzin 'khrigs pa'i dkyil / rjes 'dzin rim byon legs bshad dbyar rnga sgrogs / zad med g.yung drung bon gyi char chen 'bebs / 'dzin ma'i zhing la sems can sangs rgyas bon / bstan 'dzin skyes bu'i dpyad rigs so nam gyi / 'gro kun bde skyid dge ba'i lo legs shing / yang dag bla med 'bras bu myur thob shog // bdud rtsi sman gyi mdo dgu'i brgyud rim ni / sangs rgyas bstan pa'i gtso bo dpyad bu khri shes la gsungs / des dmu tsa tra he la bshad / des gser thog lce 'byams la bshad / des stong rgyung mthu chen la brgyud / des gyim tsha rma chung la brgyud / des ban dhe mi bdun gyi chos su bsgyur skabs / dpe cha me la bsregs pa'i grab byas dus / bon po mi bdun gyi khyer nas gtsang stod bye ma g.yung drung gsang phug du sbas / phyis dus la bab tsam na / ga ma gi ga den so bu 'tsho srid pa'i rgyal po zhes pas gter zhal phyes nas / rme'u mkhas pa dpal chen la spel ba'o / bstan pa'i gsal byed kyi zhabs 'degs kham yul rka gyi btsun pa drung mu nyi wer gyi bgyis pa sarba dza yantu…

item.tib: sdug bsngal zhi byed gso bya'i sman 'bum dkar po
item.coloph: ri g.yung drung dgu brtsegs kyi rtsa ba la / dpyad bu la sogs 'tsho gzhon rnams kyi don la gtan la phab pa'o // rten 'brel 'grigs dus su bsam yas rtse nas / ban dhe mi gsum gyis bton pa'o // de nas lha rje g.yu' thog pas zhus s+ho …

item.tib: sdug bsngal zhi byed gso' byed dpyad 'bum khra bo
item.coloph: gso byed dpyad 'bum khra bo yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba'i man ngag gi rgyud rdzogs so …

item.tib: sdug bsngal zhi byed gso' byed nad 'bum nag po
item.coloph: bdud rtsi sman gyis mdo' dgu stan la phab nas / so sor la gnyer du gtad do // rma lo dang gsum g.yu' lo dang / gto' bu 'bum sangs dang / yid kyis che'u chung dang / dpyad bu khri shes dang / lha'i drang srong mngon par shes pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / rigs par smra ba dang / ngos par smra ba dang / yid las sprul pa dang / yid las byung ba dang / yid las byung ba dang / yid las bskyed pa dang / yid las grub pa dang / drang srong chen brgyad dang / sman gyi [648v] lha mo bcu drug dang / de las sogs pa'i / phyi 'khor dang / nang 'khor dang / bar 'khor dang / bsam bsam gyi mi khyab pa rnams kyis / ston pa'i drung du phyin nas / bskor ba byed do / … [650r2] rten 'brel 'grig pa'i dus su bsam yas rtse na / ban dhe mi gsum gyi bston pa'o // de nas lha rje g.yu' thog pas zhus s+ho …

item.tib: byams ma chen mo rtsa ba'i mdo don bsdus pa sngags kyi bstod pa
item.coloph: byis khro tshang 'brug lhas zar gyi stag sna dang rtse sded yang dben rnams nas gter du drangs te / dmyal ston gzhon nu 'bum sogs la gnang pa'o // dpal gshen bstan sman ri'i tshogs 'don nor bu'i gter / sde dge'i spar dpe / ci bzhin 'khrul med pa / zhu dag ni sde dge'i ma dpe'i ci bzhin bris kyang / par dpe 'dra min gnyis thung tshe the tshom mang ba'i / par dpe gnyis cig tu bris pa yin gsungs pa'i / gru dbang rin po che'i phyag dpe nas zhal bshus so …

item.tib: byams ma chen mo rtsa ba'i 'bum
item.coloph: rje 'brug khro tshang gis gter nas bton / bla ma gzhon la dngos grub tu babs / rim gyis brgyud nas gshen mkhan chen dpon slob la / rtogs ldan shes rgyal gyis zhus so // de la tshul rgyal bdag gis lung thob tsam byas so / byams ma chen mo rtsa ba'i 'bum rdzogs so / 'bum lnga bsdus pas rtsa tshig tshom zhig gda' 'o

item.tib: byams ma chen mo yang snying rtsa ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: rta nag dung phor gsang [p. 69v] brag nas / 'gu ru rnon rtses gter nas bton / gzhon nu 'bum bdag la brgyud pa'o …

item.tib: bzlas chog rin chen sgron ma
rin chen sgron ma 'khor ba dong sprug gis mdo
item.coloph: e ma ho / bstan pa'i rgyal po g.yung drung bon 'di dag / brgyud tshul byung khung lo rgyus bstan pa la / dang po ston pa gshen rab kyi [64r] zhal nas gsungs / dus ni rnam par rgyal ba bstan pa'i dus su gsungs / gnas ni dkar nag bkra gsal rgya mtsho'i gling / zhus ni mtshan ldan yid kyi khye'u bzhi dang / kong tse 'phrul gyi rgyal po nyid kyi zhus / bka' ni rgyal po nyid la bab pa'o / rgyal pos bstan pa'i gtad rgya dam par bsrungs / ston pa mya ngan 'dis [~'das] nas gdung 'tshob mu cho byon / mu cho bka' dang bka' la bstan nas su / bon la rgyas bsdus rim pa mang por gyes / de dus sgrib sbyang rin chen sgron ma 'di / dmar la zab par gzigs nas su / bon rnams kun gyi bcud du phyung / mkhas pa chen po mu tsa tra hes / phyi rab bstan pa'i rtsa ba gter dam du gtad / dus kyi tha mar dar pa'i smon lam btab / mkhas pa chen po dmu tsa tra he si / rgyas 'bring bsdus pa thag dum du phyes nas / rgyal gshen mi lus bsam legs kyi / ri rgyal lhun po'i rtsa bar gtan la phab / 'ol mo lung ring gnas su dar bar mdzad / des kyang 'gro ba mang po kha lo bsgyur / 'bring po bar gshen yongs su dag pa yi / gsum cu rtsa gsum gnas su gtan la phab / rtsa sum lha'i gnas su dar [64v] bar mdzad / lha rnams thar pa'i lam la 'khod par mdzad / bsdus pa klu grub ye shes snying po yi / na tra seng sngon gnas su gtan la phab / 'og phyogs klu'i yul du dar bar mdzad / klu dang byol song kha lo brgyud ba'o // // phyis su zhang zhung yul du dar tshul ni / dmu'i gshen po dran pa nam mkha' de / rdzu 'phrul zhabs ldan / mngon shes rtsal mnga' bas / zhang zhung stag gzig yul du lo tsa sbyangs / bon rnams 'ol mo'i gling nas gdan drangs nas / bod dang zhang zhung gnyis su lo tsa bsgyur / res shig stag gzigs shar phyogs g.yung drung bkod pa'i gling / ri rgyal lhun po'i pho brang / 'od kyi lha ri spos mthon rtsa ba ru / shel brag g.yung drung ris kyi pho brong du / rgyal gshen mi lus bsam legs nyid la zhus / rgyal gshen nyid kyi zhal nas 'di skad gsungs / nyon cig dmu gshen dran pa nam mkha' nyon / bon skor 'di ni shin tu khyed par 'phags / khog pa'i snying dang dpral ba'i mig dang mtshung / sgrol sbyong bon la 'di bas dmar ba med / lo tsa chen pos bdag la zab par gnang / bdag gis skal ldan gshen po khyod la bstan / bon 'di gzhan bas dmar bar yid la [65r] zung / dus kyi mtha' la dar ba'i smon lam thob / de skad gsungs nas dran pa gshen la gtad / dran pas bsnams nas zhang zhung yul du 'ongs / stong rgyung las sogs mkhas pa rnams kyi zhus / zhang zhung yul na bon gyi 'khor lo bskor / cung zhig lon nas bod dang zhang zhung 'khrugs / rgya gar yul na chos zhes bstan pa dar / bon kyang res cig nyi zla 'char nub tshul / bon rnams rin chen gter gyi mdzod du sbas / de dus gyer spungs dran pa nam mkha' yi / bon 'di dmar la zab par gzig nas / rgyas 'bring bsdus pa rim pas gsum du phyes / rgyal ba gyer spungs chen po'i thugs la gab / 'bring po gang dkar sha med gter du sbas / bsdus pa mab sa pa stong rgyung phyag tu phul / phyis su dar ba'i smon lam btab / de lta dus 'dir bstan pa'i bon 'di dag / sngon gyi smon lam btab pa'i stobs shugs dang / rtsod ldan dus su gyur pa'i gnas skabs kyis / nges med sprang po stag la snyan du brgyud / bla mas lung gnang mkha' 'gro zhal nas gdam / bdag gi lo grangs gsang rgya thub par byas / da lta dus 'dir dad ldan grogs po yi / yang nas yang du bskul ma btab nas su / bka' lung gsang ba rtsa 'gags mi bya phyir / kar chags yi ge ris su btab pa 'di / bla ma mkha' 'gro tshogs la bzod par gsol [65v] / bstan pa'i rgyal po g.yung drung bon 'di dag / dus gsum nub pa med pa'i ba dan gyis / nam mkha'i mu la nyi ma'i 'od shar bzhin / 'gro don nyi zer ci bzhin rgyas par shog // dge'o // rdzogs s.ho // // 'di yi brgyud tshul ni / sangs rgyas bstan pa'i gtso bo / mtshan ldan khye'u bzhi / kong tse 'phrul rgyal / gdung 'tshob mu cho ldem drug / dmu tsa tra he / lha klu mi'i gshen po gsum / dran pa nam mkha' / mkhas pa mi bzhi / mu la rad na // // yang cig la / dus gsum sangs rgyas / rgyal pa kong tse / mu cho ldem drug / lo tsa chen po / mi lus bsam legs / dran pa nam mkha' / mu la rin chen // // yang cig la / rgyal ba ston pa / gto bu 'bum sras / yongs su dag pa / nam mkha' rin chen / rtsa ba'i bla ma / bdag la'o / sprul sku chen po'i bsnyan rgyud / rin chen sgron ma 'di / bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan gyur shog

item.tib: yang dag rin chen sgron ma'i bdag gzhan gnyis med bro
item.coloph: … lha bon yongs su dag pas / dbra btsun nam mkha' rin chen la brgyud / dbra btsun nam mkha' rin chen gyis / [5r] rtogs ldan shes rab blo gros la brgyud / rtogs ldan shes rab blo gros kyis / bdag 'gru btsun shes rab 'od zer la brgyud / de nas rim par brgyud nas / phyi rabs rjes 'brang rnams kyang de ltar spyad par bya'o …

item.tib: bzlas chog rin chen sgron ma'i phan yon bcas
item.coloph: zhes yongs su dag pas gsungs / phan yon sum bcu rtsa gnyis / ithi / …

item.tib: bzlas chog rin chen sgron ma'i btags grol chen mo
ka ba gling dgu
item.coloph: 'bum sde du ma gling dgu' 'di / dbas so kyis khri sgo nyi ma mkhar du / dbas ston pa rgyal bar la / glan ston g.yu gyis mnos / de la bdag ston pa nyag gsas kyis mnos / de la snya btsun gnyan gsas kyi gnos / de la tog zhang tshos mnos / de la dpag tshe mgon gyis mnos / de la bdag pu ston pa hor phrug mnos / de bltams pa dbang sras kyis mnos / de 'be sgom rga bas mnos / de la ngo che mchod gnas kyi mnos / de la tom shang 'tshos mnos / de las bdag dbal sgom rgyal khrims sar gyis zhus s+ho …

item.tib: g.yung drung klong rgyas kyi spyi chun lag khrigs
yig ge sgra yi mnga' dbul
gleg bam
item.coloph: stobs lnga rdzogs s.ho // [smaller letters:] slob dpon jo mkhar la zug sgom rngos grub grags kyis zhus so / bkra shis par shog / zhal sro bar shog / [even smaller letters:] ma dpe ci bzhin bris pas byin che'o

item.tib: mchod rten
item.coloph: sgom chen gshen rgur gyis man ngag gter nas brnyed pa lags s+ho / de la bdag zhu g.yas sgom chen legs pos zhus pa lags s+ho …

item.tib: mchod rten byin brlabs
lder so spyan dbye
item.coloph: de ltar spyan dbye rdzogs s+ho …

item.tib: rgyal po'i bu gto bu dod de / ngan song gnas su skyes pa drang pa'i phyir / zhag grangs bdun tshig la bstan pa'o
lha mo mun sel sgron ma mchod bskor bdun pa zhes bya ba lha mo sum brgya'i gzhung
mo khog chen 'phrul gyi rgyal po bshad byang gzhung don mdel mig dang bcas
item.coloph: mo khog chen 'phrul gyis rgyal po bshad byang gzhung don mdel mig dang bcas pa …

item.tib: phyag gshen thig pa'i bon sgo las dpyad don sgyu ma gser 'bum
mo bkra 'phrul gyi me long 'byung ba lnga'i khag rdung
item.coloph: ju ti 'phrul gyi me long nas / 'byung ba lnga yis khog rdung 'di la / mo le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa lags s+ho / 'di le'u ru 'dug pa la / gzhung kun la yod na mkhas pa su yis byed / de phyir gab sbos yid la zhog / de phyir thugs kyi dkyil du sbos / gsang la dpyad pa gal che … 'di la gtad cing brtson pa rnams / phywa gshen legs rgyal thang po'i zhal mthong par shog / sdig pa'i rtsa ba mo la lan / ces mdo las kyang gsungs / mi shes pa shes bya ba dang / ma mthong pa mthong bya ba ni shin tu rig cha yin no … [33r1] ston pa dgongs lo cig bzhengs nas / phya gshen legs rgyal thang po la / mo bkra 'phrul gyi me long bstan / sems can rnams la phan gdag phyir / rgyu yi bon bzhi mngon par bstan / rgyal ba'i bka' dang 'phags pa'i lung / bden pa chad du brjod pa dang / bdag gzhan don gnyis 'grub par 'gyur / sems can sdug bsngal rnams gnyis las … [smaller letters:] rtogs ldan smin grol bkra shis 'khyil gyi bstan pa yir rang rgyas shog

item.tib: gzungs sde lnga pa
gsang ba'i gzungs sde nyi shu
item.coloph: sa bdag klu gnyen 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi le'u ste sta / nyi shu pa rdzogs so // de ltar gsang ba'i gzungs sngags nyi shu zhes bya ba / ston pas zhu 'khor rnams la gsungs ste / g.yung drung gtsug gshen rgyal bas / mu cho ldem drug la rgyud / des mkhas pa khri thog spar tsa rgyud / nam mkha' snang ba mdog can dang / rgyal po mu khri btsan po la rgyud / [49r] des gnyis kyis shing glang zla tshes la / gnas bon chen po ri'i dbus ces par ri gyang thor / ltas snang dang rmi lam yin par dngos su lung bka' rgya med par gnang nas / me pho stag gis lo la rnal 'byor kun dga' tshul khrims gyis gtan la phabs pas / 'khor ba ma stong bar du ma rdzogs s+ho / bkra shis par shog

item.tib: g.yung drung gtsang ma'i gsang gzungs
item.coloph: khyung rgod rtsal gyis zangs zangs lha brag nas gter ma bton pa lags so

item.tib: g.yung drung gtsang ma'i sgribs sel gyi tshe mdo gzungs
item.coloph: bon thams cad kyi yang snying / gzungs sde thams cad kyi rtsa ba / snying po thams cad kyis yang bcud / sangs rgyas stong dang bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis / snying po thig le nyag cig tu bsdus pa'i / g.yung drung gtsang ma'i tshe gzungs zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho // sgrib pa kun sel thig pa'i mdo gzungs 'di / 'gro mgon tshe dbang gis / gling gshen nam mkha' mthong gsal [9v] la bsnyan rgyud rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: g.yung drung tshe mchog mtha' yas kyis gzungs
item.coloph: g.yung drung mtha' yas zhes bya ba / rma lo rang grol gyi snyan du brgyud pa rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: ye gshen gtsugs phud kyis mdzad pa'i rta lha rigs lnga'i gzungs
item.coloph: de skad ye shes gtsug phud kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do // rin po che'i rta gzung rdzogs swo / bkra shis

item.tib: lha yi bu tshe rabs tu bsrings ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: lha yi bon tshe rabs [~rab] tu bsrings pa'i gzungs gsungs so / bkra shis

item.tib: gshen rabs rnam par rgyal ba'i mtshan legs par bstod pa'i mdo
item.coloph: gshen rab bgegs las rnam par rgyal / kong tse 'phrul gyi rgya[l] po'i bstod pa rdzogs s+ho // mkhyen ldan gsal khyab spongs pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus gang dgos 'dod pa kun 'byung rnam rgyal mtshan mdo / dad ldan bzang po rgya ru dpal 'byor tshangs gis dad ldan mos gus sgo nas bzhings pas / bzhugs pa rnams kyi rkyen bzlog bar chod zhi ba dang / 'dir yang rigs rgyud 'phel zhing bkra shis 'phun gsum 'tshogs par shog // gzhan la 'tshe ba'i tha rnams kyi sdig sgribs dag nas / rnam par rgyal ba'i sku ru sangs rgyas shog / shi gson kha lag 'brel tshad don du bsngo'o // da lta bkra shis dpal 'bar tshe bso [-?-] 'dzom shog

item.tib: ngan song skye sgo gcod pa'i mdo
item.coloph: ma rigs skye sgo gcod pa'i mdo 'di / gter ston lhun grubs thogs med kyis / shog [32r] ser yig chung la sprod nas / dge bshes tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis shogs ser ma dpe la phab …

item.tib: rnam dag ye shes bon nyid dgongs pa dge spyod phyag bshag smon lam yan lag gsum pa
item.coloph: 'gro mgon rin po che lhun grubs dbang gis rgyal mtshan gyis phyag bris ma / khyung po rin po che'i yid bzhin rgyal ba tshul khrims kyis zhal bshus so / dge'o

item.tib: sdig bshags gser gyis spu gri
item.coloph: 'di ni 'tshab [~'tshams] med lnga'i bshag pa zhes kyang bya / ye shes nyi ma rang shar gyis gdam pa rdzogs s+ho / mdzad pa ni g.yung drung dgu brtsegs ri yi rtsi [~rtse] mor mdzod / mdzad pa'i dpon gsas ni ston pa gshen rabs kyis mdzad / mdzad pa'i don chad ni / g.yung drung khyim bdun gyi mo rnams kyi don du mdzad / mdzad pa'i don ni sems can sangs rgyas par dgong pa'o / 'tshams med lnga'i bshags mdo rdzogs s+ho…

item.tib: mna' bshags rin chen 'phring ba sbrul mdo dang bcas pa
item.coloph: mna' bshags rin chen 'phring [~'phreng] ba sbrul mdo dang bcas [15r] pa rdzogs s+ho / bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan 'gyur cig

item.tib: kun 'bum khra 'o
kun 'bum go 'byed rgya che'i mchod pa
item.coloph: kun 'bum rgyud sde chen po sum cu rtsa drug gi nang nas / kun 'bum go 'byed mngon rtogs rtsa ba'i rgyud las / yongs su rdzogs zhing rjes gnang lung bstan gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o // kun 'bum go 'byed mngon rtogs rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho… [69v, small and difficult-to-read letters:] rnga ljongs bon gyi 'du gnas smin grol gnyis 'khyil nas dpar / rtogs ldan dgon pa

item.tib: kun sgrol rlung gi las kun
item.coloph: kun sgrol dbyings phyug gis gzhan don gyi mchod pa'i gzhung rdzogs.hO…

item.tib: kun 'dul lcags lha
item.coloph: kun 'dul chen po'i mchod 'bum gyi gsas mkhar gyis / g.yung drung gshen rab brgya rtsa brgyad kyi smon lam rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: kun 'joms rgyal po chu lha yi gzungs
item.coloph: kun 'jom rgyal po'i rgyud las / gzhan phan gto 'bum bsdus pa rdzogs s+ho…

item.tib: bka' rab 'byams theg pa chen po man ngag gto 'dod kun 'byung yid bzhin nor bu rin po che gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde tshe g.yang dpal gsum 'byung ba'i snying po nye lam zab mo gzungs kyi rgyal po
khri rje lung bstan gyi mdo
item.coloph: shel brag gi ri bo che nas / gnyan 'thong gis bton pa'i gter ma'o // dung shog dkar po la [illeg., yi ge?] sngon po'i bris / 'di skad nas / bde bris dge ba'i rtsa ba des / bdag dang pha mas thogs drang khams gsum sems can don du sngos / rigs drug gis sgo skye sgo ngan song chod nas / bon nyid dbyings su sangs rgyas shog / [155v] de ldan blo …

item.tib: rig drug thar lam gyis mdo gnyen mthing gi gter ma
item.coloph: rig drug thar lam gyi mdo rdzogs swo // [smaller letters:] rig drug thar lam gyi mdo 'di ni / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa gshen rab / khu 'khor 'chi med gtsug phud dang / tshangs pa gtsug phud dang / nyan 'khor ye gshen gsum brgya drug bcu dang / gshen phran lnga stong lnga brgya dang / dad 'khor dang sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi zhus nas / des dang po mthu bo che drug la rim bzhin rgyud / des bar gyi gdung rgyud bcu gsum la rim par rgyud / des smad kyi mkhas pa mi bzhi la rim par rgyud / des mkhas pa nyi shu la rim par brgyud / des bsgrub gshen mkhas pa bzhi bcu zhe brgyad la rim par rgyud / de rnams kyi ring la phyi dus bstan pa dar ba'i smon lam btab nas [105r] rtsang nub ma'i brag la gter du sbas so // de nas smon lam stobs kyi ye shes dbal mo'i lung bstan nas / gnyan mthing gi gter zhel phyes nas / gnyan ston shes rab rdo rje la rgyud / des ra sgom g.yung drung la rgyud / des bru ston rgyal mtshan g.yung drung la rgyud / des yar me ba shes rab 'od zer la rgyud / des gshen ston nam mkha' rgyal mtshan la rgyud / des gshen ston ye shes rgyal mtshan la rgyud / des gshen ston blo gros sing ge la rgyud / des gshen ston blo gros rgyal mtshan la rgyud / des gshen ston kun mkhyen ye shes blo gros la rgyud / des grub thob dam pa rang grol la rgyud / des shar pa rnal 'byor la rgyud / des shes chung rin chen rgyal mtshan la rgyud / des rnal 'byor bsam gtan rin chen rgyal mtshan la rgyud / des rtog ldan kun dga' 'od zer la rgyud / des mtshun med tshul khrims 'od zer la rgyud / des gar tsha bsod nams blo gros la rgyud / des phyug gtsang bstan pa rgyal mtshan la brgyud / des sum ston rin chen rgyal ba la rgyud / des mkhas grub chen po tshul khrims 'od zer la rgyud / de nas rim bstan pa nyi zer bzhin du rgyas nas / kun tu 'phel cing dar ba legs so // de nas rigs drug thar lam gyi mdo 'di bri ba dang / 'chang ba dang …

item.tib: rig 'dzin thugs sprul g.yu lo dkar po'i gter ma rigs drug thar lam gyi mdo
item.coloph: rigs drug thar lam gyi mdo rdzogs s.wo // e ma ho // kun tu bzang po gshen lha 'od dkar gyis lung / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa gshen rab kyis gsungs / gshen 'chi med gtsug phud kyi gsungs / gsungs ba 'dus pa [~gsang ba 'dus pa] la brgyud / des nas stag la me 'bar la brgyud / des yongs su dag pa la rgyud / des rgyal rigs kyi gshen po mi lus bsam legs la brgyud / des klu grub ye gshen snying po la brgyud / des gshen nam [m]kha' snang ba mdog can la brgyud / des rgyal mu khri btsun po / des ha ra ci par la brgyud / des stags wer le wer la brgyud / des zhang zhung a nu 'phrag thag la brgyud / des rgya bon zing pa mthu chen la brgyud / des zhang zhung sad ne ga'u la brgyud / des tha mi thad ge la brgyud / des shad pu ra khug la brgyud / [113v] des spe bon thog rtse la brgyud / des spe bon thog 'phrul la brgyud / des zhang zhung stong rgyung mthu chen la brgyud / des sha ri dbu chen la brgyud / des me nyag lce tsha khar bu la brgyud / des lde gyim tsha rma chu la brgyud / gshen de rnams kyis rim mda' mtho khyung lung dngul mkhar / zhang zhung kha yug sa yi gnas 'dab na shel le rgya dkar / sum pa glang gi gyim shod yan chod na / bon gyi 'du gnas sum cu rtsa bdun / gshen bon bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang / bon chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / mthu bo che mi dgu la sogs te / srid pa'i bon rab tu gnyen zhing bzhugs pa dang / rgyal po gri gum btsan po glen pa'i ring la / bod kyis sgo ru srid pa'i thang cig nub pa lags te / gshen kyang rgyal po glen pa'i ring la / bka' khrims ma rgyug zhib nas / gshen po rnams bod yul du bzhugs pa thugs mi bde ste / lho bal mon [115r, p. 348r] gyis yul du bstan pa zugs par dgongs nas / ku hrang gson ma dang / ma he gshon ma dang / glang po che dang / kyi ling dang / 'phrul gyi bya rgod dang / de rnams la rgyu 'bras kyi bon sgo chen po dgu bka' [~bkal] te / yar yul rtseng stod kyi bye ma la g.yung drung gi mkhar la gsal bar gyis / bye ma'i mkhar la ma chag nas gshegs so / rgyu 'bras kyi bon sgo drug dang bcas te bshags so // lha mo dol sgrol nag po ru bstan pa tshugs par dgongs te / gshegs nas mi tshug pa'i rtags mang du byung ste / nam mkha' la sgron mi snyen pa dang / kha ba dang / bu yug dang / rlung dmar dang / glog dang ser pa dang / ri 'gul ba dang / sa 'jig pa dang dbyung pa ste / de yang bstan pa ma tshugs so // de nas gnam mtsho dang / lhe'u ye 'gul nas phyir log ste / rig 'dzin thams cad 'dus nas [115v] bon thams cad rin po che'i gter mdzod du sbas so // sbas nas bzhugs tsam na / gshen po rnams sum pa glong gi gyim shod kyis byang phyogs nas byung ste / steg po sprel gyis slag ba na can [~sog po spre'u slag can?] dang / 'jig mo mig dgu ma dang / hor dang rgya dang / sog po rtsa mi shing mi la sogs te / rtsa shing gi dmag gi [mi?] rnams kyang byung ste / 'di rnams bon la gnod pa'i yul grol bas / der rig 'dzin rnams kyang 'dir rgyun ma chad par bsam pa'i sa res rer phyin par gyur gcig / phyin nas phyin pa'i yul du yang / g.yung drung gi bon bka' gnyen par gyur cig / bstan pa gter du sbas nas kyang / dus tshod ma bab tsam nas / me tog gis spangs rdol ba ltar / [116r] las 'phro dang skal par ldan pa'i / bon la ye shes kyis ma [~me] 'bar rigs pa gsal / g.yung drung bon gyis rgyal mtshan / lce dkar la rkal drags pa / thabs la mkhas pa rdul thugs che ba / rkyen rnams par dag pa / rgyud thags rings la khur thugs che ba / khongs dar la zungs thum pa / bsgom bsgrub la brtson zhing yod gzhung pa / gdams ngag 'phra 'dus la mkhas pa / gter gzhan tshod zin pa / bsgom bsgrubs la btson zhing yid gzhung sa / ngag zhi la khod dal ba / bka' dam la zab pa lhod la 'grim pa'i sgyom bu / gzhon nu dal 'byor cig gis rnyed par shog / rnyed nas bstan pa tshugs shing bkra shis par gyur cig / [116v] zhes smon lam btab pas / shel gang gha ri dang / bka' rtags rin po che'i rgyas btab nas / ldem gyis tsha rma chung gis rma rgyal gter la sbas so / sbas nas rig 'dzin rnam lnga dang / dung dang bya rgod 'dabs chags du ma'i rtags la chibs nas / nam mkha'i dbyings su gshigs swo // de'i nas rig 'dzin thugs sprul g.yu lo dkar pos / lcags mo sbrul gyis lo la bkrol / dpyid la 'bring po'i gdug la gter sgo phyes nas shog ser snang la mthon do zhing la sor bzhi / yig 'phri brgyad yod pa la zhal bshun pa'o / sdug bsngal 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams / sgra tsam thos pas ye sangs rgyas par shog / logs ltos bcings shing dug lnga 'gag pa rnams / [117r] rang 'dod pal ba' / char du bab nas kyang / 'khor ba'i sems can kun 'dren smon lam thigs par shog // …

item.tib: 'phyong 'bum
item.coloph: gud phyung 'bum sde pu ti glig bam brgyad / ga rgyal bstan thugs bgyes [~dgyes] phyir / dmu rgyal bstan rnam

item.tib: bla med go 'phang bsgrub thabs g.yung drung lam gyi sgron ma'i mdo
item.coloph: lcegs byas bsod nams rgyal mtsho' bsgrub pa las / legs smin khro chen kun dga' nya zlas / tshogs lam bon sbyin par gyis zer spros 'di / legs tshogs zla ba'i ma bzhin 'phel bar shog / sarba mang rga lam /

item.tib: bla med go 'phang bsgrub thabs mdo 'jug gi gtor bzlog sogs kyi mdo skor
item.coloph: stag gzigs gi yul 'ol mo lung ring na / rang byung gi mchod rten gyi rtsa ba nas / snya li shu stag ring gis 'ongs nas / lo tsā ba stag ring gi[s] bod skad du sgyur nas / btsad po khri s[r]ong lde'u btsan la phul nas / bsam yas gling gi khri thang dur khrod kyi tsar tsa ti dmar por sbas pa'o // lcags mo bya'i lo la gter shog brtol nas / tre rgya gar ra tsas bton pa lags so // de nas dbu'i mchod ston phur pa 'bar la / dngos grub tu babs pa lags so // de la lto ba jo sras gshen rab rgyal gyis / gter shog dngos la gtugs nas bris so // 'bru re chad pa 'dra ba kun / shog ser rang la de bzhin snang ba'o // bkra shis dge'o

item.tib: rin po che gtor bzlog mdo' chen mo
item.coloph: gtor mdos rdzogs so // sngon bzo rigs ma zhig gi dus su / g.yung drung gi bon bdar ba yin te / rgya nag la mkhas pa chen po gyur pa legs tang rmong po bya ba des // gsas khang dkar nag bkrags gsal rgya mtsho'i gling thog 'bar gyis dpe' / blon po ngam stag klu gang la phul / bod kyi sa skor du / g.yung drung gi bon thang cig nub nas / rgya gar gyi slob dpon padma sam bha ba dang / jo mo mkhar che za / mtsho rgyal dang / rgyal po bdag / khri srung lde btsan gsum gyis / g.yung drung bon mchod yon / bdag po pa ma sbas te / bkags so // legs tang rmang po'i bon no / lho nub khri dang dur khrod gling du / ca ti sgo mang du bkags so // de nas sad khu ben dhes / zhig ral gso' ba'i skab nas / shog dril gyi dur shog song so / bar chod zhi nas dge legs thob par shog / bkra shis dge legs rgya mtsho bon bstan dar rgyas yun gnas shog /…

item.tib: rin po che'i gtor bzlog kyis yas re dang sngags re sprad pa
item.coloph: gshin rje'i 'chi ltas sam / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa'i gto chung rdzogs swo / zhes pa'i rgyal po sde bzhi 'chi ltas bdud kyi dal bab pa rdzogswo // co gyim bu lan tsha'i bon / bsam yas ca ti sgo mang nas btan pa [~bton pa] rdzogswo

item.tib: rin po che gtor bzlog gis po rtsal bsgyur tshul
rin po che myi'i 'chi ba bzlog pa'i mdo la gtor mdos 'bying ba
item.coloph: g.yung drung lha'i bon rin po che 'bar ba / lha bdud 'khrug pa zhi ba'i mdo' las / gshen bdud bzlog cing zhi ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o / g.yung drung lha'i bon rin po che rab tu 'bar ba'i lha srin 'khrug pa rab tu zhi ba'i mdo / ston pa gshen rab kyi rma lo g.yu lo la gdam[s] pa rdzogs swo

item.tib: gtor bzlog brgya rtsa brgyad
item.coloph: rin po che yi gtor bzlog gi rgyud las / khram phyis zhags bcad rdzogs swo / ithi / zhal dro byin rlabs shin tu che'o

item.tib: rkang gnyis 'chi bdag zhi byed mdo rin po che yi gtor bzlog
item.coloph: smon lam stobs kyi gter sgo rang du 'byung / dhar ma sad ku rin chen gyis rnyed / 'dug dbang ma byung khams su 'khyabs / gtor rgu ston pa rin dar la bab / gces par dgongs nas me tog lde mig mtha' bsgyur dang / rin chen gtor mdos / me mchod stong tsa rnams / me spel thugs kyi dkyil du sbas / dam can gcig dang gnyis spal [~spel?] rdzogs so

item.tib: rin po che gtor zlog gi gzhung drug cu rtsa cig
item.coloph: bla med go 'phong sgrubs thabs kyi nang nas 'chi ba zlog pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o / rdzogs s+ho / mangga lam / zhus so

item.tib: 'gro drug bskangs shing ris drug la sgyu ma bshad pa
item.coloph: ca ti'i gter ma yin / gco gyim bu lan tsa'i bon / bla med go 'phang sgrub thabs kyis mdo' las rin po che gtor bzlogs kyis lha srin pham rgyal rgya 'dren rdzogs s+ho /

item.tib: rin po che yi gtor bzlog nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i gzhung
item.coloph: rgyal po'i chad pa zlog pa'i mdo' / gtor zlog nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho / bsam yas mchod rten nag po'i gter ma / tra dang sad sku' sny[e]d [~rnyed] / rim par rgyud nas / rgyal mtshan bkra shis bdag la yod / sgrub rgyud bstan pa rgyan du zhal gro [~zhal sro] / bkra shis

item.tib: phyir bzlog chen mo
item.coloph: bla med go 'phang sgrubs thabs kyi mdo las / gshen rab glud kyi chang bu brgya rtsa la bstan nas / bdud kyi bar chod bzlog par bstan pa'o / bsam yas ca ti dmar po'i gter ma / tre dang se'i dngos grub du bab legs so / bsam yas dkor khang nas gdan drangs te / mdo gam smad [~mdo khams smad] du bstan pa dar ba'o …

item.tib: zhus mdo padma spungs pa yar kha brgyad kyi bkag sel
item.coloph: mdo sde padma spungs pa las sgom chen nam mkha' nyi shar gyis zhus pa ste / mthar phyin rgyas pa'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs s+ho // // mdo sde padma spungs pa las spar kha brgyad kyis bkag sel le'u dgu pa'i rgyud rim ni / dmig med bon sku'i ngang la / gzugs sku 'gro ba'i don la sprul / rgyal ba bstan pa'i gtso bo / rje rigs kyi rgyal po'i don la gsung ste / thugs sras yid kyi khye'u chung la gtong / des zhu 'khor 'od ma gsal stan la brgyud / des nam mkha' snang ba mdog can dang rgyal po mu khri btsan po gnyis la brgyud / de nas phyi shing mo glang gi lo zla dang po'i tshes nyer lnga la / rnal 'byor kun dga' tshul khrims bdag la / lha ri gyad rdo'i tser lung bstan bka' rgyas med par dngos grub gsungs nas / me yos zla tshes la bzang bor gtan la phabs pa'o…

item.tib: 'byung ba'i skag bsgyur sel gto chen po'i gzungs sngags mdo
item.coloph: spar kha zon gyi gzungs gto bsgom chen nam mkha' nyi shar gyi zhus pa'i mdo rdzogs so / 'byung ba'i sngags kyi mdo zhes bya ste e ma ho / [note the 'seals'] rgya rgya rgya / bdag 'dra mi 'gyur tshe dbang grags pas ri khrod kyi khang bzang du spel ba'o / dge'o / bkra shis zhal dro byin che'o

item.tib: g.yung drung las rnam par dag pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: g.yung drung las rnam par dag pa'i rgyud zhes bya ba / rgyud kyi rgyud du bstod pa rdzogs sho / spa gro'i gter shog la / bdag 'gar ston khro rgyal gyis dpe' blang nas bris pa lags so / bla ma dam pa zla 'od drin / u kra sig / spa gro'i gter / 'gar la babs / bru'i zhus

item.tib: rnam dag gi sgrub gzhung
item.coloph: drang srong ye shes rin chen gyis / rnam dag padma'i gsas mkhar 'dir / sgom legs bla dpe dngos la bris / zhu thug nan tan che bar bgyis / lhag chad yig 'bru cig ma mchis / phyi rab rnams kyang yid ches mdzod

item.tib: gsas mkhar rin po che thig le dbyings chen g.yung drung bsdom pa'i rgyud gsang ba don 'dus las gsang sngags bstan pa srid tshul
item.coloph: kho bo mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pa'i [~pas] shel brag tshal nas zab mo gter du bsnyed [~brnyed] de gtan la 'bebs yi ge dang po'i byed po drung yig lhun grub kyi bgyis pa

item.tib: gsas mkhar rin po che thig le dbyings chen g.yung drung yongs rdzogs g.yung drung bsdom rgyud kyi dpal gsang ba 'dus pa don gyi rgyud las gling gzhi'i le'u
gsas mkhar rin po che thig le dbyings chen g.yung drung bsdom pa'i rgyud gsang ba don 'dus las gsang sngags bstan pa'i byung khungs bka' brgyud dpon gsas kyi lo rgyus
item.coloph: de ltar gsas mkhar rin po che thig le dbyings chen g.yung drung bsdom pa'i rgyud gsang ba don 'dus las gsang sngags bstan pa'i byung khungs bka' brgyud dpon gsas kyi lo rgyus rig gsal sgron me zhes bya ba / gshen rab chen po'i bka' bzhin khod spungs bdag gis bkol byang du phyi rabs gshen gyi spyod yul brtsams pa'o / [45r] kho bo mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pa 'am / rig 'dzin kun grol gsang ba rtsal lam / g.yung drung bdud 'dul thog med rtsal gyis sum bsgrags bka' yi rgyas theb yongs su bkrol nas gtan la 'bebs par byas pa bgyis so

item.tib: rjes 'bang rig 'dzin rnams bka' brgyud kyi grub pa thob tshul bshad byang yid 'phel nor bu
item.coloph: gsas mkhar rin po che thig le nye rgyud bab byang gi mdo rtsa phyi rabs gshen po yid ches pa'i slad du bkod pa lags so / [26v1] bdag 'dra rig 'dzin kun grol gsang ba rtsal lam g.yung drung thogs med bdag la rigs ldan gyi gzungs 'dzin g.yung drung dpal sgron mas grogs bgyis te me 'brug ston zla 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga'i tho skar du / gyim shod shel le rgya dkar gyi shar phyogs seng ge g.yu ral brtse brag do dang po'i lho ngos kyi gong phu chung gi them pa kha bum gyi bar la shel brag ma brag ma'i me ri mched pa 'dra ba'i mthil gsang rgya rim pa gsum bsal te spyan drangs nas / slar lo bcu gsum gyi gsang rgya yol tshe las can dag pa'i skyes bu me btsun nyi ma rgyal mtshan dang spyang btsun tshe dbang bstan rgyal sogs bris bskul ba la brten nas / mkhas bzhi dran pa yab yum gyi phyag bris mkha' 'gro brda yi yi ge sgrub sde cha tshang la ldeb ma lnga bcu rtsa bzhi zhing sor mo gsum dkyus su mtho gang / yig phreng khyon bsdom lnga bcu rtsa brgyad yod la las rgyud lung man ngag gi go mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir du zhal bshus pa dang / dpe ma phebs pa thams cad rang lo bcu drug skabs su gsang [27] chen bkod pa'i dur khrod dam o rgyan sprin nag 'dus pa'i rdzong nas dus ngan gyi dbang gi bdud srin log pa mi ru dngos su zhugs nas rten 'brel la bar chad brtsam pa'i tsha rgyud bgags nas dbang dang byin rlabs gyi na bun yal ba med pa'i phyir du gyer spungs rin po che dngos kyis bka' brgyud dbang lung man ngag snyan du gdams pa'i don dang cung zad tsam yang ma 'jol zhing / bka' gter ma bu kha sbyor du sa sbrul zla ba dang po'i tshes lnga bzang por gtan la dbab nas / yi ge pa ni rig 'dzin chen po'i zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa'i drung yig phrin las lhun grub kyis bgyis pa lags…

item.tib: gsas mkhar rin po che thig le dbyings chen g.yung drung yongs rdzogs dpal gsang ba 'dus pa don gyi rgyud las g.yung drung gab pa srog 'dzin sngags kyi don
item.coloph: gsas mkhar rin po che thig le dbyings chen g.yung drung yongs [14] rdzogs g.yung drung sdom rgyud kyi gsang ba don gyi rgyud las g.yung drung gab pa srog 'dzin gyi sngags don bstan pa'i le'u… bdag 'dra g.yung drung bdud 'dul thogs med rtsal gyi dngos grub tu bab par spel ba dge'o

item.tib: gsas mkhar rin po che thig le dbyings chen g.yung drung bsdom pa'i rgyud gsang ba don 'dus las rtsa bsdom mdo rtsa'i lo rgyus

spyi spungs gsang ba thugs kyi brnag pa gsas mkhar rin po che bka' brgyud gsang ba 'dus pa'i tshom bu tshogs kyi sgrub pa'i gsang sngags yan lag so drug gi stong thun seng 'joms rkang pa brgyad pa'i gad mo
item.coloph: gsang ba sngags kyi bshad tshul 'di ltar spyir g.yung drung bon gyi bstan pa'i bdag po sman ri'i mkhan chen nyi ma bstan 'dzin dang / mchog chen kun grol grags pa bzhi pa bstan 'dzin tshul khrims grags pa sogs skyes chen du mas yang nas yang du gsung gsang spyi bor reg cing / … 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang po'i mi shig g.yung drung 'byung gnas rtsal yongs su grags [pas?] phyogs kyi mu khyud khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen po de yi zhal nas / khyed rang bon lugs 'di la rang rkang tshugs pa'i theg rim tshig don dwangs shing stobs che ba rgya cher mchis yod kyang / mkhas grub gong ma rnams gshegs snga bar du phebs pa rnams kyis zhib dpyod ma thub pa'i skyon kho nas phyag len bros bros tu song gshis / khyod kyis de lta bu'i tshul ma yin par bon rnying lugs bru yi phyag len bzhin / gyer spungs chen po'i bka' bsrol 'di 'ang 'grigs phyogs che shos lags na / de lta bu'i gsang sngags bshad sgrub kyi phyag len khungs btsun pa'i rgyun tshig tshugs na / phyis 'byung g.yung drung bstan pa'i zhab 'degs rgya cher 'gyur ba'i rten 'brel bzang po'i chas su 'gyur ba'ang srid pas /… rig 'dzin kun grol gsang ba rtsal gyis 'chi med g.yung drung bkod pa'i khang bzang du brtsams par / yi ge dang po'i ri mo mkhan phrin las lhun grug shes rab dpal bzang po'i bgyis pa dge legs gyur cig

item.tib: bder gshegs spyi spungs gsang ba thugs kyi brnag pa bka' brgyad tshom bu tshogs sgrub chen po'i stong thun theg pa'i grangs ldan tshangs dbyangs dgyes pa'i gad mo
item.coloph: kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang po 'am mi shig g.yung drung 'byung gnas rtsal zhes grags pa 'khor lo'i dbang phyug chen po'i zhal snga nas / … gzhan yang sman ri'i mkhan chen nyi ma bstan 'dzin dang / mchog chen po rig 'dzin kun grol bzhi pa bstan 'dzin tshul khrims grags pa gnyis nas / bstan rnying gso zhing gter sar gsar spel gyi legs mdzad phra mo yan chad snyom las dang btang snyoms su ma song bar / ci rgyas spel dgos zhes yang yang bka' gsang phebs pa dang / nyi ma nak ri bla ma 'gro 'dul grags pa dang / rigs sras tshe dbang bsod nams bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan sogs kyi gsung gsang gi rjes su gnang ba la brten nas / rig 'dzin kun grol gsang ba rtsal gyis bshad sgrub g.yung drung bstan pa'i gzhal med khang chen po 'chi med g.yung drung bkod pa'i khang bzang du bris pa dge legs su gyur cig

item.tib: dpal mkha' 'gying dbang gi rgyal po'i gar stab 'cham gyis stong thun dkyil 'khor dgyes pa'i dga' ston
lta ba khyung chen lding pa bzhugs
item.coloph: sham po'i gter nas rma yi brnyems / khams ston bdag la dngos grub bab / de rnams la rnal 'byor bdag gis zhus / zhu btug nan tan che ru bgyis

item.tib: gsang ba dgu 'phar khro gsas mkha' 'gying gi rgyud
spyi spungs 'gu ya srog 'dzin rngam gsas kyi rgyud
item.coloph: spyi spungs skor gsum 'di / 'gu ya srog 'dzin dam tshig rgyud / kun bzang thugs sprul bla chen gyis / sham po dpal la gter du sbas / nam zhig dar 'gyur smon lam btab / dran pa sprul pa rma ston gyis / bton te bskal ldan yongs la spel / skal med gshen skur 'debs pa la bag [~gab?] / mtshan ldan rma ston shel seng la / dpon chen mthong bzhi smon lam btab dbang gis / sgo gsum gus phul dad pas zhus / shog ser sum gtub brgyad la ni / yig 'phreng brgya dang zhe lnga gdab / dpe dag bya ste lhag chad med / dpon chen lho pa tshul khrims 'od zer gyi dpe / sham po'i skor rnams rdzogs par 'don mas [~nas] bris

item.tib: sgyu 'phrul dra ba spyod pa gting rdzogs kyi dbal gsas rngam pa'i rgyud
las kyi thig le phrin las gtum gsas kyi rgyud
thabs kyi zhags pa ye shes nyi ma'i rgyud
item.coloph: rom po spo mthon gyis shar nas rdza mkhar pa bslang ba 'dra ba gcig yod / de nas lho shar 'dzur ba nas / sbal pa ha la gab pa 'dra ba gcig yod / de yi g.yas ngos 'dom gsum gsal ba ni / chu mig gcig yod / de yi 'og na rdza me long 'dra ba gcig yod / dkyil 'khor nag po gcig yod / de la tshad bzung pas / shing gcig 'dom gong na yod / shing gi gnan rta sga 'dra ba'i khang pa na / bse sgrom chu dar gyi dril ba gnyis yod do / gdug pa can lo bzhi la ra ba bzhi la gnon no / [15] gter srung rom po lha btsan lcam sring gsum la gtad do / shog ser sum gtub gsum la zhal bshus / spo mthon nas / shar du hrim rgyang gang na / rdza mi rengs bslang ba 'dra ba gcig yod / de yi g.yas na rdza gur dkar phub pa 'dra ba gcig yod / de nas dran pa'i gnas / rkya yi mkhar rnga dang bcas pa yod / 'og gter yod / [16r3] khro rgyal rin chen phyag dpe la / 'gru rigs mi yi sras po grags pa rgyal gyis zhus so / ldong btsun grags pa 'od zer la / 'gru rigs kyi sras po nam mkha' 'phel gyi zhus so

item.tib: ngag yod gsal ba'i sgron ma
yang rtse g.yung drung gsal ba'i sgron ma
sras yum thugs kyi gnag pa
gting zlog che ba'i chung ba khro bo yang thus kyi cha lags
gsas mkhar
item.coloph: gnyan li shu stag ring gyis / tshes pong za ba dmar mo rgyal gnangs so

item.tib: srung ba man ngag yang tig
spyi spungs zhi khro'i rab gnas rtsa sdom
item.coloph: rab gnas rgyas pa mdo dril gyi rgyud gzhung 'grel [15v] rnams ni / yar lha dang / sta bu 'dron nas lhas dang / byi ba 'khar la yod do / 'di ni khye'u dran pas gces par gzigs te / rtsang stod gro shod rnga thog g.yu mdor gtan nas sku rgyud lo / dus la bab dus sprul pa'i bu yis ni / rgya'i 'phrul yig ram yis bdug pa ltar / [16r] spyi spungs rab gnas khyad 'phag 'di la / rter shog dmar po kha dras drug rda ba la / log re la 'phreng bcu lnga bcu drug bcu bdun re rta bsngos la zhal bshus pa lags so / dpe dag du 'bru len byas nas dag par btugs so / gtsang gi stod gro shod rnga tho g.yu lung mdo yi ster ma'o // ldong gi btsun pa rter ston rgyal mtshan g.yung drung bdag gis dngos grub lags so

item.tib: khro bo sku gsung thugs kyi sgrubs thabs kyi 'grel ba gsal byed 'phrul gyi me long
item.coloph: de ltar khro bo sku gsung thugs gsang sgrub / dbal gsas rngam pa las rim gyi 'grel ba gsal byed 'phrul gyi me long zhes bya ba / 'a zha blo gros rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba la / sro drad pa ye shes kyi bskul ste / khab lung dben sa khar sbyar pa rdzogs so

item.tib: bka' gsang me ri 'bar ba rtsa ba'i brgyud
item.coloph: me ri 'bar ba rtsa ba'i rgyud las / gter nas thon nas shog ser ma nor ba las / 'gal ston gyi bris so / bdag 'gar ston khro 'dul bas / … 'gar ston 'dzin rten grag la / sga ston g.yung drung rgyal gyis zhus so / da la yon sgom a gsas kyi zhus so

item.tib: me ri 'khyil ba man ngag gi rgyud
item.coloph: spa dro'i gter shog la zhal bshus so

item.tib: me ri 'od gsal phrin las kyi rgyud
item.coloph: de nas sa pho stag gis lo la / bla ma khu tsha zla 'od kyis spa gro'i phug gcal nas gter sgo phyes nas / rong du lha rje 'gar nag la 'babs shing dngos grub tu gnang pa'o / de yi shog ser dpe yi phyi mo la 'gal [~mgar] ston khro rgyal gyi dpe blangs nas bris pa'o

item.tib: me ri gsang ba 'khor lo'i rgyud
item.coloph: gsang 'dus nas snyan du brgyud na / bla ma lha sgoms / dngos grub rgyal mtshan / rje 'ol sgom kun 'dul / yang ston chen po nas rim par brgyud nas / slob dpon bstan pa rgyal mtshan / des bstan pa 'od zer / des dre ston phun tshogs grags pa / des rtsa ba'i bla ma 'khrul zhig g.yung drung tshul khrims kyi drung du bdag gi zhus so

item.tib: me ri gsang ba 'khor lo zhes bya ba yi zab don
item.coloph: bla ma g.yung drung lha rtse la / ra zhag wer lo yis zhus / de yi sras stong rtse'i zhus so / slob dpon pe gar rtse la / ston pa grags mos zhus so / da lta bdag brtson 'grus 'od zer gyi dpe cha'o

item.tib: ge khod bdud 'dul rtsa ba'i rgyud chen mo
item.coloph: zhang zhung bon sde kun gyi bcud 'dus pa / zhang zhung rgyal po'i bsrung / sku brtsegs dang bcas pa'i bon / rgyud cha lag 'am bur 'char ba 'di / zhang zhung stag sna rgyal pos / khri ldong khang la gtad / des ston khra 'od gsas la gtad / des zhang zhung gsang ba'i gtang rum las / des sad ne ga'u las / des rgyung ne khod spungs las / des hris pa gyer med las / des co min gyer chen / des this dmar spung rgyung / des dran pa nam mkha' las gtad cing rgyud pa'o / … sprul sku khyung rgod rtsal la dngos grub du bab pa de nas rim par rgyud nas

item.tib: ge khod me ri 'khyil ba dbang gi rgyud
nyon mongs dug 'dul ye shes 'khyil pa'i rgyud
gsas mkhar bskyed mi dgos
gsang ba don 'grel
gcig spu gri dkar po mu med nam mkha'i gsal sgron gzhung le'u dgu pa
spu gri dkar po sngags sems dang po 'byung srid thugs rjes nyi ma shar tshul
item.coloph: stag lha me 'bar gyi mthar thug bstan pa dgongs mnyam khyad par can / gshen rab mgo dmar la gdams pa

item.tib: stag lha me 'bar mi 'jigs bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yi brgyud
srung ba ye rdzongs kyi rgyal po phur kha stong rdug
spu gri bsrung ba'i gdams pa
dun tse gsad pa'i brgyud
stag lha me 'bar gyi zhal gdams
item.coloph: stag lha me 'bar gyi thugs bcud / phung bon nyid la bka' yi gnang / smon lam dbang gi gter nas thon

item.tib: spu gri dkar po lta ba mthar thug gi ting 'dzin
item.coloph: ston pa gshen rab kyis phung bon mgo dmar la gdams / … de nas phyi dus bskal pa la / phung bon mgo dmar gyis / kyu ra la snyan du rgyud / … kyu ra rin chen nas rim par brgyud nas nyi ma rgyal mtshan la 'o

item.tib: khams brgyad gtan la phab pa stong phrag brgya pa rtsa ba'i 'bum
srid pa mdzod kyi mdo 'khor 'das khams kyi rtsa ba g.yung drung las rnam par dag pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: bon 'di dang po ston pa gshen rab nyid kyi gsungs te / 'jig rten mi yi yul du skad rigs mthun pa sum brgya' drug cu bzhags / de nang gi theg rgyud kun don drug rgyud lung man ngag gsum du gsungs pa / de nas 'khor gyi zhu ba po brgyad dang / dad pa can grong bdun dang / rgyal rigs chen po bzhi dang rnams kyi mdzad / de nas sras rma lo dar dpyang dang / mi lus bsam legs dang / yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes snying po dang / snang ba mdog can rnams kyi mdzad / de nas mthu chen mi dgu / mkhas pa mi bzhi dang / sku srung sde bzhi dang / gar mi spun gsum rnams kyis mdzad / dus de tsam na / mnga' ris bon skor du 'gyur ba lags / dus der rgyal po dang bon po dregs rtse gtod nas / tha ma bon thang cig nub pa'i dus la thug pa lags so / dus dang las su 'joms tsam na / rgyal rmangs su bab / bon mtha' nas dar / gshen [130] dbus nas btsun pa'i rgyu lags so / yul rdung gi chu drag can du / gter bdag gi bda'i sprul pa / des rma srid 'dzin la byin / chad rung lhag rung bla dpe ci bzhin bris so

item.tib: srid pa mdzod phugs kyi gzhung
item.coloph: zhang zhung stong rgyung mthu chen dang / bod sha ri dbu che[n] gnyis kyis / yul bod dang zhang zhung gi ru mtshams / bye ma la g.yung drung chu mig brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'go bor / gshen rab mi bo'i bka' gzhung las / bod dang zhang zhung gi tshig gis tshom rdeb nas / snang srid gtan la pheb pa rdzogs so

item.tib: bA ga yangs ma kun 'byung dbyings dag brgyud
item.coloph: 'dul ba kun 'byung dbyings dag rgyud / ston gsum gyi bka' khrims / bam po gsum pa'o …

item.tib: 'dul ba kun 'byung dbyings dag rgyud
'dul ba dus chen brtsan dom byed rgyud
'dul ba yongs rdzogs rnam dag sdom byed kyi rgyud
item.coloph: 'dul ba yongs rdzogs rnam dag rgyud / rdzogs so…

item.tib: 'dul ba so sor thar pa'i bye brag rgyud
'dul ba nyams gso lam sdom rgyud
'dul ba spyi ltos 'gog pa sdom byed rgyud
'dul ba don gyi kun brjod
rgyud ting mur g.yu rtse
item.coloph: ma mkhar lcags 'phrang la sbas / nyi zer bzhin du dar bar 'gyur ro / yum sras lnga la gtad do / rgyud ting mur g.yu rtse 'di la shog ser kha ris 'phrang bcu drug nas bcu gnyis pa 'dug pa'i dpe la dag par bris so / mtshan ldan dpon gsas bla ma la / las ldan chag ston de'i zhus / de nas rim par rgyud nas da lta tshul khrims dpal bdag la'o // 'di bzhengs dge tshogs kun gsal ngor…

item.tib: gsang sngags rdzogs 'phrang gsal ba'i lde dmigs
mu le sgron bu rin chen 'phring ba
item.coloph: rma gnyen pom ra'i gter ma / sprul sku rnal 'byor gyis dngos grub lags so / bya bral shes rab 'od zer la rgya rus zhus so…

item.tib: rgyud dung lo ljon pa bdud rtsi sgrub pa spyad kyi mdo
item.coloph: rgyud dung lo ljon pa la dbu bshad dang po'o / le'u gong ma'o… [smaller letters:] yang cig dag pa dgos

item.tib: gsang ba sngags kyi rgyal po pha rgyud rig pa khu byug gsang mchog mthar thug rgyal po rtsa ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: gtsang mchog rig pa khu byug rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so // // ithi // u ya… gsang ba'i man ngag gab sbas gsang sbas mdzod dge'o…

item.tib: dbal gsas drag zlog gi rgyud stong ri tho chen
item.coloph: ces rtsa rgyud stong ri tho chen 'di / a dkar bon gyi yang snying yin / rgyud rnams kun gyi yang rtse yin / sham po'i dpal la u tra sig / phyi rabs bstan pa bsrung bar shog… bla ma rma ston gzhon bzang la / theg pa rim dgu'i bon stong mnga' / skal ldan 'bru btsun [a note here reads: gzhon 'bum] gyis zhus te bdag la brgyud pa'o // de nas rim par brgyud nas da lta la'o…

item.tib: stobs bzhi'i bshags sdom byed tshul nyes ltung drungs 'byin
'chi med tshe la dbang ba'i rig pa 'dzin // nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha' sgron gsal gyi // skyes rabs rnam thar gsal bar bkod pa las // ngo mtshar dpal gyi nyi zla'i 'khor lo
item.coloph: ces pa stong gsum stong gi spyi rje 'dzam gling bstan pa'i sgron me theg mchog sngags kyi bdag nyid g.yung drung bon gyi gtsug rgyan 'chi med tshe dbang rig 'dzin chen po'i rnam thar ngo mtshar dpal gyi nyi zla'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba / spyi rje khyung gi rwa lta bu / chu srin gre ba'i bcud lta bu / 'dod pa 'byung ba'i rin po che lta bu 'di ni / 'gro 'dul bstan gnyis gsang sngags gling pas sa glang zla ba'i yar [237v] tshes nyin bar rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro'i lung bzhin mdo khams gnas chen nyer lnga'i g.yas mdun / dpa' bo rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro bye ba rtag tu gnas pa'i mtshan yang bye ba rtag rtse zhes bya ba'i rgya bod so mtshams mtha' 'khob skyob pa'i gnas chen dbal so gangs kyi ra ba lta bu'i bkod pa rdzogs pa'i rang byung shel dkar mchod rten la sku gsung thugs rten bcas spyan drangs shing lo dgu'i bka' rgya yod pa las / cung zad phyis dbang song bas lo bcu gsum 'das pa'i tshe / sngar nas gong ma'i lung gis bsngags pa'i bstan pa'i bdag nyid / bon gter rgyal dbang kun grol lnga pa 'chi med bdud 'dul gling pa dang / mi 'gyur bde chen gling pa ste gter chen bla ma rnam gnyis kyis bka' gter babs dgos kyis gnang ba dang / khro tshang mchog sprul g.yung drung mthong grol dang / dbal khyung mchog sprul g.yung drung tshul khrims / [238r] bya btang mchog sprul g.yung drung nyi ma ste / sprul pa'i sku gsum gyis tshe dbang rnam thar phabs dgos kyis gsung gi bka' gnang ba dang / shar rdza'i rnal 'byor bkra shis rgyal mtshan dang / bkram brag rnal 'byor g.yung drung bstan pa / lcang lung rnal 'byor rab brtan shes rab ste rnal 'byor pa gsum gyis yang yang zab gter phabs dgos kyis nan cher mdzad pa dang / smon rgyal rgyal sras 'chi med gtsug phud dang / dbra ba'i rgyal sras zla ba grags pa dang / rong rgyab rgyal sras tshe dbang 'gyur med de / rgyal ba'i sras gsum gyis mkha' 'gro'i brda' phabs dgos kyi gsungs byung ba dang / khro rigs dbon po yid bzhin dbang rgyal dang / sgang rigs dbon po rin chen rnam rgyal dang / khyung rigs dbon po nyi ma rgyal mtshan gsum [238v] gyis bka' rnams phabs dgos kyi sa mtshams sbyar ba dang / nye bar zab gter sgo brgyar 'byed pa'i lde mig lta bur gsang grogs mkha' 'gro dbang gi sgron ma dang / sum ldan rnal 'byor pa ye shes rdo rje dang / chos kyi gter ston dri med 'od zer ste / lhag par dam pa'i chos bdag gsum gyis rim par bskul ba dang / thogs mthun dam pa g.yung drung ye shes dang / g.yung drung dbang ldan dang / pad+ma tshe ring ste nye gnas mang po'i zab gter phabs dgos kyis zhu nan bgyis tshe / chu stag zla ba gsum ba'i tshes bcu la shar rdza'i dben ri g.yung drung lhun po'i ri khrod bde chen gling du zab gsang mkha' 'gro'i brda ris bod yig tu phab pas / dge des bstan pa spyi dang dgos su zhwa dkar bon gyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas shing 'gro rnams 'chi med tshe dbang rig 'dzin gyi go 'phang [239r] thob pa'i rgyu ru gyur cig// om swa sti / dge legs dpal ldan lha gshen bon dang gsum // … de'i phyir stod khams nor bus bkang bas kyang // zongs su 'ongs min dam pa'i rnam thar phul // gzugs su snang ba glegs bam bzhi yi grangs // rnam mang skye dgu'i dbal du khyab pa'i phyir / 5 / dpal ldan dbal khyung bla brang spyi sgos nas // mdzad med gtong phod mdzod kyi sgo phyes nas / gcig las du mar 'char ba'i zla gzugs tshul // par gyi phyi mo 'di nyid legs par bsgrubs / 6 / 'di las byung ba'i dge tshogs gang mchis mthus / … [240r] ces pa'i spar byang smon tshig nyung bsdus 'di yang grub rje nyid kyi 'bangs khod po skal bzang rgyal mtshan gyis bris pa tha tshan mu tsug smar ro // …

item.tib: gnas kyi dkar chags dang lung bstan thob tshul
item.coloph: zhes pa lung bstan dkar chags 'di / grogs 'gas bskul phyir gter bdag pos / shar rdza'i ri la bris pa'o // rgyal ba gnyis pa tshe dbang rnam thar gyi // gter gnas phye ba rtag rtse'i dkar chags 'di // dbal khyung bla brong yon sbyar spar 'di skrun // dge des bstan 'gro'i don cher lhun grub shog …

item.tib: gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi zab lam dbang gi las tshogs zab yangs chu gter nor bu dbang gi gter chen gyi bum pa bzang po'i tog rgyan gyi yid 'phreng
ma rgyud tsag 'bring bo'i rgyab yig
gsang sngags ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i gar gyi lag len bde ba'i yan lag lha dbang rgyan gyi yid phrog
item.coloph: ma rgyud gsang ba mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i / gar gyi lag len lha dbang rgyan gyi yid 'phrog zhes bya ba / dmu rigs nyi ma'i ming can gyis brtsams pa dge legs 'phel / grub pa gshen gyi gnas mchog gter gyi gnas chen 'bring mtshams mtha' dkar gshen gyi gzims khang du brtsoms pa'i me byi zla ba bcu pa'i tshes gsum la dge

item.tib: gsang sngags rol pa sde lnga'i phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang gsang ba mchog gi nor bu 'bar ba'i dbyig gter dga' dbang 'khyil pa'i tog
item.coloph: gsang mchog nor bu 'bar ba'i dbyig gter dga' dbang 'khyil ba'i tog ces bya ba / … dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can bya bas brtsams pa dge legs 'phel / chu mo lug gi lor zla ba drug pa'i tshes bcu gnyis la [14r] rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang du grub par bgyis pa dge'o

item.tib: lung gi thig le nang gi lha dbang
gsang sngags ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i zab lam dbang mchog 'dzam gling gter gyi snang ba yongs su dag pa'i dpal
item.coloph: de ltar gsang sngags ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i zab don dbang gi mdor bstan 'dzam gling gter gyi snang ba yongs su dag pa'i dpal zhes bya ba / … dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'gro ba'i don bsam te … me mo phag gi lo hor zla bzhi'i tshes bcu drug gi nyin / sa skyongs mi dbang chen po bzhugs pa'i rgyal sa lhun grub steng du grub par bgyis pa dge legs 'phel / dmu rigs gshen gyi gdung 'dzin zhabs drung bstan 'dzin dbang rgyal gyi phyag dpe la yang yang zhal bshus so

item.tib: rgyud kyi thig le gsang ba'i sngags dbang
man ngag thig le yang gsang kho na nyid kyi dbang
item.coloph: bde ba'i yan lag nges par rtogs pa'i shin tu bde bar zab yangs chu gter nor bu dbang gi gter chen gyi bum bzang / me tog rgyan gyi yid phreng zhes bya ba / … dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma rgyal mtshan zhes bya bas / legs par brtsams te / … [16v1] shing pho byi ba'i lo zla ba gnyis pa'i cho 'phrul chen mo'i zla ba'i tshes bcu drug nyin dang ra g.yu bun gyi mtsho 'gram / sta sgo gangs chen gyi [song pi?] / ri khrod pa chen po'i bzhugs sa'i mdun / shar phyogs su gyur pa'i sa gnas 'gron dpal gyi nyin zhes bya bar grub pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi nang nas sdong po dgu 'dus kyi lha dang theg pa'i mtshan nyid de dag gi dbang bskur 'chi med rgyal ba'i nor bu nam mkha'i gter mchog
item.coloph: 'chi med [7v1] rgyal ba'i nor bu nam mkha'i gter mchog zhes bya ba / … dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i dbang pos / byang gi sa gnas sel gong sngon zhes bya bar brtsams pa dge legs 'phel / shing byi zla ba bzhi pa'i nyi shu la bris

item.tib: gsang mchog ma rgyud kyi dbang gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa'i lag khrid snang ba rtsal gyi 'khor lo
item.coloph: ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbang chog nye bar mkho ba'i snang ba rtsal gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba … dmu rgyal gsang ba'i nyi ma'i rtsal can gyis brtsams pa dge legs 'phel / byang gi sa gnas rta sgo lha btsan gyi mdun du brtsams sa stag zla ba drug pa'i tshes bzang la dge

item.tib: mkha' 'gying rigs lnga'i dbang bde ba'i yan lag g.yung drung 'khyil ba bdud rtsi bum bzang
item.coloph: dmu-rgyal rnal-'byor nyi-ma'i dbang-po (i.e. dmu-rgyal nyi-ma rgyal-mtshan). place: byang-gi gnas dgongs-sngon

item.tib: mkha' 'gro chen mo kye ma 'od mtsho'i dbang gi sbyin sreg mngon rtogs dngos grub nor bu 'od 'bar
item.coloph: de ltar sbyin sreg nor bu 'od 'bar zhes bya / gshen nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa la / 'phrin las go bde 'grig rim 'di / bla ma'i gsung bzhin bon drung tshe dbang 'od zer gyis dpal ldan zangs ri dbu rtser bla brang du sbyar ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: phyag rgya bzhi'i las sbyor nor bu rgyan gyi dril dbyangs
item.coloph: nor bu rgyan gyi dril dbyangs zhes bya 'di / … ces dmu rigs nyi ma'i ming can gyis / me byi spel zla'i ga ma khri brten nor bu rtser sbyar ba yin

item.tib: bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa nang mchod rgyas par ston pa yol chen bdud rtsi'i gter ldan
item.coloph: bam chen 'bar ba'i snying khrag ces bya ba dmu rigs nyi ma'i ming can gyi 'bring mtshams mtha' dkar gshen chen nyid kyi gzim khang du brtsams pa bstan pa'i rgyan du dge legs 'phel / me byi zla ba bcu gcig pa'i tshes gcig la dge

item.tib: 'phrin chog lag len dbang gi dgos 'dod dpal gyi pad mo dges tshal
dkyil 'khor bcu drug gi bzlog pa'i bca' dpe bstan pa
gsang sngags zab lam dkyil 'khor bcu drug gi chog khrig dga' ba'i tshal chen
item.coloph: de ltar gsang sngags dkyil 'khor bcu drug gi chog khrigs dga' ba'i tshal chen zhes bya ba / … dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyi sa gnas rta sgo gangs chen gyi mdun du brtsams pa dge legs kun tu 'phel / sa stag zla ba drug pa'i tshes nyi shu'i nyin du lcags [~ljags] rtsoms grub par mdzad pa dge'o

item.tib: gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor bcu drug zab lam kun 'dus rol pa'i gter chen don gyi snying po
item.coloph: dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma yis / … lcags stag zla ba lnga pa'i nyin / khri bstan nor bu'i rtser brtsams

item.tib: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug pa'i tshig don nges par rab bsdus mtshan brjod gter gyi pad mo yongs su bkod pa
item.coloph: ces gsang sngags gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug pa'i tshig don rab tu bsdus nas nges par mtshan phyag brjod pa gter gyi pad mo yongs su bkod pa zhes bya ba / dmu rigs nyi ma'i ming can gyis gnas chen 'bring mtshams gdong nag dgon du me byi zla ba bcu pa'i tshes nyi shu gsum la brtsams pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: zab lam sngags kyi dkyil 'khor bcu drug pa'i bstod pa dur khrod gsang ba rol pa'i rgyan
item.coloph: sngags kyi dkyil 'khor bcu drug pa la mchod bstod rnams dpyod gsang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba / dmu rigs nyi ma'i ming can gyis brtsams pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: gsang sngags nang gi lha dang srung ma'i bskul ba dmod sngags drag po srog gi sha zan snying khrag 'bar ba'i phreng ba
item.coloph: dmod sngags drag po srog gi sha zan snying khrag 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba bstan pa'i dgra bo bsgral ba'i ched du dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis / dge sding spe'u chen du brtsams … lcags yos hor zla brgyad pa'i tshes bco brgyad la grub par bgyis pa'o

item.tib: ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i 'gugs pa

item.coloph: dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis mdzad pa dge legs so

item.tib: gsang mchog ma rgyud lha tshogs kyi nang nas dpal mgon yab yum brgyad kyis dgra bla 'gugs pa
item.coloph: dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis khri brtan nor bu rtser g.yul ngan rkyen gyis bskul pa'i tshe brtsams pa'o

item.tib: sbyin sreg nyi ma 'bum 'od kyi shing byang 'bri lugs
item.coloph: las bzhi so so'i kha bsgyur 'di yang tshul khrims bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis phur sgrub skabs su sbyar …

item.tib: sbyin sreg gi bgres byang
sbyin bsregs bya ba'i las tshogs
sbyin sreg nyi ma 'bum 'od kyi shing byang
kun rigs rgyun gyi me sbar
ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i lha tshogs mchod pa'i sbyin sregs nyi ma 'bum 'od gsang ba'i me dpung 'bar ba
item.coloph: dmu rigs nyi ma'i ming can gyis / byang gi sa gnas st[o]ng rgyung gi gser do rgang chen zhes bya bar brtsams … shing phag zla ba lnga pa'i tshes nyer lnga la dge'o

item.tib: 'gres byang
gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi sbyin sreg gi dgra lug
gsang sngags ma rgyud kyi dpal mgon lcam dral bcu drug pa'i bskul ba dang sbyin sregs las thog mda' 'bar ba
item.coloph: ces dpal mgon lcam dral bcu drug la gtor mchod sbyin sreg bya ba'i las nye bar mkho ba'i thog mda' 'bar ba zhes bya ba 'di / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis / khri brtan nor bu'i rtser yul ngan rkyen gyis bskul ba'i ngor brtsams …

item.tib: gsang sngags kyi lha tshogs la yan lag drug cu'i sgo nas bstod pa pad+ma'i snying po don gsal
item.coloph: ces gsang sngags gsang ba'i lha tshogs la mchod pa'i yan lag bcu pa'i ngos nas yan lag bye brag gsal bar ston pa pad+ma'i snying po don gsal zhes bya ba / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i dbang pos byang gi sa gnas rta sgo rtsal gyi mdun sgro ba gzhung 'dzin gyi gnas su brtsams pa dge'o / … sa stag zla ba drug pa'i tshes bcu drug par dge'o

item.tib: gsang ba 'dus pa la gsang ba'i gnas dgu'i mkha' 'gro mas bskor ba'i zhing bstod dar tshon rgyan gyis dpal la rol lo
item.coloph: ces gsang 'dus mkha' 'gro gnas bdag dangs pa las mchod cing bstod pa 'di dag dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis g.yu brag gi mdun sa mo cher brtsams pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: mkha' 'gro'i las byang pad+mo dbang gi phreng ba yid 'phrog gter gyi rgyan ldan
item.coloph: de ltar mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i las byang nye bar bkod / dkyil 'khor zab mo'i lag len rang sngags tshig gi bskul 'debs / padmo dbang gi phreng ba yid 'phrog gter gyi rgyan ldan zhes bya ba / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i dbang po'i byang gi dang chung gi sa [9v] gnas su brtsams pa dge legs 'phel / … shing mo bya'i lor hor zla dang po'i tshes gcig gi nyin grub par gyis

item.tib: gsang mchog 'khor lo bsdud chen gyi 'phrin chog nye ba zab lam du bstan pa nor bu dbang gi 'od zer rgyas pa'i gter 'phreng
item.coloph: lcags stag hor zla lnga pa'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin / dge sdug dpe chen gyis rab gsal [17v] mngon dga'i zhing khams su brtsams pa dge legs 'phel lo

item.tib: gsang bdag 'khor lo sdud chen las mngon par bstod pa'i tshig rgyan lcags kyu 'bum 'phrag 'bar ba'i 'phreng zhags
item.coloph: ces gsang bdag 'khor lo sdud chen bya ba la mngon par bstod pa'i tshig brgyan lcags kyu 'bum phrag 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba / dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i ming can gyis grub pa gshen gyi gnas mchog ri rgyal dgon rtse'i rab gsal mngon dga'i gnas su brtsams pa dge legs 'phel lo / sa glang zla ba gsum pa'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin grub pa'o

item.tib: gsang sngags gsang chen ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i nyams pa bskang zhing dam tshig gso ba'i yan lag bung pa rtsi'i rol pa snang ba dpal gyi gter phreng
item.coloph: de ltar gsang sngags ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho yi / nyams sgrib byang ba dam tshig bshad sbyangs grub pa'i skabs su gsol bar bya zhing / bde ba'i yan lag kyi bung pa rtsi rol pa snang ba dpal gyi gter phreng zhes bya ba / rnal 'byor nyi ma'i dbang pos / byang gi sa gnas smug po'i ri zur gyi gnas su brtsams pa dge legs 'phel / me lug zla ba lnga pa'i tshes bcu drug la dge'o

item.tib: gsang ba gsang chen ma rgyud rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i gnyan sa lam du khyer ba'i gdams pa gcig chod ral gri byung rtegs
item.coloph: sa stag zla ba bcu pa'i tshes bcu gsum nyin byang gi sa gnas ngang ma'i sgor / rta sgo lha zhal mdun gyi sa gnas su … dmu rigs rnal 'byor surya dho dza zhes bya ba'i sbyar ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: ka khad ris pa'i tshig sdebs rkang chen sgrog pa'i gling bu'i glu dbyangs
item.coloph: dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i dbang po'i ka kha'i tshig sdebs rkang chen gling bu'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba brtsams pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: gsang sngags dam tshig bshad byang mdor bsdus shel dkar nor bu'i rgyan 'phreng
item.coloph: de ltar gsang sngags kyi rtsa ba dam tshig gi bshad byang mdor bsdus shel [15r] dkar nor bu'i rgyan 'phreng zhes bya ba / dge sding rab 'byams lhun grub 'od zer gyi dpal bde chen sgang du brtsams pa dge legs 'phel

item.tib: dmu rgyal rnal 'byor nyi ma'i mjal snang lu gu rgyud kyi gter 'phreng
item.coloph: de ltar dmu rgyal gsang ba'i bdag po rnal 'byor nyi ma'i dbang po la / mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan mi brjed phyed [sic: ched] dran gso yi ger bris…

item.tib: dbal phur srung zlog gi zin ris gsal byed 'od gur
dug phyung rig 'dzin tshan khrus bsang dang thabs chen yab rgyud kyi dkar bgegs dang bcas
dkar bgegs
bsnyen sgrub las tshogs spyi la rgyug pa'i bse rag 'gab 'dre bkar ba
hUM mdzad gyi phyag rgya dang bcas te 'gug pa'i bden bdar
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phyag bzhes mngon rtogs rin chen do shal
item.coloph: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i 'phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud gzhung las kyi mtha' sgyur dang bcas pa 'di … khod sbung [~spungs] bla chen dran pa nam mkha' bka' mkha' skyod rnam dag zhing gi ye shes mkha' 'gro'i gtso mo 'od ldan 'bar ma'i don zab mo'i bskul ba'i mdo khams 'bri zla zal mo'i sgang rgyud sgron me mtshung med zab gter 'chang ba mi 'gyur tshe dbang grags pa la gnam lo shing mo yos kyi dpyid zla'i tshes kyi snying po nya chen nyi shar du … snyan du gsungs … slar … don grub zhes pa rin chen rkang 'gros kyi gnam lor … stag rtse g.yung drung gling skye sprul 'dzin pa g.yung drung dbang rgyal gyis 'bris ldan zla ba'i yar ngo rgyal ba dang po'i tshes la son par bgyis pas …

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud las dkyil 'khor bca' bkod kyi le'u rin chen mdzes pa'i 'phra rgyan
item.coloph: … ces mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pa rtsal la mkha' 'gro 'od ldan 'bar ma'i snyan du rgyud ltar / slar gu ge'i ris su gtan la phab nas / yi ge pa ni 'gru rigs tshu mi wer zhis byas pas …

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las kyi / zur rgyan shog chung ye shes 'od kyi 'khor lo
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i skabs don dngos grub zhu ba'i ye ses 'od kyi sgron me
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i dam bca' dang smon lam
phud sbyang
item.coloph: khro bo stag la'i thugs sprul dpra khyung sngags 'chang dbal 'bar stag slag can bdag la rang lo lnga'i thog tu yi dam khro bo phur nag mngon sum zhal mthong lung bstan snyan rgyud thob / slad mar gsang rgya yol nas / dpal gyi gdan sa khyung nag pho brang gi dbu rtse ru / mi nub rgyal mtshan rtsa ru gtan la phab

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i stong 'dzab 'phro 'du
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud las 'phro 'du gsang ba'i sgrub ba khro chu'i zhun ma
item.coloph: ces mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pa bdag la mkha' 'gros snyan du brgyud bzhin / phyis su nub rong kong yul gyi stag rtse rnam rgyal gling gi mchog sprul g.yung drung dbang rgyal gyi bskul ngor zor med lung bzhin phab ste / yi ge pa ni smyug 'dzin bsod nams grags pas bskrun …

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i sngags 'grigs kyi rim pa
bskul 'debs
kun tu bzang po rgyal ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs nyams len skor lnga las phyi nang gnyis gcig tu dril ba'i las byang snyan rgyud a gsal 'phrul gyi lde mig
item.coloph: a gsal phrin las 'di ni gyer mi dang rma ston gnyis kyi bka' gter kha sbyor las gshen gyi drang srong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis sman ri'i kh[r]od du bkod ba'o

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud las g.yung drung tshe'i sgrub pa zla dkar shel gyi 'khor lo
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las kyi sngon 'gro'i cha lag dang rig 'dzin rgyud pa'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs kun 'byung
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi gzhung
dbal phur nag po'i rgyud phyag
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud las zlog pa me dpung 'bar ba'i gtar tshan
item.coloph: mkha' 'gro'i lung bzhin 'khrul med gtan la phab / … ces pa me sbrul lo la mi 'gyur gsang sngags grags pa o rgyan bde chen gling ba'i dpal gyis mi g.yo smin grol kh[r]od du phab pas …

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud las drag po zlog pa'i mngon rtogs me ri'i phring ba
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i zlog pa las gong gnon khyung gi zlog pa
item.coloph: stag rtse g.yung drung 'khyil pa'i sprul sku g.yung drung dbang rgyal gyis bskul ngor mkha' 'gro'i lung bzhin kong yul tshul du stag ris can gyis spel nas …

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i rnga rabs thugs dam rgyud bskul
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i rgyud las bsrung ba mi 'jig rdo rje'i gur khang
item.coloph: … bskang ba dang srung ba gnyis med gcig gi ngang / las kyi mtha' bsgyur rdo rje'i gur khang 'di / … mkha' 'gro 'od ldan 'bar ma grogs kyi tshul du byon nas snying ma'i kho bo / o rgyan bde chen gling pa rtsal la snyan du rgyud nas / me sbrul lor hor zla dgu ba'i tshes nyer dgu la / 'bri rdza zal mo'i sgang du phab pa …
ces dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i 'phrin las kyi bzlog mdos rdzes chos rdzogs so

item.tib: stag la'i mjug chog las
gsang sngags zab mo mdos kyi cha lag tu / spyi ru 'gro ba'i
item.coloph: de ltar gsang sngags zab mo rnam bzhi'i las / gang sgrub mdos kyi smad chog 'di / spyi spungs bon la rgya che mtha' yas kyang / … nyung la 'dus ba bsgrags pa bskor gsum nas / zur du mchungs [~mtshungs] med bsod nams blo gros kyis bkod pa …

item.tib: khra tsa bcos thabs
dbal phur ba nag po'i phrin las kyi zor las gnam lcags thog mda'
item.coloph: gsang ba'i mkha' 'gro 'od ldan 'bar ma yis / dus mtha'i rnal 'byor bdag la snyan du brgyud / bdag gi bka' rgya thub par legs brdams nas / slar yang sa rdar grogs kyis bskul ba'i ngor / dkar chag btab te g.yung drung dbang rgyal la / bstan pa'i bon 'di nyi zer ji bzhin du …
'di yang dus 'khor khang tshan gyis gter chen sgrubs skabs / blo gros mtha' yas sogs kyis lha rdzas bcas bskul ngor / tshul chen skye ba de pas sbyar ro

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i las mtha' khram gtad me dpung 'bar ba'i gdang ngar
item.coloph: dbal bon stag la me 'bar gyi thugs bcud / khod spungs rig 'dzin chen mo'i mdzad srol / mkha' 'gro 'od ldan 'bar ma'i lung don / dus mtha'i rnal 'byor bdag gi 'di ni / mchog gi skyes bu chen po g.yung drung dbang rgyal gyis zhabs rdul spyi bor blangs nas / sa rta'i zla tshes la kong yul dga' ba'i tshal du dge / …

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud las dbang khrid kyi go rgyan ye shes me yi phring ba
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i rgyud las zhi dbang rin chen 'phra mdzes
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud las smin grol dbang gi cho ga gdug pa tshar gcod
item.coloph: mkha' 'gro 'od ldan 'bar mas snyan du rgyud nas phyis sa rta hor zla bdun pa'i tshes bzang por mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pas rgyal mo dngul chu'i 'gram du phab nas …

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las kyi sbyin sreg mdel thung ye shes me lce
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i sbyin bsreg me yi dbal 'khor gyi sham bu bsregs byed ye shes dza dmar 'khyil pa
item.coloph: 'od ldan mkha' 'gro'i bka' lung zab mo'i bcud / mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pa la / brgyud de phyis su kong rong tshal gyi gnas / dbus phug rdzong du sa rta'i zla tshes dge …

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud las drag po me'i mchod pa bsreg byed me'i dbal 'khor
item.coloph: … mi 'gyur tshe dbang grags pa'i bka' byung nas / thos bsam nor gyis dbul ba g.yung drung dbang rgyal gyis / gang dran zol shar bde'i dben ni bris

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rgyud las khro bcu gsang ba thugs kyi gzer bu
item.coloph: rigs 'dzin gyi slob dpon chen po bla ma lnga brgya dran pa dgyes pa'i 'bang dbal bon g.yung drung bdud 'dul thogs med rtsal rang lo bcu gsum lcags sbrul lor / … snyan rgyud rgyud sde bzhi yi babs so bcas kyi dngos su dbang dang lung thob / gzhan yang dbal chen phur pa'i rgyud sde chen po bco lnga / sde bkor don gsum spyi chun / dgos sde gang 'gel bcas smin byed dbang grol byed kyi khrid / rgyab rten gyi lung bshad dka'i bka' dang bcas pa nod las / 'dir bka' gter snyan gsum gyi rtsa sgrub thugs kyi gzir bu zhes bya ba ste / … 'di snying lta bu'i skor yongs rdzong dpal phug nas sa mo lug lor … spyan drangs te / spyir shog ser gyer spungs dran pa'i phyag ris kho nar sdeb lnga cu rtsa lnga 'dug pa la / rigs 'dzin dbang phyug khyung po bstan 'dzin dbang rgyal gyi bkra shis lha rdzas kyi me tog gi mtshams sbyar ba dang lhag par 'thul phur 'bar ba gdegs chen po'i man dral brtsal ba la brten te / lho tsha drag po rdzong gi nye 'dabs / khyu mchog rab gsal gyi gtab log drag po dbal gyi rdzong chen dbal gyi ljon shing bsil 'khyud du gtan la phab te / yi ge pa ni phrin las lhun grub …

item.tib: dbal chen 'bar ba nag po'i las mtha' me mchod kyi cha lag sreg byed 'bar ba
item.coloph: … cha lag sreg byed 'bar ba 'di … sa rta'i zla tshes la bde chen gling pa'i bka' pheb bzhin …

item.tib: zlog pa'i 'gres byang
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las kyi dgra zlog me yi zur rgyan
item.coloph: 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pas mkha' 'gro'i bka' bzhin phab nas g.yung drung dbang rgyal la'o

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i byad zlog thog gi zur rgyan
item.coloph: 'od ldan lung bzhin gsang sngags grags pa la yongs 'dzin kong ston g.yung drung dbang rgyal gyis bskul ngor lung bzhin dag pas dge ba des …

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i yams zlog spu gri'i zur rgyan
item.coloph: khod spungs dran pa'i mdzad srol / mkha' 'gro 'od ldan 'bar ma'i snyan rgyud / mi 'gyur gsang sngags grags pas dngos grub / g.yung gling drung mu'i mtshan gyi bon skal

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i yams zlog spu gri'i zur rgyan
dbal phur nag po'i sri zlog dbal 'khor zur rgyan
