item.coloph: mkha' 'gro'i lung bzhin kong yul dag tshal du / g.yung dbang bka' bzhin dag pheb bde gling ngo

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i rgyud las dbal chen phur pa'i gsang zlog byad ma 'bum sdugs nag po
item.coloph: ces pa mkha' 'gro 'od ldan 'bar ma'i snyan du rgyud nas / slar sa rta hor zla brgyad pa'i tshes bzang por gsa' mda' bde pa'i sgar du phab pa'o

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i rgyud las khra spyang zlog pa'i las byang ye shes me yi 'khor lo
las sbyor brnag pa'i zin ris cha lag tu bsgrigs pa mngon spyod 'bar ba
item.coloph: bla ma'i bka' yis dgos zhes bya bar bskul nas / stag rtse g.yung drung gling gi dgon du / g.yung dbang gis brtsam zhing bsgrigs cha btas pa …

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i rgyud las dgra sri mnan thabs khro chu khol ma'i las byang
item.coloph: ces kho bo […] mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pa bdag la shing yos lor mkha' 'gro 'od ldan 'bar ma'i gnang ste / phyis me sbrul hor zla bcu ba'i tshes la don gnyer 'ga' yi bskul ngor mdo khams 'bri zla zab mo'i sgang rgyud thar bde smin grol gling gi dbus su 'khod pa'i mkha' spyod bde gsal khang du mgyogs par phab

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i rgyud las dgra chos myur mgyogs glog gi zhags pa
item.coloph: … 'di yang don gnyer rdor dza'i bskul ngor / 'phags yul a yu un zhi bdag gis dmar ser zhes pa me mo sbrul gyi zla tshes la smin grol gsang pa'i khrod du 'od ldan yum gyi lung bzhin phab pa'o / yi ge pa ni 'gru sngags tshul rgyal gyis bris

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i rgyud las khra spyang pho nya 'gyed pa dmar nag glog gi zhags pa
item.coloph: de ltar dung shog ngos su bris te snang

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i rgyud las smad las dam nyams srog rtsa gcod pa'i spu gri
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las kyi mdos kyi smad chog
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las me ri 'khyil ba rin chen gter mdzod kyi rig 'dzin brgyud phyag dang khyad par bskangs ba
item.coloph: mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags ba rin po che'i bka' pheb ma ldog ste / drung mu'i ming gis gnas mdun stag rtse g.yung drung gling nas sa rta zla tshes la bgyis te …

item.tib: dbal phur nag po'i rgyud las bskang ba zad med gter rgyun
dbal phur nag po'i rgyud las khro chu dug gdong bskang ba
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las kyi 'jigs byed gshin rje nag po'i gsang sgrub gcod byed dug gdong dmar nag
item.coloph: gyer spungs chen po bla chen dran pa rjes / mdzad 'phrin srol bzang 'khrul med 'od ldan mas / shing yos lo la snyan du rgyud pa bzhin / lhag chad med par pho nya rta yi lor / g.yung drung dbang rgyal can gyis bskul ngor / gsang gnas dbus phug dpal gyi yang rdzong du / mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pas …

item.tib: phyag rgya 'jigs tshogs kyi gzhung bsring ba
srung ma sde bzhi
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i rgyud las srung ma las mkhan drug cu'i bskul pa gcod byed me yi dbal 'khor
item.coloph: 'od ldan mkha' 'gros kho bo bdag gi snyan du brgyud / slar lo bzhi'i bka' rgya las yol tshe / kong yul gnas chen yang rdzong dpal gyi dbus phug tu sa rta zla ba bcu pa'i dbang phyogs su / lung zin skyes mchog dam pa g.yung drung dbang rgyal gyis bskul ngor // mi 'gyur tshe dbang gsang sngags grags pas phab pa'i dge des …

item.tib: dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i rgyud las dbang chog drag po khol byung gi skabs don
dbal phur 'bar ba nag po'i rgyud las bzlas pa 'dzab kyi them ba 'phro 'du srog gi dangs ma
mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnam thar gsang ba'i mdzod / nyi ma'i snying po mun sel sgron ma
item.coloph: de ltar rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro'i rnam thar la / phyi nang gsang ba yang gsang grangs mang yang / 'di ni dang po mkha' 'gro'i byung khung dang / [277v] bar du rig 'dzin tshogs kyi grogs mdzad tshul / tha ma rang gzhan 'gro don mdzad pa sogs / bod kyi bon chos ma 'ongs rjes bzhag dus / 'chi med rgyal ba yab sras zab mo gter / mi brjed gzung ldan ye shes mtsho rgyal dang / bon chos dbyer med bai ro tsa na dang / kun la dag snang lha sras mu ne btsad / de gsum gdams pa'i rgyud 'dzin las 'phro ldan / ma 'ongs don du zab pa gter thams cad / rtsa ba rje lo ma gsum nyid la rag / 'di rnams rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro kun gyi bka' / bod khams bstan pa'i srog shing dam pa yin / zab pa'i gter gyi bya ba thams cad bsgrub / 'di ni rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro'i snying thig yin / mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnam thar gsang ba'i mdzod / nyi ma'i snying po mun sel sgron ma 'di / mu rdo'i gnas lag ma rgyud gsang ba'i zhing / pad+ma 'bar ba'i brag la gter du bbag [~sbas?] / dus dang mthun par kho mo rang gis brnyes / sku tshab shog ser brda yig dag par phab / tshul 'di spyod pa'i skal bzang las 'phro can / 'bri klog 'don spel tshe 'dir dge bsam 'grub / [278r] phyi ma rig 'dzin mkha' 'gros rjes 'dzin zhing … ces pa'i zab gsang mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i snying thig rnam thar gsang ba'i mdzod chen nyi ma'i snying po mun sel sgron me 'di ni nyags shod yul du skyes pa'i mkha' 'gro'i ming 'dzin bde chen chos kyi dbang mo zhes pa sa rta lor rgyal mo mu rdo gnas chen 'dus pa'i phyir du / gter chen gsang sngags gling pa dang rang bcas gnas 'brel du pheb pa la / mu rto nor bu phug dang mthar bskor lam du tshogs dang mchod pa rgya cher mdzad cing / gnas chen de la gnas phran drug cu rtsa gcig yod pa las ba wam brag stengs char yod pa'i gnyen rje dkar tog g.yu lung dmar po ri khyung brag jo bo rje rgo bde sogs kyi gnas la tshogs 'brel gter ka bskor lam sogs brten 'brel legs lam gyur / brag steng pa wam sogs kyi dpon sde thams cad kyis zhabs zhus rgya cher bsgrubs cing dge bshes smad sder pheb / [278v1] smad phyogs kyi dgon sde thams cad nas 'brel 'jog legs par byas / khyad par du dad sbyin rgan po khams thar tshe ring gis gter chen rang bcas khyim du gdan drangs pa la / lam khar bai ro'i rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhengs pa'i mchod rten thams cad la tshogs 'brel dang brtan bzhugs mdzad / dad sbyin gyi khyim du de nub tshogs 'khor rgya cher bgyis pa'i tho rang 'od gsal ngang du snang khams thams cad 'od zer drwa ba 'khrugs pa'i klong du mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong can gtso 'khor grangs la 'das pa me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na zhal mngon sum du mjal zhing sku tshab gter sgrom bcas mngon sum du rang la dngos grub tu bab ste rten 'brel gegs med du gyur / gter sgrom mar me'i 'od snang la bltas pas mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnam thar bzhugs cing gsang rgya sdom / phyi nyin ma rgyud kyi gnas la tshogs dang mchod pa rgya cher phul / sku tshab kyis dbang gnang zhing dad sbyin tshogs rdzogs pa dang yul sde thams cad kyi dge sgrub sdig spang rgya chen po grub song / phyis su grub chen ye shes rdo rje dang shar rdza'i rtogs ldan rin po che gnyis kyis sngar nas rang la bka' gter dag snang sogs snying thig gi skor ma lus pa phab dgos kyi gsungs nan dang / [179r] nye bar gter chen nyid la sku gegs che bar yod pa la / khro sprul rin po che gdan drangs song bzhin dam pa nyid pheb thub cing sku rim rgya che rgyun ring bsgrubs pas sku gegs sel / de yi skabs su rang la snying thig gi skor mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnam thar phab dgos zhes khro sprul g.yung drung mthong grol dang / dbal sprul g.yung drung gnyis kyis yang yang bzhed ngor zab gtsang gter rgya lo do dgu yi bka' rgya grol te me yos zla ba bzhi ba'i tshes bcu'i nyin par dbu btsugs nas zla ba lnga pa'i yar tshes bcu'i nyin shog ser bshus grub dag par phab cing spel bas bstan pa'i zab gter rin po che phyogs brgyar khyab cing 'gro ba yongs kyi don chen lhun gyis grub par shog cig gu // ces pa'i thog ma'i yi ge pa ni gter chen nyid kyi chos bdag dge bshes lha ris pa g.yung drung ye shes kyis bgyis pa ste dge legs kyi snang bas gsum na khyab te gdul bya smin zhing grol ba'i rgyu ru gyur cig / sarba mangga lam // swasti // // rab 'byams rgyal kun mkhyen brtse thugs kyi chu gter chen [279v1] thabs shes rten 'brel rang gzugs gog med nyi zla'i 'od kyi zhal // … mtsho rgyal rnam rol bde chen dban mo'i bka' gter ratna'i gling // yang zab mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnam thar nor gyi dbyig dril ba // ye shes dgon gyi bla gra thun mongs thugs bskyed dag pas bskul // bon sbyin mi zad par gyi dga' ston skal bzang rnams la 'gyed // [280r] de yi bsod nams lha lam yang pa ru // tshogs gnyis 'dzad med bar snang bla bre gtib // dge legs yon tan bdud rtsi gru char 'beb // bshad bsgrub bstan pa'i pad tshal rgyas gyur cig // ces par byang nyung ngu 'di 'ang nyag bon ye shes dgon sde mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnam thar par bzhengs skabs bya btang sprul ming pas 'phral du bris pa'o // dge'o // dge'o // dge'o

item.tib: ge khod gsang ba drag chen gyis zin ris
bca' thabs
ge khod dug phyung
bse rag 'gab 'dre bkar ba
gzhi thog rgyang 'bod gtor ma khri bkod
bar phud
ge khod gsang ba drag chen gyi ting 'dzin gsal ba'i sgron me
ge khod gsang ba drag chen gyis brten 'dzugs
ge khod gsang ba drag chen zhi ba a ti mu wer gyi sngon 'gro dang gzhung
bdud 'dul gsang ba drag chen gyi skyabs su gsol ba
ge khod gsang ba drag chen gyis mngon rtogs
dbal chen ge khod kyi mchod bskangs
ge khod gsang ba drag chen ldog med gser gyi spu gri
'dzab
brgyud phyag
dbal chen gsang ba drag chen gyis tshogs kyis bshags pa
me ri dpa' bo gyed phur gyis gtsang lhag
sgo dbye
ge khod gsang ba drag chen gyis tshe bsgrubs
ge khod gsang ba drag chen gyis rgyud bskangs
sgra bla'i rgyal mo'i bskul ba
bdud bskul
sgra bla'i rgyal mo stag ri rong / bskang ba'i rgyud
dbal chen ge khod kyis bskangs ba
item.coloph: rjes khyung pos khyung byid mu ldo ba ya / bla rje bsgoms pa rgyal la / stag lo me / rim gyis rgyud nas / da lta bdag la'o

item.tib: rnga rab
ge khod gsang ba drag chen gyi bzlog chung
ge khod this drug gi dmar bzlog
item.coloph: dbal chen ge khod dbang rgyal gyi bzlog mdos rgya rgya rgya

item.tib: ge khod kyis bzlogs pa
khro bo gnam lcags thog mda'i rgyud las ge khod this drug gi dmar zlog
ge khod kyi bzlog pa
item.coloph: stong rgyung mthu chen gyis gdab pa / ge khod khros pa nag po'i thun bsgrub rdzogs so

item.tib: dbal chen ge khod kyi zlog pa
than bzlog nyi shu rtsa gcig
item.coloph: ces khyung gi than bzlog rdzogs so

item.tib: ge khod bzlogs chung
dbal chen ge khod kyi bzlogs pa'i las mtha' sgo dbye
bzlod mdos kyi gzhi bting gser skyems mchod pa
dbal chen ge khod kyi sbyin sreg
item.coloph: gyer gyi me ri las kyi mtha' bsdus me ri'i sbyin sreg rdzogs so / spa dro'i gter ma'o

item.tib: ma mo stag ri rong gi ting 'dzin gsal byed me long
item.coloph: dang po gshen rab ston pas mdzad / stong rgyung mthu chen hris pa gyer med bla chen dren pa nam mkha' dag gis yang rgyas par bkrol te gter du sbas / … phyis dpon gsas khyung rgod rtsal gyis gter gyi zhal phye phyi rabs rim par brgyud do / stag btsun stag la rgyal mtshan rim gyi stag btsun […] / dran pa lhun grub dre ston phun tshogs g.yung drung tshul khrim las / g.yung drung rgyal po / des rim gyis brgyud nas bdag la'o

item.tib: ma mo stag ri rong gi bsad las kyi byang bu'i mchong
item.coloph: nas dran pa nyid la gtad / bla chen dren pa bdag gis kyang / mi rul gur gam rtsi pa'i byug ste phyi rabs don du gter du sbas / … dpon gsas khyung rgod rtsal gyis rnyed nas de nas rim par stag btsun stag la rgyal mtshan / des nam mkha' dbang rgyal dran pa lhun grub dre ston phun tshogs drag pa / des bdag la'o

item.tib: rnam shes spar pa
dbal chu'i bca' thabs
dbal chu'i zin ris
item.coloph: de ltar dbal chu 'bar ba nag po'i phrin las khrid kha 'di ni / tshe dbang lhun grub kyi nye bar bskul ba la rten nas / bdag nam mkha' rgyal mtshan gyis sngar gyi zin ris mi 'dra ba 'ga' re mthun sdeb / lag len 'chol ba'i rigs rnams dor nas lung dang mi 'gal ba'i tshul du bkod pa la…

item.tib: las bzhi rgyun gyi cha lag phud rabs ma thang bzhengs pa hom brtsegs rtsang rabs hom thod
dbal chu 'bar ba nag po'i dbal zangs
dbal chu'i thab bsang
dbal chen 'bar ba nag po'i khyung chen gyi 'phrin las
rdog 'joms 'bar ba nag po'i gzhung
mdos kyi smad mchong las lha 'dre'i yar zhu 'bul ba'i 'jug chog
me spar
gsang sngags drag po dgu 'dus kyi rgyud las drag po'i rdza 'dzab
mdos kyi smad mchong las zhu ba'i lan gsungs pa
'phur mo
btso phud
dkar gtor
bden bdar
bdud 'dul gsang ba drag chen gyi dbang khrid byin rlabs sprin phung
rgyal bsen lha lnga'i sgril mdos kyi bca' thabs
lha lnga'i sbrag mdos kyi zin ris nyung 'dus
mdos kyi mi dbang bkar ba
spyi rgyug mdos kyi stod mchong ge khod kyi las mtha'
spyi rgyug mdos kyi rnga rabs zil gnon khyung bskul sogs phyogs gcig dril ba
item.coloph: 'chi med gtsug phud kyis mdzad de li shu stag ring la brgyud pa'o

item.tib: dbal chen ge khod kyi las mtha' rgyal bsen lha lnga'i sgril mdos
gling bzhi srid pa'i spyi mdos smad mchong lha lnga'i sgril mdos sgo dbye lam bstan las 'grigs ma nor bkod pa
stag la me 'bar spu gri dmar nag yang gsang mthar thug gi phyag bzhes snang ba'i go 'byed
phung bon zlog pa'i bca' thabs bstan pa
dug phyung rig 'dzin tshan khrus lha bsang dkar po
gzhi thog rgyang 'bod
rig 'dzin 'dus pa thabs chen yab rgyud las / thar glud bskangs kyi rim pa
gshen po rang glud btang ba'i dbu phyogs
stag la spu gri dmar nag gi rgyud las phud gta' chen gyi rim pa
stag la'i phyi mtshams dang rdzogs rim
stag la'i mchod rten gyi sa'i rim 'gro
item.coloph: bdag 'dra phung bon mgo dmar gyis / phyi rabs bstan pa'i btses su bzhags / de nas dran pa nam mkha' yis / rma gnyan pom ra'i rtse ru sbas

item.tib: spu gri dmar nag gi rgyud nas thig gdab pa
item.coloph: chag chag gdab pa dang thig gdab gnyis spa dro'i gter ma'o

item.tib: bum pa'i ti ka lcags 'phrang gi gter ma
item.coloph: phung bon bdag gi [bdag] phyi rabs don du zhus / … khod spung bdag gis mang mkhar lcags la sbas / phyi rabs brdol ba'i smon lam gdab / dpon gsas khyung rgod rtsal nas spa tshangs la rim gyis brgyud

item.tib: mtshams bcad dang bum pa mchod gtor bkod pa
spu gri dmar nag gi gtor ma khri bkod dang khri dbab
item.coloph: bdag 'dra kyu ra rin chen de / stag tu sprul nas phyin pas na / rma gnyan rtse las zab gter rnyed / phyi rabs bu yi nyams su longs / rim par da lta bdag la'o / khro chen spar [par?] bu la zhal bshus

item.tib: phyag bzhes 'dzab kyi 'phro 'du
stag lha'i 'phro 'du 'dzab kyi thim rnams
item.coloph: bdag 'dra phung bon mgo dmar gyis / ston pa stag la me 'bar la zhus / phyi rabs gshen po'i srog mkhar shog / bla chen khod spungs bdag gis kyang / rma gnyan pom ra'i rtse la sbas / phyi rabs las ldan gshen dang 'phrad par shog / sprul sku kyu ras gter zhal phyes nas / rim par brgyud nas rtsa ba'i bla ma la'o

item.tib: stag lha me 'bar gyi tshe bsgrub dgos 'dod kun 'byung
stag la me 'bar gyi phywa tshe mi 'jigs srung ba'i gur khang
stag lha'i bkra shis
stag la spu gri dkar nag dmar gsum gyi brgyud bskangs.
item.coloph: ces pas tshul 'di ni gshen gyi drang srong zhang zhung lig min rgal gyi gdung rgyud / 'gro mgon bu 'bar sprul sku'i dus / mtshan ldan g.yung drung ye shes la / drang srong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bskul pa'i don du / khro tshang 'brug lha'i gnas zhol du / stag la'i bsgrub pa mdzad dus sbyar ba'o

item.tib: stag la me 'bar spu gri dkar nag dmar gsum gyi cha lag
stag la me 'bar gyi tshogs lhag
item.coloph: ces pa'i tshul 'di ni / dpra ston drung mu ha ra la / dpra btsun shes rab rgyal mtshan dang / sngags 'chang stag sgom gnyis kyis bskul ba'i ngor / yang dben dgon pa ru sbyar ba'o

item.tib: kun tu bzang po rgyal ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs nyams len skor lnga las phyi nang gnyis gcig tu dril ba'i las byang snyan rgyud a gsal 'phrul gyi lde mig
item.coloph: ces a gsal 'phrin las 'di ni gyer mi dang rma ston gnyis kyi bka' gter kha sbyor las / gshen gyi drang srong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis sman ri'i khrod du bkod pa 'o

item.tib: stag lha phung ber nag po'i bskang ba
go zhubs bskang ba
item.coloph: 'di ni shog ser sdeb ma gnyis gda' bas bu yig la zhal bshus so / byung khung lo rgyus gzhung du gsal

item.tib: stag la spu gri nag po'i las byang che ba
stag la spu gri dmar po'i 'phrin las bsam 'phel phreng ba
stag la spu gri dmar po'i mngon rtogs
stag la'i phyi mtshams bsdus pa dang sems bskyed skyabs 'gro gsol 'debs rnams
item.coloph: ces pa'i tshul 'di ni / rgya rong mu la ha ra la / sprul sku mu la tshul mi dang / rgya rong pradznya wer zhi gnyis kyi [kyis] bskul ngor / gnas chen sku bla g.yu mgon gyi mdun zhol / dben gnas dgon par sbyar ba bkra shis

item.tib: stag la spu gri dmar po'i tshogs bskang dgos 'dod kun 'byung
tshogs bskang
stag la spu gri dmar po'i 'phrin las tshig bcad so so'i ting 'dzin
rnam shes bsad pa'i sngags rigs
bskang ba
item.coloph: dun tse stong sgrol phung bon nag po'i bskang chung u ya smar ro / bdag 'dra phung bon mgo dmar gyis / 'ol mo lung ring yang phug tu / ston pa stag la me 'bar la / lha nor bcu gsum phul nas ni / dka' ba du ma spyad nas zhus / smon lam btab nas dran pa nyid la gtad / kho[d] spung dran pa bdag gis kyang / rma gnyan spom ra'i rtse la sbas / brag seng ge 'dra ba'i 'og / mi langs 'dra ba'i gong / brag shel gur phug pa 'dra ba'i dkyil du sbas / … [p. 202r] ph[y]is dus kyu ra 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyis / rma gnyan spom ra'i rtser gter nas gdan drang / dpon po shes rab 'od zer la brgyud / rgya ru khro bo rgyal mtshan la brgyud / de nas rim par brgyud nas bdag g.yung drung rgyal mtshan la 'o

item.tib: stag lha spu gri dmar nag gi bskangs ba
dregs pa spyan 'dren
dregs pa gsang bskul dam nyams srog gi seg gdar
khrag gdong bskul ba dgra la rbad pa
stag la'i las byed khrag gdong dmar po'i gtor bskul
gter bdag yum sras lnga'i dril bsgrub
stong bdud pom ra ma'i bskul ba
stag la me 'bar spu gri gsang ba'i snang srid rol bskang gi mdos
stag la bcud dril gnam lcags thog rgod sgrol byed nag po
item.coloph: 'di ni bla chen dran pa'i des ma bu gsum srol du byas nas / gter kha chen po gsum la sbas / [p. 273r] 'di rma gnyan spom ra'i mgul nas sprul sku kyu ra rnal 'byor gyis bton pa dang / khyung rgod rtsal gyis zang zang lha brag nas bton pa 'dra 'dra 'dra bdur ba'i [bas?] tshe sgrub dang / drag sngags 'di lhag par byung / gzhan rnams 'dra bar byung legs so

item.tib: mdun bskyed
'gres byang
dun rtse stong bsgrol gyi rgyud las ting 'dzin gab yig gi rim pa
stag lha'i mdos kyi mjug chog
mdos kyi zhal bsgyur chas rab mdos gzhi sprugs pa rnams
khra tsha
dbal bon stag la me 'bar gyis sna khrid mched lnga
mdos kyi gzhi bting gzu dpang gser skyems
stag la me 'bar gyi rnga rabs
item.coloph: khyung po 'bum sde grags pa'i phyag dpe

item.tib: stag lha'i rtsang bstod
spu gri stong thun dmar nag gi rkyang thag bcad pa
tshon thag
dbal bon stag la me 'bar gyi tha ram sgo dbye
stag la me 'bar gyi spyi'i gser skyems
srog lha spo ba
spu gri dmar nag gi khram phyes dang byad thag bcad pa
item.margin: khram phyes byad thag bcad pa

item.tib: mdos kyi sa 'tshams bgo ba
thal mo brdab chog
stag la me 'bar gyi log 'dren phyi lam bcad pa
lha rgyal bde skyid dbyangs snyan
mnga' gsol bde legs kun 'byung
gser skyems
stag lha'i mdos kyi bca' gzhi bskyed rim lag len
stag la phung 'bar nag po'i bzlog pa
stag la me 'bar gyi stong kheb bzlog pa
byed ma rang gshed dbab pa'i bzlog pa
ra thod 'dres byang
stag lha spu gri dmar po'i bzlog pa'i gzhung
spu gri nag po byad ma stong khams khram bzlog mdos chen
stag la me 'bar gyi nyi zla gzhu'i than bzlog
stag la me 'bar gyi than bzlog mde'u thung
stag lha spu gri dmar nag gi cha lags mtha' bsdus zor las
spu gri dkar nag dmar gsum gyi rgyud las drag po las kyi kha tshar srog gi spu gri
item.coloph: gsang sngags las kyi mtha' bsdud 'di / spu gri dkar nag dmar gsum bcud dril sogs kyi cha lag kha mthor rnams ma nor bar [p. 489v] phyogs gcig tu dril bas / stod smad kyi gnad don dgu gnyis bco brgyad du bsgrigs pa'i 'gugs sgrol mde'u thung drag po las kyi kha tshar gcod byed srog gi spu gri zhes bya ba 'di / … kho bo dpra btsun bdag gis bsgrigs / … ces pas tshul 'di ni shar rgyal mo rong du skyes pa rgyal rigs dge bshes tsa'i zhal ngo rnal 'byor g.yung drung ye shes kyis / bon gyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir du sbyar ba'o

item.tib: dbal bon stag la me 'bar gyi dregs pa bskul chen dpa' zas ngar chu 'bul ba
dmag mdos
item.coloph: par bzang dag gzhir drang / khro chen rgyal pos bsgrubs so

item.tib: rbad mdos
item.coloph: rgya gsum gdab nas rbas / pom ra'i gter ma'o / sngon bsags 'bras smin khro chen kun dga' yis / 'di khyi'i [~phyi'i] legs byas rgyu ru spar bsgrub dge

item.tib: phyag bzhes 'dzab kyi 'phro 'du
rbad mdos
stag la me 'bar spu gri dmar nag gi sbyin bsreg chog bsgrig rgyug byang
stag la spu gri dmar nag gi rgyud las sbyin bsreg chog sgrig me yi spu gri
item.coloph: bdag 'dra phung bon mgo dmar gyis / 'ol mo lung ring gsang phug tu / ston pa stag la stag la me 'bar la / dka' ba spyad nas 'di zhus pa / phyi rabs bstan pa'i btsas su bzhag / 'di yi don bzhin byas gyur nas / [p. 568r1] las rnams 'grub par the tshom med / ces gsung rin chen gter du bzhag / phyi dus… zang zang brag dang pom ra nas / sprul sku dbyil dang kyu ra yis / gter drangs bstan pa kun du spel / bon dang gter byung 'o mtsho la / rmongs pa'i rang bzo'i chu bo dang / 'dren par mthong dang bstan sbyin che / dge bshes rgyal po'i thugs byon bzhin / stag la me 'bar gyi rnal 'byor ba / kun grol grags kyis stabs bder sgrigs…

item.tib: stag lha me 'bar gyi rnga rab
dregs pa rta zhon dams nyams srog gi spu gri
stag lha'i las sbyor thog mda' dgu sgril gyi rgyab skyor bshad byang
item.coloph: ces pa'i bsad las thog mda' dgu sgril gyi rgyab skyor bshad byang 'di ni / dad ldan slob mas yang nas yang du bskul ba'i ngor / rgyal ba gnyis pa bstan pa 'od zer gyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa'i / dre btsun bdag gis dben gnas lung bzang du sbyar ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: stag lha'i las sbyor thog mda' dgu sgril
item.coloph: de ltar stag la'i las sbyor thog mda' dgu sgril zhes bya ba / gzhung lung gtsor bzhag man ngag 'thor ba rnams bsdus nas / lag len go bde ba'i phyir du dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa'i / dre btsun bdag gi dben gnas lung bzang du sbyar ba res shig rdzogs so

item.tib: stag la bcud dril gyi 'phrin las
item.coloph: 'di ni dad ldan grogs po ba si rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis / rang gi rgyun khyer nyams su blang 'dod blos / kun nas slang nas yang yang bskul ba'i ngor / a shag bya bral g.yung drung rgyal mtshan gyis / gzhung dang yig phran man ngag [p. 621r] gsal them las / go tshod blo tis bsdus shing khrigs su bsgrigs…

item.tib: stag lha spu gri dmar po'i skyabs 'gro gsol 'debs
stag lha'i nyi zla go zhubs gsang ba'i bsgrub pa

item.coloph: shog ser yig 'phreng lnga zhal bshus / pom ra'i gter ma rdzogs so

item.tib: bsrung ba nyi zla'i go zhub kyi phrin las chung ba
